column1: How it all got started: The story of the first poolbot. Our Founder, Heinrich, tells this story.

“Born out of sheer frustration and annoyance, the first Poolbot was assembled in late 2016… My brother and I, both electronic engineers had had enough of endless pool testing kits, tons of money spent on chemicals, pool gadgets and swampy water. So we put our minds together to dream up a device that would forever change the way we maintain our pools.

We wanted an easy, affordable, no-nonsense device that would take the guess work out of having a clear, healthy pool and it also had to have an easy-to-use app so that we could maintain it from anywhere in the world. Primitive market research among friends, family and the local pool shop proved we weren’t the only ones feeling the frustration and soon we had more requests for devices than we could keep up with.

And so the first Poolbot was tossed into a murky, green pool in early 2017 and with lots of late nights, tweaking and calibrating the first pool turned from green to clean! What we started with was a bunch of electronics and some kitty litter in a floating lunch box, but it worked and that got us noticed by Sqwidnet – and airport security a few times!”

The Innovation Hub shared our excitement when we were announced as one of the winners of the prestigious GAP ICT Awards in late 2017. We partnered with Sqwidnet (who provides the IoT network we use) and then we started to really gain some momentum.

Since then we successfully raised further grant and private funding and have been refining our prototypes to work out any remaining snags. We have had tremendous success with keeping numerous pools in pristine condition and we look forward to the next stage in our journey with you as our partners in our fight against swampy pools and frustrating test kits.
Above: Then vs. Now. Our prototype electronics (above) fully industrialized onto a single, small board (below) ready for full scale production.
It’s not only a device that we are building but we want to simplify the whole experience of owning a pool. So we are bringing the complete service to market under our PoolSense brand.

column2: >Above: Our first casing tops coming out of the mold injector. Exciting stuff.

column1: We strive to bring Innovative, Smart, Simple solutions to the Connected Home IoT market. Our products use state-of-the-art components and technology that aim to make your life easier. As a company we are focused on making people’s lives easier through innovative technology in the IoT space.

The PoolSense product addresses the first major problem we have found and developed a solution for.  The recent worldwide rollout of the Sigfox IoT Network, in conjunction with our platform and expertise opens many opportunities globally.
Prize money has enabled us to complete prototype design and testing and we are now ready to begin full-scale manufacture. But we need your help!
Getting our first units sold into the market will really give us a solid foundation and economy of scale to ensure that we are able to keep our product as affordable and possible.
• Your PoolSense device, delivered to your door
• 12 Months of free data to use our app
• Early Birds get 24 months of data and save 45%
• Re-sellers can buy multiples and save up to 45%

We have set a flexible goal because we already have some funds to get started. However, we do need your help to launch us into the market with a bang! The funds raised here will go towards fulfilling your orders ASAP and start on our next batch of products for after the campaign finishes. Achieving economy-of-scale will help us keep PoolSense as affordable as possible so everyone can have a hassle-free pool!

We truly believe that PoolSense will change the way you care for your pool water. Forever! We aim to bring more exciting projects to market that use simple smart technologies to make your life easier. Through our supply chain partners we hope to grow their businesses along with ours and create jobs that ultimately uplift communities and teach new skills.

As a prize winner in the 2017 GAP ICT awards, PoolSense was taken into the Maxum Business Incubator Programme (Maxum). Maxum provides funding and services to entrepreneurs to help them start and grow companies that will create jobs, commercialize innovative technologies and improve business competitiveness.
We have also been endorsed by high profile business influencers and are very proud of how far we have come in a relatively short space of time. Click HERE to watch our Q&

Our initial challenge was finding the right supply chain partners with the necessary capabilities and expertise to bring our product to life. Our career experience and extensive network allowed us to meet the right people and find what we need to ensure a fast, reliable and efficient supply chain. Each of us bring unique skills to the table which allow us to manage our business in a very balanced and holistic way.

There are quite a few legislative and administrative issues that could derail a project like ours (i.e. export requirements, shipping of tech products with batteries, etc) but we are confident that we have the right partners and necessary expertise to ensure we deliver in full and on time.

We would LOVE for you to help us announce to the world that HASSLE-FREE POOL CARE IS FINALLY HERE! Please go to our website and find out more, find us on social media, like, share and help us make PoolSense and great success! Indiegogo has some great share tools to help you – to help us! We very much appreciate every effort made.

WE HAVE THREE QUESTIONS:

1. Do you shave?

2. Do you like to save money?

3. Have you ever experienced razor burn, irritation or an uncomfortable shave?

If you answered YES to any, or all, of them than you need to see this!
column2:
>

Leaf combines amazing, time-tested blades with modern shaving ergonomics so that you can stop renting your shave and OWN your shave.

This is the razor that changes shaving forever.

column1:
We designed Leaf because we were tired of paying the Big Shave companies. 

And paying Shave Clubs for the same disposable razors wasn't much better.

So we took it upon ourselves to innovate the product and break the blade-and-razor strategy. And we're incredibly excited to announce the Leaf Razor, the product of more than a year of design, iteration, testing and refinement!

This is really simple, there's a better way to get a great shave for a fraction of the cost of disposable razors. But you don't have to give up on the modern conveniences of a comfortable pivoting head and multiple blades. 

The Leaf Razor is the best shave we've ever had, hands down.
column2:
>

 The Leaf Razor is an all-metal, beautifully designed razor handle that integrates double-edge razor blades into a modern form factor. With a pivoting head and multiple-blades. We've created a razor that can compete head-to-head with the most advanced razors in the world, while allowing our customers to replace their blades for CENTS not dollars.

The Leaf Razor has unique technology to adjust aggressiveness that can't be found in any other cartridge shaving system! The Leaf Razor can hold 1, 2 or 3 blades where each blade position has a different level of aggressiveness engineered via blade exposure. This means that you can adjust the aggressiveness of the shave whenever you want.

It might sound like a paradox to suggest that our solution is both cheaper to use, and introduces new features to give you a better shave...

But it's true.
column3:
>

 

Experience the convenience of Leaf

What do we mean by convenience? 

Well, 200 blades for Leaf fit in the same footprint as 4 traditional cartridges. That's incredible!

It also means that replacement blades are always there when you need them.

You don't need to keep using old, worn-out, cartridges just because you forgot a trip to the store, or because the UPS guy hasn't shown up yet.

The Leaf Razor is not a shave club - because we believe that you need to OWN your shave, not RENT your shave.
column5:
>

Watch how to load the Leaf Razor!
column7:
showinfo=0"">

HOW ARE THE BLADES SO CHEAP? 

Leaf uses 1/2 of any standard Double-Edge (DE) blade. There are dozens of options easily available at pharmacies or online (e.g. Amazon), including the Leaf preferred blade which will be supplied on our website after campaign close, and with each of our pledge levels. 

This is a DE blade
column8:
>

This is how you snap a DE blade into two halves within it's existing packaging. Easy!
column12: '>Each of these blade edges costs as little as 5 cents per piece. So count it out with us...
column14:
showinfo=0"">

 

Tapered Exposure System

Tapered Exposure is what we call our proprietary tapering of the blade aggressiveness. Check out the diagram below - it shows examples of what you can achieve when you have the flexibility to place each blade individually! 

One might use the most aggressive position to remove hair with the grain, but disengage the first blade (check out the third configuration from the left) and shave against the grain with a less aggressive, comfortable, shave.

column5:
>

 

First, we designed for function...

Shaving razors involve putting a blade to your skin and dragging it along, balancing comfort, cutting ability, blade longevity, aggressiveness and speed among many factors. 

Our early prototyping focused on getting the razor head portion right, including adjusting blade exposure and position, gap, angle-of-attack, and mounting. Throughout these early iterations we not only learned how to control these factors, but how to manage other important features like fluid flow through the design. 

We kept our eyes on how each design iteration affected rinse-ability, especially as we started stacking in first two, then three blades through our proprietary technology. 

Because we are both engineers, our ability to quickly iterate and hone in on the right design while balancing the myriad of features that are important for a shaving razor allowed us to create the Leaf Razor.
column6:
>

 Then, we designed for form.

We knew that we could make a quality razor that delivered the experience we envisioned at the start of this project.

Leaf is designed to be shown. It's an organic work of art crafted to sit comfortably in any bathroom around the world. Leaf's all-metal, weighted construction, is precisely balanced in your hands.
column7:
>

But we also wanted to create a really good looking razor, one that we would be happy displaying out in the open.

column2: surveys sent out to confirm backers' desired finish option (chrome/black/white)

column1: December: Production process continues, transitions to die-casting and assembly, continual quality inspection process

column2: surveys sent out to confirm backers' shipping information

column1:
Thank you, really, for all of the support. We believe in a simple mission: Create products that have insane value and get it out to as many people as we can. Shaving might be a chore for many, but there's no reason that we can't keep moving the art forward and finding better ways to you looking your best and feeling confident. 

ABOUT THE FOUNDERS 

The Leaf Shave Company was founded by two Adams who desire to infuse true product innovation into shaving technology. Both come from complimentary backgrounds in engineering, product development and business with the necessary skills and track record to successfully bring a product like the Leaf razor to market. 

Adam Hahn

Adam H. is an accomplished engineer with over ten years of experience in the medical device field. Serving in such roles as Director of Mechanical Engineering and Principle Mechanical Engineer, Adam brings a wealth of both down-and-dirty hands on mechanical engineering, prototyping and product launch with a balance of managing large-scale engineering projects through design and manufacturing. Adam was raised, educated and remains loyal to Pittsburgh, PA - having received his bachelor and master degrees in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Pittsburgh. Adam is a licensed Professional Engineer in the state of PA. 

Adam Simone

Adam S. is the other Adam on the Leaf team. Adam brings to the table a consumer product mechanical engineering background from Boston, MA (BS Mechanical Engineering, Northeastern University). Adam also holds a graduate business degree in Biotechnology and Management from Carnegie Mellon University (Pittsburgh, PA). He has worked at giant consumer packaged goods companies and small product development firms. Most recently, Adam ran the marketing department for a medical device start-up - bringing two multi-million dollar products to commercial success.
column2:
> 

The fine print

International Backers

We're excited to get the Leaf Razor into as many hands world-wide as we can. Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

Returns

We only replace your Leaf Razor if it is defective or arrives damaged, not due to mis-use. Once we receive your returned product we will review it and notify you of it being accepted or rejected for replacement. If you need to contact us for questions please email hello@leafshave.com. 

You have 15 days from the time of receipt to request a refund. If you would, at that time, like to return your Leaf Razor please email orders@leafshave.com for instructions and a return authorization number. To be eligible for a return your product must be in the same condition as when you received it, and must be returned in it's original product packaging. All returns will be subject to a 20% restocking fee. 

You will be responsible for paying for shipping to return your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. We encourage you to use a trackable shipping method as we cannot issue your refund until we have received your merchandise.

Need help? Have questions?

We're here for you! Just drop us an email at hello@leafshave.com and we'll get back to you with an answer as soon as possible. 

The Leaf Razor is patent pending.

A new smart home touchscreen deadbolt for your door. And your personal concierge.

Founded in 2017, Alfred is a company dedicated to using the best technology to make life at home as safe and comfortable as possible. Beginning with our DB2 and DB2-B smart home touch screen deadbolt locks, we’ll soon expand our line to include a variety of smart home products.
More than just a pretty faceplate. Alfred’s looks and functionality open a world of possibilities for any door.

Chrome, gold or black finishes
to match your style and décor.
Alfred adapts to any home or personality. Choose from a variety of different styles and finishes to suit your taste.
Not just any lock. Alfred comes packed with features that make coming and going feel like nothing at all.

Know who is entering your house and when. Alfred is bump proof, with no cylinder to pick. Built with hardened steel for enhanced security. Intertek 20 minute fire rated (coming soon). Alfred meets all residential and high-rise codes.
Your smart phone is the smart key. Lock or unlock from anywhere with the Alfred app, and easily see who is coming and going for complete control over your home.
Our DB2-B lock offers optional keyed entry, in addition to the keypad. Just a little added piece of mind, should you need it.
The Alfred app makes it incredibly easy to connect with Google Home and Alexa on most iOS and Android devices.

All you need is a screwdriver and a few minutes of free time to install an Alfred lock in your home. Not a handyperson? Our comprehensive installation video will walk you through every simple step until you’re locked and ready.

Help Easton Mountain get a new POOL! 

The pool at Easton Mountain is a place to hang out with friends, savor the sun, escape the summer heat with a swim, or let out your inner child! We all have so many wonderful memories of enjoying the pool at Easton, and we need your help to make sure we can keep creating new ones. 

What happened to the old pool?

Sadly, the extreme weather conditions this winter destroyed Easton's current pool, leaving it beyond repair. Happily, this is a wonderful opportunity for an upgrade..! 

The Plan!

The plan is to purchase a bigger, sturdier and all-around better pool that will be put into the ground where the current volley ball court is. Overtime, we will build a beautiful deck around the new pool. The current pool deck will be restored creating more outdoor space to be used for workshops, yoga, dining, and more. Moving the pool away from the main lodge also means that fun pool time can happen all day without disturbing workshops taking place in the Great Room. This improvement will have a huge impact on what Easton has to offer, and we'll get to enjoy it all summer long, and beyond!

This Bed, Bath and A Carport
Campaign is very personal to me because each affects my quality of life in a different and significant way. Let's begin with the Bed: Currently I sleep on a twin
sized hospital bed with a VERY hard plastic mattress and a gel overlay.
The overlay has a 2 1/2 foot long and 1 1/2 foot wide sunken area that I
continually have to fill to experience a decent night's sleep. Damaged muscles makes sleeping even more difficult.  Haven't had a full, comfortable or sound night's sleep in soooooo many, many months. :-/
A Bath: It would be incredible to be able to step into my own shower on my own and enjoy a nice, relaxing and cleansing shower without needing assistance. I REALLY miss that. :-(

The Carport: Becomes a terrible hazard to/for me when there's a hard
rain...it floods all the way up to my ramp entrance. In winter when snow melts
or there is a winter rain and it freezes it turns into a small ice rink, which
makes it impossible for me to walk to my vehicle from the ramp. I already need help
walking to the car and on regular surfaces of any kind so that kinda rules out ice skating. :-)

I need $4,700. to purchase a full sized adjustable bed with a mattress that does
not sink in and so I can be able to turn over without the fear of falling because my muscles are so weakened it is a real event to try to turnover. More importantly, so I can begin to experience a full , restful and healthful night's sleep.

I Need A Walk In Shower: To replace the tub because I cannot get in it. A walk in
shower kit will be purchased and installed. This will give me the ability, safety and security to get in my own shower and enjoy being able to shower on my own again.

A CARPORT: The outer wall of my carport needs to be rebuilt and reinforced to prevent water and melted snow from seeping over and filling the entire area with water or ice, based on the weather. Treated 1/2 inch plywood, tile rubber, 2x4's and so on to complete this project. In addition to labor costs for each project.

The Impact:

In complete and total honesty I have to say there would be no words that would be able to describe or explain the impact the completion of these 3 projects would have on me and on my life. 'THANK YOU' would not touch the depth of my gratitude. It would be extremely transforming for me.

","This Bed, Bath and A CarportCampaign is very personal to me because each affects my quality of life in a different and significant way. Let's begin with the Bed: Currently I sleep on a twinsized hospital bed with a VERY hard plastic mattress and a gel overlay.The overlay has a 2 1/2 foot long and 1 1/2 foot wide sunken area that Icontinually have to fill to experience a decent night's sleep. Damaged muscles makes sleeping even more difficult.  Haven't had a full, comfortable or sound night's sleep in soooooo many, many months. :-/
A Bath: It would be incredible to be able to step into my own shower on my own and enjoy a nice, relaxing and cleansing shower without needing assistance. I REALLY miss that. :-(

The Carport: Becomes a terrible hazard to/for me when there's a hardrain...it floods all the way up to my ramp entrance. In winter when snow meltsor there is a winter rain and it freezes it turns into a small ice rink, whichmakes it impossible for me to walk to my vehicle from the ramp. I already need helpwalking to the car and on regular surfaces of any kind so that kinda rules out ice skating. :-)

I need $4,700. to purchase a full sized adjustable bed with a mattress that doesnot sink in and so I can be able to turn over without the fear of falling because my muscles are so weakened it is a real event to try to turnover. More importantly, so I can begin to experience a full , restful and healthful night's sleep.

I Need A Walk In Shower: To replace the tub because I cannot get in it. A walk inshower kit will be purchased and installed. This will give me the ability, safety and security to get in my own shower and enjoy being able to shower on my own again.

Treated 1/2 inch plywood, tile rubber, 2x4's and so on to complete this project. In addition to labor costs for each project.

Customize Your Pillow for a perfect night’s sleep. It's as easy as turning three dials.

The P3 will change the way people think about pillows. Our user testing has shown that people on the P3 have reduced neck pain, increased sleep duration and quality and improved day time arousal. The P3 treats you whilst you sleep.

We strove to create an ideal solution in a simple, comfortable pillow which will suit nearly all users (99.5%) whilst conforming to current linen sizes so that it seamlessly blends into your current sleeping environment. It is a unique, custom fitted pillow system that supports and facilitates an optimal sleep.

With an inner adjustable orthotic device and a quality external foam pillow shell, the P3 pillow is both practical and comfortable. The orthotic has three adjustable sections. Two with 2.75""  (70mm) adjustment and one with 2""(50mm). It uses three BOA dials for micro adjustability.
The P3 pillow can be adjusted by a health professional or by the user to ensure the correct height/posture for both side lying and supine sleeping.
Every P3 pillow comes with a quick installation guide and a measuring tool so that your P3 can be set to your optimal sleeping position(s).
The P3’s unique design also facilitates rolling from supine to side lying via a winged angle (30°). This reduces the “shoulder lift and roll” required for posture transition seen by most sleepers.

With the average height required for back sleeping 3.1"" (80 mm), and the average height required for side-sleeping 4.3"" (110mm), (plus height variations) it was essential to develop a pillow that could support the neck in three main sleep positions.
Figure above shows an end a cross sectional view of how the pillow increases height.

Unlike single-height pillows currently in the marketplace, the adjustable P3 pillow becomes integrated with each individual, to ensure a restful and pain-reduced sleep. The P3 has been supported through x-ray testing and user trials. It stands out as a leader in the ability to provide a tailored therapeutic sleep solution. The developers of the P3 pillow have partnered with leading manufacturers and design engineers to bring you a pillow revolution.

We have been developing and testing the P3 since 2009. The idea came from the founders, experienced musculoskeletal physiotherapists/physical therapists. Every day health practitioners like us treat spinal conditions and we are asked for pillow and bed recommendation. It was frustrating that the pillow market did not offer a suitable pillow which we could confidently recommend.
• 86.6% of people would prefer recommendation and pillow fitting by a health professional
• 79.2% people surveyed do not feel that they get adequate support by their pillow.
• 78.8% of people experience some form of neck discomfort at least once per month and 16.9% will have daily/nightly pain whilst in bed. [1]

User trials and radiological measurements have shown the P3 pillow can be prescribed to significantly assist people with neck pain or sleep issues. Our trial showed a 28.5% reduction in sleep issues on a modified Pittsburgh sleep questionnaire along with improved daytime alertness and increased sleep quality and a statistically significant decrease in neck pain after using the P3 for seven days.
The shell and foam structure was designed using a 5000-person dataset to ensure most body shapes and sizes were catered for. Our pillow suits 99.5% of body shapes.

By combining the accuracy of a health professional's understanding of their clients’ needs with the technology of the P3’s inner orthotic and foam properties, we can now offer an ideal sleep solution. Recent research has shown that normal therapeutic contour pillows do not significantly improve neck/spinal position in side lying (Gordon et al, Journal of Multidisciplinary Healthcare 2011:4 321–327). The P3 pillow adjusts height rather than contour, which is shown on x-ray analysis to deliver posture changes. All it takes is three measurements, and three turns of the dials, and approximately three minutes to tailor each P3 pillow to its user’s requirements.

The inner shell of the P3 Pillow incorporates a state-of-the-art dial system supplied by BOA Technologies. This innovation provides continually variable tensioning control, which ensures all adjustments can be made quickly and easily.

The dial system is integrated with a measurement tool which is supplied with the pillow to ensure an accurate prescription. The adjustment height has a range of 3.14"" (70 mm) in three separate zones: base, and each wing section. Each of the straps can sustain 176lbs (80kg) of pressure (head weight is 11lbs). To adjust the height one simply tensions the dial to the corresponding numbers on the prescription tool provided. The P3 has in built stabilising bars to stop any under-surface rocking.
• Pillow height 3.6"" - 6.2""  (92 - 160mm or 70 mm of adjustment)
• The outer foam should be replaced after 3 years. After online registration, the P3 website can generate auto reminders for users to change their foam when required.
•The shell is made from medical-grade polypropylene.
• The P3 uses state-of-the-art, low abrasion lacing.

“I wanted to give you some feedback on your pillow that I have been sleeping on now for several months. Before I started using your pillow I was suffering from a severe lack of sleep, waking several times throughout the night and having extreme trouble getting back to sleep, usually averaging about three to four hours of sleep throughout the night. I also suffered from neck pain and headaches. This is something I have been enduring for more years than I would like to count. Over the years I have tried numerous types of pillows with varying degrees of help. I am now happy to say that my sleep pattern has improved considerably and I now average six to eight hours sleep a night, and when I do wake throughout the night I generally have no trouble getting back to sleep. My neck pain and headaches have greatly reduced and I do not remember the last time I woke up with neck pain. I would not hesitate to recommend this pillow to anyone, and in fact have told many friends and associates about it.""  Megan
We have received many glowing testimonials like Megan's ....
1. The P3 is a guaranteed perfect biomechanical pillow solution for side and back sleepers which can be prescribed, set and re- adjusted by the user or their healthcare professional.
2. The P3 is innovative in design and caters for users of all ages.

3. The fully adjustable orthotic core ensures spinal alignment in side lying and supine (on back) positions allowing the muscles to relax and relieve irritated, inflamed, and degenerative and arthritic joints.
4. The shoulder side of the P3 pillow is specifically cut out allowing the pillow to support the neck for optimal comfort.
5. The P3 is specially designed to seamlessly roll with the user when they turn in their sleep.
We’ve been working on the P3 for over 3 years now. We have done the prototyping and all user testing. It is now ready for production.
The P3 that you see in the video is a real, working version.
With your support, we can bring the P3 onto beds worldwide. We have come this far and have created a great pillow. Your contribution will see a great product get to people who need it by funding:
• Setting up of a US based distribution and assembly site
• Additional sleep lab testing to complete FDA/TGA certification for neck pain and sleep apnoea
• Establish a global distribution network to all good health practitioner clinics and retail stores.

Q. How do I know how high to make the pillow in each position?    A.  We supply you with a 6 step guide to setting the pillow. It will take less than 3 minutes. It is best to have someone else there just to take your measurements.

Q. How long does will the pillow last?    A. The orthotic inner shell will last in excess of 10 years. The foam can show some compression with time and, as with all foam pillows, we suggest you change them every few years. We have developed replacement foam which can be purchased.

Q. What dials are you using?    A. We are using BOA dials which are seen in all the high end outdoor wear such as snowboarding boots, cycling shoes. BOA has refined dial technology and we worked in conjunction with their product engineers. The dials will have a lifetime guarantee and can be easily replaced in the event of one malfunctioning.

Q. I sleep on my stomach, is the P3 suitable?    A. Sleeping on your stomach is not a recommended position. Usually if someone sleeps the entire night on their stomach only it is recommended that they use either a very low pillow or no pillow at all. The P3 can be set for super low

Q. What if I change mattresses or move between beds?    A. Yes, great question. If you change your sleeping surface it will sometimes alter the depth your shoulder drops down- because you don’t need to take the shell out of the pillow and the dials are easy to access we recommend fine tuning the dials to get maximal comfort. Our recommendation with the measuring tool is the starting position for a medium firmness bed- it may take one or two little tweaks of the dial to get your ideal position if you have a very hard or soft mattress.

Q. I see a Chiropractor, Osteopath or Physical Therapist for my neck can they help?    A. We have an online training accreditation system for health professionals to guide them through the advanced configuration of the P3. Direct your health professional to our website and they can undertake the eLearning module. After completing this they are accredited in the fitting and supply of the P3. We will link them to our website as “preferred fitters”

Q. Can I replace the outer foam? A. Yes, it is recommended to change the foam every 2- 3 years to keep the P3 as supportive and as comfortable. The foam can be purchased online or through health accredited health care providers.
[1]Tricycle Market research- Two market research studies n= 200 , n=198 2011

We understand if you  can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help us: share or tweet this project with people you know have neck pain or trouble sleeping, like and share us on Facebook (http://www.facebook.com/P3pillow) and share us with fellow Indiegogo users.
Help us take a tested product to those that need it- helping the world sleep a little easier.

About this project

Sunbathing on the beach, resting at stunning site viewing spots during hikes, enjoying BBQs at great summer picnic sites, or simply hanging out at our own backyard having a drink in a warm sunny day…… What a life! 

However, dragging a heavy beach chair or laying on towels on hard ground are pain in the ass
column2: carrying chairs for few hours for a hike stop is not resting
column3: spending hours inflating and deflating air bed is so tiring!

column1: We have the very ultimate affordable solution and want to share it to all – AVA aircouch!

It’s easy inflation and deflation. Simply open the AVA aircouch from the bag, wind in air from the open edge and seal it, your AVA aircouch is ready for use. To take it down, you only need to unseal it and fold the air out, and your AVA aircouch is readily to be deflated back to its original compact size.

It’s the most affordable comfort aircouch to maximize your relaxation. Order it now with Indiegogo early birds and special rates, you will get AVA aircouch shipped to your door this summer. Be ready to say goodbye to heavy beach chairs and stiff surface mats.

It is multi-purpose. AVA aircouch can be enjoyed indoor and outdoor. It works well on many different surfaces, grass, hard ground, sandy beach, wood deck, ceramic pool edge, rocky area, carpet, etc. You can even use it in your pool.

It’s multi-functional. AVA aircouch is a wonderful soft-hold beach chair, you can enjoy it solo or sharing the seat with friends and families. Use it indoor, it’s an air inflated lazyboy and great for temporary seating or basement use.
The AVA aircouch comes in four beautiful colors

Risks and challenges

Quality Control. We might make fun of ourselves here and there, but we are entirely serious when it comes to the quality of our products. There is always the risk that we won’t be satisfied with result of a final production sample. In that case, additional iterations or improvement of the manufacturing process might be necessary. This is a rather unlikely scenario
column2:
however, it could delay the manufacturing process.

We know that good communication and transparency is the key to an awesome and fun project. While unforeseen issues can always arise, we won’t be making the same mistakes twice. And if we do run into any problems along the way, our backers will be the first to know!

More photos

Our story and desire to light Africa

When LightSeed Energy co-founder Michael Pietrzak was working in a refugee camp in Malawi five years ago, he was invited into a man's home to talk about a problem that he was having. Something from that meeting stayed with him: Michael was sitting five feet from his host and could not see his face, even though it was the middle of the day. Michael could only imagine how dark it would get at night, and how difficult his own life would be without light.
After doing some research, Michael found that 85% of Africans have no access to electricity, creating major health, economic and environmental problems.
1) 400,000 Africans die prematurely each year due to indoor air pollution caused by traditional fuels like kerosene and charcoal.
2) Those without electricity spend up to 30% of their income on traditional fuels like kerosene and charcoal.
3) Traditional fuels contribute to climate change and deforestation, affecting all of us on our fragile planet.
Michael decided to do something and that is when LightSeed Energy was born. LightSeed Energy provides solar systems to families in Africa without access to the electrical grid.
Supplying families with solar energy in Africa has proven benefits.
1) The use of solar lamps reduces indoor and environmental pollution significantly.
2) Solar energy is cheaper to obtain and maintain, helping families own affordable solar lighting and increase their household income by as much as 50%.
3) Solar light allows children to study safely, helping them improve grades and giving them more opportunities.
Your donation will provide students the opportunity to study at night with a healthier and more sustainable solar lamp.
The cost to purchase and distribute each solar lamp is $10, so your $30 contribution can light up a family’s home.

But it does not stop here. This first project is only the beginning of a global energy revolution. Our goal is to eradicate energy poverty in Africa by 2030, by placing solar energy in the hands of every African without access to electricity.

Minus the $3,000 that was required to film our crowfunding video and Indiegogo's fees, all of the money raised from this campaign will go towards purchasing and distribution of solar lamps to students in Zambia. LightSeed Energy co-founders plan to fly to Zambia in April 2014 to distribute all solar lamps to the students in need (paying for their own flights, expenses and accommodations).
The solar lamp in question is the d.light S2 – a solar powered lamp that will last for five years on average. (http://www.dlightdesign.com/productline/s2/)

At LightSeed Energy, we want you to be a part of the global movement to eradicate energy poverty. Check out our perks list on the right that will engage you and help you interact with the Zambian communities that we are helping.
If we do not raise the entire $30,000 for this project, we will still carry it out on a smaller scale.
More donations = more solar lamps for more students.
Be part of sending solar lights to students in Africa. Share LightSeed Energy with your friends and let’s get entire communities out of the dark.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/lightseedenergy

Note: donors are not charged taxes on their donations.

At LightSeed Energy, we want you to be a part of the global movement to eradicate energy poverty. Check out our perks list on the right that will engage you and help you interact with the Zambian communities that we are helping.
If we do not raise the entire $30,000 for this project, we will still carry it out on a smaller scale.
More donations = more solar lamps for more students.
Be part of sending solar lights to students in Africa. Share LightSeed Energy with your friends and let’s get entire communities out of the dark.
Twitter: https://twitter.com/lightseedenergyNote: donors are not charged taxes on their donations.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

We are a two man very complementary team(more information about us www.wemih.com), with business, startups and software backgrounds and a mesmerizing energy. We speak German, French, English and Italian. We believe in what we do, and we know that will be something big. Be part of the history and let's together give a run to innovation. The product is supposed to be rolled out worldwide, every where we have corporates with a wide-spread impact and parallel entry points. We want to launch first in Europe, then in the USA. Our prototype will be our proof-of-concept. We know that our future customers would be willing to move due to the huge financial benefit and our better approaches. We look forward to create jobs in developing countries for people with an university degree and without position. We are proud to say that our solution is eco-friendly. That was an important point for us, due to its upcoming worldwide expansion. Our solution uses simple, common means to solve nowadays complex problems. We also focused on the reusability by implementing our solution. Have a look on our demonstrator on http://www.itascha.org/reporter to experience the functionalities of our product and just contact us if you have questions. We'll explain that functionalities in upcoming threads. Please be aware that the application will be sometimes not available, for a short time, due to new deployments. We need 2.000€ for a minimal prototype, on the most common cash register types. The bigger the sum we raise, the more complex and more general is our prototype. Our prototype will simulate the communication between cash registers and smart phones.

With the 2.000€ we would like to raise, we aim to buy common cash registers within the food trade area in Europe and simulate our smart phone application with them. According to our business strategy we'll start focusing on a single business area and roll out over the other areas step by step. We'll start with the food area because our solution here would be easier to implement and also because of the very big number of potential customers. That prototype should also test the main cash registers on supermarkets. That common registers has a Linux operating system (e.g. Genivi) which doesn't requires a big RAM and without devices manager, an Oracle data base or an embedded Sqlite data base, no SSD, no SATA, cheap hardware components. It may be also that we have to buy specific accessories for specific smart phones or specific cash registers. Per default we plan to use the ones delivered by the smart phone or the registers manufacturer.
Please be aware on the amazing perks!.
If we can't raise the 2.000€, then we'll first iterate and check what's going wrong in our concept. After that we'll use the money we raised to get involved (travel costs, etc).
We are interested on feedbacks and interesting threads

By means that blog, we are not only interested on raising money to start to implement our prototype. We also have a huge focus on the big Indiegogo community and the firsts feedback we'll become from it. Our project is a general concept and it's fine tuned for specific use cases, which are mostly market specific. The worldwide Indiegogo community could help us checking if we didn't forgot specific use cases, for specific markets. Furthermore discussing about common use cases and our related approachs would also help us may be to better iterate and the world to become the best possible product

Meet Roccbox - the easy to use, 930°F (500°C) oven that cooks restaurant quality pizza in just 90 seconds and so much more.

Roccbox is a portable, lightweight, wood and gas fired stone floor oven. It cooks beautiful Neapolitan pizza in under 90 seconds as well as an unlimited number of your favourite meat, fish and vegetable dishes. Until now, wood fired ovens have only been accessible to those with a big budget and permanent, outdoor space. Roccbox solves these problems and brings authentic wood and gas fired cooking to everybody. Take Roccbox with you camping, to the forest, on the beach or use it in your back garden. You’ll be able to achieve unbeatable cooking results anytime, anywhere.

Wood fired cooking is all about excitement, theatre and amazing flavour.  There is a reason why artisan 'stone bake' restaurants are on the rise! It is a creative and addictive way to share social time with friends and family and we believe that once you taste the results, it’ll change the way you cook and socialise forever.

column4: >a full-size oven, without any compromise on speed or power.

column1: Traditional stone floor ovens are large, heavy and take a long time to heat up. They are also pretty expensive which means that most people don’t get to enjoy the incredible food they create.

Roccbox is powerful enough to reach up to 930°F (500°C) in as little as 15 minutes. It is small enough to transport and comes with both a wood and gas burner so you can choose which style of authentic high-heat cooking suits you.

""I wanted to take the hard work out of wood fired cooking. Making it possible for anyone to own a stone bake oven with even the smallest outdoor space and a limited budget has been a dream of mine since I started The Stone Bake Oven Company 6 years ago.

My commercial wood and gas fired oven business, Gozney Ovens is the UK’s market leader. Seeing the unbeatable results produced from my commercial ovens when using the highest quality, commercial-grade materials meant that nothing was compromised during the design and manufacturing of Roccbox.  The cooking results rival that of my commercial ovens without a doubt!""

Once you have mastered the art of 90 second Neapolitan pizza, you’ll probably want to explore Roccbox’s versatility. Whether roasting vegetables, caramelising meat or crisping up fish and fluffy breads, Roccbox will leave you with a completely unforgettable taste experience.

The real magic is in the finishing. In Roccbox, you have the ability to cook at temperatures much higher than a conventional oven and this is the key to the unique textures and flavours you'll now be able to create at home. We think that these unbeatable results are the reason that anyone who tries the food produced falls in love with Roccbox instantly.
Originating from Naples in Italy, Neapolitan pizza is regarded the best in the world. It has a super light, fluffy rise with crispy, charred spots and ideally made with a good sourdough.

A temperature of 930°F  (500°C) is required in order to achieve the optimum pizza cooking environment. Roccbox’s porous stone floor crisps up the pizza from the base up whilst the rolling flame cooks the pizza top down resulting in an exceptionally quick and evenly cooked pizza.

The mark of a true Neapolitan pizza is the speed it is cooked. In Roccbox, it takes about 90 seconds to achieve. All you need to do is rotate your pizza a couple of times throughout to ensure a thoroughly even cook.
Don't believe it? Watch Roccbox's founder, Tom cook a 90 second Neapolitan pizza in this one-take video!
Checkout the 'un-chopped' footage from each camera on Youtube.
Blitz fish skin to crisp, crunchy perfection.

Fish and seafood dishes cook beautifully and effortlessly in Roccbox. The intensely dry heat will cook your fish dishes through in no time whilst locking in moisture, keeping the fish succulent. But it is the perfectly crisp skin that really steals the show - achieved in a way that no conventional oven ever could! Dishes such as garlic king prawns and hot smoked salmon can be produced within minutes, the rolling flame licking the food leaving behind a mouth-watering, unique flavour.

Crispy crackling, tender, juicy steaks and deliciously caramelised roasting joints can all be achieved simply and easily in Roccbox. Cook perfect steaks every time on a cast iron griddle pan. The high heat will brown and caramelise the exterior of the steak whilst it cooks through to your preference. You can also reduce the heat a little lower to roast your meat over a longer period of time for dishes such as aromatic, herb-infused spatchcock chicken. Just don’t forget to whack up the heat for the last few minutes to crisp up that beautifully herby, oily skin – you’ll never want to roast in your conventional oven ever again!

Roccbox’s porous stone floor lends itself perfectly to baking breads, ensuring a perfectly crisp crust every time. Ideal for creating flatbreads out of your leftover pizza dough or favourite artisan recipe, the high heat cooking environment means your dough will rise to beautifully fluffy loaves within seconds, not forgetting the delicious charring and spotting that is only achievable by authentic stone baking. Use Roccbox at a lower temperature to bake your flatbreads, remove from the oven and stuff with your favourite cheeses and cured meats. Place back in the oven to toast and melt down for a mouth-watering, stone baked, deli style sandwich - you’ll never want to buy a shop bought snack ever again!

The intense cooking environment of Roccbox is ideal for crafting impossibly tasty vegetable dishes. Soft and sticky sweet potato wedges, crisp and caramelised Mediterranean vegetables and deliciously seared asparagus are all incredibly quick and simple to execute. The high heat environment will rapidly cook the food through whilst the rolling flame will catch the edges of your vegetables leaving behind the crispy charring that make roasted vegetable dishes irresistible.

Whether using wood or gas, the burner attaches to the underside of Roccbox's body. Once it is lit, all of the thermal elements (dome insulation, stone floor and under floor insulation deck) begin to store and radiate heat, saturating it evenly throughout the oven. This creates a unique, consistent cooking environment closely mirroring that of a traditional stone bake oven.

column2: >This all sounds great, but is it safe?

column1: The Roccbox team have an extensive background in commercial oven design and engineering and we take safety extremely seriously. Cooking in Roccbox is a unique style of cooking but is very safe and you’ll have it mastered in no time. Our comprehensive user manual will cover the dos and don’ts and absolutely everything in between from safely firing up the oven, to handling the oven after use. We have worked exceptionally hard and have taken considerable care to ensure that Roccbox is as safe to use as any BBQ you’ll find on the market! We will of course meet all the relevant safety standards and certifications in each country that we ship to.
Light enough for one person to carry.

Portability is key issue with traditional stone ovens. Yet the reason they work so well is down to their thermal mass (which equates to weight). We knew therefore that Roccbox had to be balanced carefully in order to achieve its mission. Dense enough to work effectively but light enough for one person to carry. After almost 100 material and composition variations, we've got it just right. The handy carry strap we have designed means that lifting Roccbox out of its box is a breeze and at just 20kg, Roccbox can be carried short distances single handedly ready to pop up wherever you chose!
Heats up to 930°F in as little as 15 minutes.

column2: >Roccbox is portable, lightweight and compact resulting in ultimate convenience. However, all of these features would be wasted if it took too long for the oven to get up to cooking temperature. Unlike a conventional BBQ where you may have to wait in excess of an hour, Roccbox will reach the optimum pizza cooking temperature of 930°F (500°c) in as little as 15 minutes. Whether you are cooking with uber convenient gas or going for a totally traditional wood fired cook, with as little as 15 minutes to wait you’ll have more time to concentrate on socialising with family and friends and eating great food, which is what Roccbox is all about!

>Do you like to make a statement and stand out from the crowd? We have no doubt our striking Grass Green Roccbox is the one you’ll choose. It has become our iconic statement colour over the past few years and we know you are going to go crazy for it! If you tend to opt for the slightly understated look and prefer your gadgets a little more sleek and stealth-like, don’t worry we’ve got you covered! Our Stone Grey is simple, dramatic and effortlessly cool.
>Everything you need to get started is in the box.

>We want everyone who receives a Roccbox to be able to get outside and get cooking as soon as they receive it meaning we have filled the box with absolutely everything you are going to need to get started.
>Roccbox Oven in Grey or Green with under-floor, built in thermometer
>Carry Strap (to aid lifting Roccbox out of the box)
>Roccbox Bottle Opener (a handy tool that can also be used to open the wood hopper!)
>Watch Roccbox's founder, Tom explain what's in the box...

>Originally, both burners were going to be sold as separate products. However, during the testing stages of Roccbox, we soon realised that both wood and gas offer a unique cooking experience that everyone should be able to experience right out of the box. All customers will receive both a wood and a gas burner, with hose.

>Roccbox’s gas burner was a challenging component to get right. Although skilfully designed, it is the more simplistic of the two burners in terms of operational use and maintenance. You simply can't beat the consistency or convenience of a constant, regulated flame when optimising an environment for cooking Simply turn the gas burner on and adjust the temperature to suit your cooking style.

>Roccbox’s wood burner is an engineering masterpiece and was the most challenging part of creating Roccbox. The wood burner is constructed of three layers of stainless steel, the outer most layer being perforated to prevent intense heat build up. The entire burner has been designed to draw air through its body, creating an intense flame with a secondary combustion that has all the power of a mini jet flame without the need of a power sourceIt really is a pretty cool piece of engineering!

column1: Using the wood burner is a much more traditional process, but a uniquely rewarding one. Roccbox wouldn't be true to its roots without a sustainable fuel option and we think the authentic flavour that wood fired cooking brings to all dishes is more than worth the effort. Kiln dried, hardwood kindling is our recommended fuel of choice and you can even experiment with different wood types to achieve variations in flavour.

column3: >Check out some of our prototype burners here

column1: The Roccbox pizza peel was designed to be ergonomic, lightweight, beautiful and functional. It is made from pressed aluminium and has tapered edges to ensure smooth transitions as your pizza is moved from its preparation surface to peel, from peel into the oven. The perforations in the peel allow for any excess flour to escape before placing the pizza into the oven because burnt flour on the underside of your pizza tastes bad and looks even worse!

Getting the stone floor right was crucial to the success of Roccbox. We went through countless variations to get the right balance of density and porosity to ensure the stone performed excellently and created delicious pizza.  Once saturated with heat, Roccbox's cordierite stone absorbs moisture whilst cooking from the bottom up, creating the signature leopard spotted bases associated with an authentic Neapolitan style pizza.

We are confident you will be able to enjoy Roccbox with your family and friends without a hitch. However, to cover our valued customers from any unlikely and unforeseen manufacturing defects or faults, every Roccbox comes with a 1 year warranty.

We have come this far (see our roadmap below to see just quite how far!) and we are now at the point where we need to enrol your help to get Roccbox over the line! In order to kick start the production of Roccbox and fund our first batch of stock, we are asking for contributors to place their orders meaning we will be able to bring Roccbox to you sooner and fulfil orders from June 2016.
What’s in it for you guys? Unbeatable, exclusive discounts off the RRP and an exceptional product that we guarantee will revolutionise the way you cook and socialise for the better!

Why should you trust us? Our founding investors have spent £250,000 on development so far, we’re safety certified and our factory is ready to roll. Our team has an outstanding track record for creating innovative wood and gas fired oven products that have disrupted the outdoor cooking market in a big, big way. Our exceptional expertise in engineering and design, remarkable customer service and undeniable work ethic will ensure that your order is in the best of hands - you won’t be disappointed.

We have appointed only the best manufacturing and production partners who adopt the very same attention to detail that we do and who share the same enthusiasm and excitement for getting Roccbox to you. Our factory has the capacity to create 300 units per day which we hope reassures you that we really mean business!
Your contributions and continued support will bring Roccbox off the production line and into gardens, beaches, parks and campsites all over the world - that is pretty special!

Here is a rare snapshot of just a handful of the Roccbox team. These guys are responsible for putting together our Indiegogo campagin. They form part of a much larger Roccbox family, some of whom you can read more about below.

Roccbox is the brainchild of Tom, created back in 2012. When Tom isn’t embarking upon his next entrepreneurial endeavour or managing his multiple successful businesses, he loves to cook for his friends and family – he is a total foodie and all-round caveman. Tom’s vision was as clear as day every step of the way throughout the Roccbox design process and he has refused to compromise on any element. Now that the launch is in sight, he can’t wait to share Roccbox with the world.

Joining the Roccbox team as a Project Coordinator last year, Marcus really has become our jack of all trades (and master of all of them!) Firstly brought on to coordinate the production process before branching out into all areas of Roccbox’s development, Marcus has been involved in absolutely every element of Roccbox behind the scenes, driving everything forward whilst also being Roccbox’s first point of contact. Chances are, if you’ve reached out to the team before, you know who Marcus is!

Known informally as ‘G’ throughout the team and part of Roccbox from the very early days, Georgia provides full support to Tom and his staff. From chairing team meetings, to jumping in when times get hectic, project coordinating and cracking the whip where necessary, she has kept everyone on track ensuring we are all working to Tom’s ultimate goal of bringing Roccbox to market!

We know each and every one of you has been ooh-ing and ah-ing over our incredible visuals and super slick website. Well, Rich is the man to thank for that! Part of the Roccbox team from the very beginning, with an extensive background in design and illustration and founder of his own digital design agency, Rich has been an invaluable asset in conveying our vision to the masses and communicating our mission digitally.

Part of the team from day one, Laura has been an integral cog in the Roccbox machine since the early days. From the early concept drawings, right the way through to factory visits, Laura brings to the team the unique balance of creativity and brains that have helped get Roccbox through every development hurdle it has faced!

column2: without them Roccbox simply wouldn’t exist! Patrick's wealth of experience in engineering and design, combined with Mike’s patience of a saint, profound skill as a product designer and draftsman means that each and every element of Roccbox has been considered by them, right down to the last rivet. What Paul brings to the mix is the ability to visualise Roccbox whilst everyone else is caught up in the nuts and bolts of it. He’s a CGI artist and really brought Roccbox to life when it was just drawings on scraps of paper!

column1: All round intellectual and food enthusiast, Geoff has been driving the research and development of Roccbox forward at full speed as well as managing the production of our video and photographic content for this campaign.  What else is there to say about Geoff? His culinary habits are famous in the office (let’s just say: serious lunch envy!) so good in fact that they’ve even made it into our Roccbox recipes!

The office dog - there’s nothing he likes more than lounging about on the sofas all day, contributing nothing but adorable stress relief for the whole team. Always keeping a watchful eye on the comings and goings in the Roccbox office and we always know when guests arrive long before we hear a knock on the door! Sometimes a distraction but always a welcome one, he’s a vital member of the team.

We'd like to say thanks to our thousands of followers who have helped shape Roccbox over the years and also to our friends, families and loved ones. Your ideas, feedback and patience have allowed us to make this idea real and we're so excited to be sharing this journey with you.
If you have a spare second then please help us spread the word. Every extra person who knows about Roccbox really helps.
A final message from Roccbox to our contributors...
We can’t wait to bring Roccbox to market. The production line is ready to go and all we need now is your contributions to kick start production and fund our first batch of stock.

We are not blind to the fact that there may be unforeseen circumstances along the way that have the slim potential to prevent us from delivering your product in accordance with our arranged timeline. Our factory has the capacity to produce 300 Roccbox units a day which we hope assures you that should any challenges be thrown our way, we are going to confidently be able rectify any issues without delay.
You can be assured that we continue to work exceptionally hard to ensure your order is fulfilled on time whilst keeping you fully informed every step of the way.
How can I get in touch with your team?

If you want to get it touch with the Roccbox team for anything to do with the campaign, or if you just fancy a chat then fire an email over to hey@roccbox.com or reach out to us on our social channels. We’re a chatty bunch and will be happy to help.
Partnering with Indiegogo allows us to kick start our production &
column2: get Roccbox to customers quicker than traditional methods.  As an international platform, Indiegogo can also get us exposure to customers across Europe and the U.S, which is important to us.

column1: Why is there a delay from purchase to delivery?

We are a small company without limitless access to finance to build a supply of stock.  By supporting us through our campaign, you will help pay for our first full production runs which we will ship to you as soon they’re ready on a first come, first served basis.
When will the first Roccboxes be delivered?
Deliveries will begin from June, subject to no unforeseen production delays.
Absolutely!  Every Roccbox will come with a 1 year warranty from any manufacturing faults or defects.
With every Roccbox comes the oven, wood burner, gas burner, pizza peel, bottle opener / wood burner tool &
Shortly after you have ordered your Roccbox through Indiegogo, you will receive an email asking for your colour preference. Keep an eye out on your emails and simply follow the instructions!
The territories we are shipping to are listed within the perks &
column2: different shipping rates will apply depending on where you are in the world.

column1: I would like to change my shipping address. What should I do?
Roccbox will be retailing at £399 after the campaign through our website - www.roccbox.com.  We will advise on delivery times for those orders at the time.
I’m in the USA, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?

We are aiming to get stock landed both here in the UK and in the US from the beginning of June for deliveries to start.  If this looks likely to change for whatever reason we will of course be informing supporters as soon as possible.
I’m in Canada, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?

We are aiming to get stock landed both here in the UK and in Canada from the beginning of June for deliveries to start.  If this looks likely to change for whatever reason we will of course be informing supporters as soon as possible.
I’m in Australia, will I get my order when customers in the EU get theirs?

We fully intend on bringing Roccbox to your region in line with everyone else.  We are busy working our hardest to bring Roccbox to you but we don’t want you to have to pay ridiculous shipping charges.  You are more than welcome to purchase a Roccbox through our campaign but please be aware that you may have to wait a little bit longer to get your Roccbox delivered whilst we work on getting Roccbox to Australia in bulk.
How do we know Roccbox is safe?

We take product safety very seriously and Roccbox meets the relevant safety standards in each country we are shipping to.  Many members of our team have extensive backgrounds in commercial oven design so we have experience in this area.
Why are payments being taken in US Dollars when you’re a British company?
True, we are British company but Roccbox has a very strong following in the United States and universally, USD tends to be a familiar currency - we hope you don’t mind!
How much will Roccbox cost to buy on Indiegogo?

The sooner you buy, the less you pay!  We will be using a tiered pricing structure throughout the campaign with an initial price of $429.  Don’t worry though, for those of you who are a little late to the show Roccbox’s final campaign price will still be lower than the RRP after the campaign concludes.

column4: >I’m having trouble making a payment. Who should I reach out to?

column1: We’re sorry to hear that! If you’re having trouble making a payment, please reach out to Indiegogo’s Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. One of their payments specialists will be able to assist you within 24 hours.
According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here.
After the campaign, please reach out to our team at hey@roccbox.com!
