column1: Xchime is a next generation video doorbell. Not only can it be used as a WiFi-enabled HD (1080p) video doorbell, it can also be used as a remote-controlled garage door opener, an indoor video camera and more.

column4: >What does the X mean in Xchime

column1: The X represents 'extraordinary'. Xchime's mission is to build an extraordinary doorbell to make people's lives easier.
Xchime was created by ex-Motorola engineers who have extensive experience in bringing technologically-advanced devices to life.

You'll be able to use Xchime to simplify your life by keeping tabs on your front door anytime, from anywhere. You can use Xchime to help you manage deliveries, turn down unwanted solicitors, and feel safer and more secure in your home when you're alone.
Our Indiegogo backers will be receiving our very best deals, saving up to 48% on Xchime's $249 MSRP.
Following our pre-order launch on Indiegogo, you'll be able to purchase it on Xchime.com or Amazon.com.
There is no monthly charge for basic usage. However, if you choose to upgrade to cloud recording, there's a minimal charge of $2.49/month to cover the costs of cloud storage and playback bandwidth.

column4: >What do we get when we order?

column1: All backers will receive the Xchime video doorbell, and you'll be able to choose whether you'd like to purchase an add-on garage door controls accessory and/or a smart light bulb.

We've already finished the development of this product and need your help to lower the cost for mass production. We also want to provide our earliest supporters with the best pricing, which is why the earlier you purchase, the better the deal!

1. Two-way audio/one-way video: When someone rings the doorbell, it will send a notification to your phone. Then, using the Xchime app, you'll be able to converse with (and see) whoever is at your door.
2. Motion detection: An intelligent motion sensor is built into the doorbell. The doorbell can detect people, even if the doorbell is not rung. Cloud recording begins immediately when this happens.
3. Live-view: If you want to monitor the front door in real-time, simply open the app to access Xchime's continuous live stream.
4. Add-on smart light bulb: You can automatically link a smart light bulb to your Xchime. In the evening, the smart light bulb will automatically turn on if the doorbell is rung. This makes the home appear occupied and can dissuade potential thieves from attempting to break in.
5. Weather resistance: Thanks to its patent pending technology, Xchime can be used at a wide temperature range of -40˚F to 150˚F, enabling it to be used effectively in rain, snow or intense humidity.
6. Cloud recording: Video is continously recorded into the cloud, providing helpful evidence should a robbery or other incident occur.
7. No latency: When the doorbell rings, a video connection to your smartphone is established immediately, without a delay. Additionally, when Xchime's motion-sensing technology detects action, video recording begins instantaneously.
8. Garage-door backup: Think you forgot to close your garage door? Seeing is believing. With the add-on garage accessory, simply open the Xchime app (no matter how far away you are from home). If the garage door is still open, you'll receive an option to tap your phone and close it.
9. Indoor video camera: Xchime doubles as a regular indoor video camera to view or record any suspicious activity.
L: 4.375 in. x W: 1.9 in. x H: 1 in.
We recommend all backers purchase the Xchime video door bell and the smart light bulb add-on.
Please see what's in the box page for more information on your pre-orders.

column2: >What is the uniqueness of the technology?

column1: Xchime's real-time communication technology quickly establishes peer-to-peer video connections, minimizing latency. Additionally, its patent-pending technology enables it to run without wasteful batteries. Xchime deploys an indoor chime sound immediately after the doorbell is rung. These features allow for adjusted sensitivity in motion sensors.

column4: >What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?

column1: No battery required. Xchime is powered by existing doorbell wire with AC voltage of 16~24V.
L: 4.375 in. x W: 1.9 in. x H: 1 in. Weight is 5.5 oz.
When the doorbell button is pressed, a notification will be sent to the owner's smartphone. One-way video and two-way audio communication will be immediately established.

column2: >What kind of sensors are you using?
>Will there be updates to it in the future?

column1: Yes, we look forward to updating it in months and years to come, including an update that will allow you to view Xchime activity in your browser, instead of only via the Xchime app.

column4: >How does it integrate with other connected devices?

column2: >Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with?

column1: Yes, the Xchime app is available for iOS and Android devices.

column2: >Can we also access app functions on a web browser?

column1: Web browser support will be added as an update in the future.

column2: >How does the device connect to the app?

column1: The device always connects to our cloud, and the app connects to the device through the cloud.

column4: >What can we expect from the app?

column1: One-way video and two-way audio communication are accomplished via the Xchime app. Use the app for viewing recorded video and for adjusting the sensitivity of the motion sensors, as well as for device setup and VIP user support.

column2: >Will there be updates available through the app?

1. Download the Xchime app.
2. Connect to your WiFi network
3. Launch Xchime app and when prompted, enter your WiFi password.
3. Go to your phone's settings and switch your WiFi connection from your home network to the new WiFi network called ""Xchime hotspot.""
4. When prompted, complete the registration process in the Xchime app.

column4: >How do I turn it on and off?

column1: Xchime will automatically turn on when mounted, and will automatically disconnect when unmounted.
When someone presses the button, the device will send a notification to your smartphone. You'll be able to control the device directly through the Xchime app.

Your security and safety is our #1 priority. That's why we've implemented military-grade encryption and OpenSSL support into every Xchime.
Very durable. It can last for decades.
High-level encryption ensures that recorded video can only be accessed by the authorized owner and family members.

column1: Visitors can hear you when two-way audio is established, but they cannot see you. Only you can see and hear them.

","Xchime continuously accepts funding. Back us by taking advantage of the Indigogo early special price. Thank you!Please visit our website at Xlivepro.com for more informationXchime, the world's first no-lag video doorbell, brings you the true live video streaming experience to greet your visitors from your smartphone or tablet once they push the doorbell. You can see them instantly on your smart devices without lag. For other brands on the market, it takes the phone 7 to 10 seconds to bring up the camera when someone rings the doorbell.Xchime is the world's first video doorbell that works in extreme temperatures. Xchime’s smart light integration deters unwanted visitors by automatically turning on when motion is sensed or doorbell button is pressed.*Xchime’s smart light turns on either inside or outside when any visitor appears, warding off unwanted visitors.Xchime can be installed in the garage as a garage door opener. Open and close your garage door easily with just one tap.Answer your door with ease, receive notifications, and live chat with visitors instantly. Use Xchime’s 1080p HD live video to speak to visitors from your smartphone, tablet, or PC. Let the mailman know where to place your package.Review all live and recorded footage directly from the app.Xchime keeps you notified when motion is detected.Open and close your garage door easily with just one tap.Check your door anytime, anywhere. Directly through your phone.Go ahead and try. We couldn’t find the doorbell we wanted on the market, so we decided to make it ourselves. Xchime campaign hits $100,000, all backers will be able to upgrade their current Xchime order to Black color version. We will send a form for color selection after the campaign.Second stretch goalWhen Xchime campaign hits $150,000, all backers will get one free mounting bracket.              Click here to find out how to make sure your referrals earn you rewards. If you don't follow those instructions, we'll be unable to provide you with your well-deserved prizes!  The free iOS and Android apps let you easily set up and manage your security footage.

column1: Control your Xchime and review footage in one simple dashboard.
Get instant alert when any motion is detected

Our mighty small device packs a big punch. This striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.   We’ve been perfecting Xchime’s technology. Now we’re ready to manufacture it and deliver it to your doorstep. We are an energetic, and fast growing team founded by Ex-Motorola engineers in Chicago. Our dream is to create the extraordinary, most affordable video doorbell in the world and bring these outstanding home security products to every family. We love crowfunding our latest technology on Indiegogo and want to build up an engaged community. We can't wait for backers such as yourselves to share your great ideas and feedback. With your help, we will be able to create the world's best video doorbell for everyone.  We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.We plan to ship Xchime in August 2017*. Additional batch shipments dates will be announced. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    By backing now, you'll get to own one of the very first Xchime ever. Plus, get exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

Xchime is a next generation video doorbell. Not only can it be used as a WiFi-enabled HD (1080p) video doorbell, it can also be used as a remote-controlled garage door opener, an indoor video camera and more.
What does the X mean in Xchime
The X represents 'extraordinary'. Xchime's mission is to build an extraordinary doorbell to make people's lives easier.
Xchime was created by ex-Motorola engineers who have extensive experience in bringing technologically-advanced devices to life.

You'll be able to use Xchime to simplify your life by keeping tabs on your front door anytime, from anywhere. You can use Xchime to help you manage deliveries, turn down unwanted solicitors, and feel safer and more secure in your home when you're alone.
Our Indiegogo backers will be receiving our very best deals, saving up to 48% on Xchime's $249 MSRP.
Following our pre-order launch on Indiegogo, you'll be able to purchase it on Xchime.com or Amazon.com.
Do I need to pay monthly?
There is no monthly charge for basic usage. However, if you choose to upgrade to cloud recording, there's a minimal charge of $2.49/month to cover the costs of cloud storage and playback bandwidth.
What do we get when we order?
All backers will receive the Xchime video doorbell, and you'll be able to choose whether you'd like to purchase an add-on garage door controls accessory and/or a smart light bulb.

We've already finished the development of this product and need your help to lower the cost for mass production. We also want to provide our earliest supporters with the best pricing, which is why the earlier you purchase, the better the deal!

1. Two-way audio/one-way video: When someone rings the doorbell, it will send a notification to your phone. Then, using the Xchime app, you'll be able to converse with (and see) whoever is at your door.2. Motion detection: An intelligent motion sensor is built into the doorbell. The doorbell can detect people, even if the doorbell is not rung. Cloud recording begins immediately when this happens.3. Live-view: If you want to monitor the front door in real-time, simply open the app to access Xchime's continuous live stream.4. Add-on smart light bulb: You can automatically link a smart light bulb to your Xchime. In the evening, the smart light bulb will automatically turn on if the doorbell is rung. This makes the home appear occupied and can dissuade potential thieves from attempting to break in.5. Weather resistance: Thanks to its patent pending technology, Xchime can be used at a wide temperature range of -40˚F to 150˚F, enabling it to be used effectively in rain, snow or intense humidity.6. Cloud recording: Video is continously recorded into the cloud, providing helpful evidence should a robbery or other incident occur.7. No latency: When the doorbell rings, a video connection to your smartphone is established immediately, without a delay. Additionally, when Xchime's motion-sensing technology detects action, video recording begins instantaneously.8. Garage-door backup: Think you forgot to close your garage door? Seeing is believing. With the add-on garage accessory, simply open the Xchime app (no matter how far away you are from home). If the garage door is still open, you'll receive an option to tap your phone and close it.9. Indoor video camera: Xchime doubles as a regular indoor video camera to view or record any suspicious activity.
L: 4.375 in. x W: 1.9 in. x H: 1 in.
Which option is best for me?
We recommend all backers purchase the Xchime video door bell and the smart light bulb add-on.
Please see what's in the box page for more information on your pre-orders.
What is the uniqueness of the technology?

Xchime's real-time communication technology quickly establishes peer-to-peer video connections, minimizing latency. Additionally, its patent-pending technology enables it to run without wasteful batteries. Xchime deploys an indoor chime sound immediately after the doorbell is rung. These features allow for adjusted sensitivity in motion sensors.
What is the battery life? Hours of continuous use? How to charge?
No battery required. Xchime is powered by existing doorbell wire with AC voltage of 16~24V.
What are the dimensions and weight?
L: 4.375 in. x W: 1.9 in. x H: 1 in. Weight is 5.5 oz.
When the doorbell button is pressed, a notification will be sent to the owner's smartphone. One-way video and two-way audio communication will be immediately established.
What kind of sensors are you using?
Will there be updates to it in the future?
Yes, we look forward to updating it in months and years to come, including an update that will allow you to view Xchime activity in your browser, instead of only via the Xchime app.
How does it integrate with other connected devices?
Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with?
Yes, the Xchime app is available for iOS and Android devices.
Can we also access app functions on a web browser?
Web browser support will be added as an update in the future.
How does the device connect to the app?
The device always connects to our cloud, and the app connects to the device through the cloud.
What can we expect from the app?

One-way video and two-way audio communication are accomplished via the Xchime app. Use the app for viewing recorded video and for adjusting the sensitivity of the motion sensors, as well as for device setup and VIP user support.
Will there be updates available through the app?
Yes, both versions of the app can be downloaded from their corresponding app stores (the App Store [iOS] and the Google Play Store).

All Xchime backers will receive 1 month of free cloud storage. Afterward, the price for cloud storage will be $2.49/month.
How do I set it up?

1. Download the Xchime app.2. Connect to your WiFi network3. Launch Xchime app and when prompted, enter your WiFi password.3. Go to your phone's settings and switch your WiFi connection from your home network to the new WiFi network called ""Xchime hotspot.""4. When prompted, complete the registration process in the Xchime app.
How do I turn it on and off?
Xchime will automatically turn on when mounted, and will automatically disconnect when unmounted.
When someone presses the button, the device will send a notification to your smartphone. You'll be able to control the device directly through the Xchime app.
What is the care and cleaning of it?
No special care or cleaning required.
Xchime can be used as a:1) Front door video bell2) Back door video bell3) Garage door controls4) Regular indoor video camera5) Baby monitor
Your security and safety is our #1 priority. That's why we've implemented military-grade encryption and OpenSSL support into every Xchime.
We will have a FCC certification.
Very durable. It can last for decades.
High-level encryption ensures that recorded video can only be accessed by the authorized owner and family members.
Can someone watch or listen to me?
Visitors can hear you when two-way audio is established, but they cannot see you. Only you can see and hear them.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
We're proud to ship Xchime worldwide. Shipping rates vary depending on your country.
Shipping is free for US, Canada, and China. $29 each Xchime for international shipment.

The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped outside of the China may be subject to import taxes, customs duties, and fees levied by the destination country. We are a young company that specializes in design. Our philosophy is to create simple, uncluttered, but beautiful design solutions for various uses. We are pleased to introduce our latest product which, we believe, solves a very common problem that most of us deal with every day: SHAPES, a simple solution to lost and tangled wires. Our project has been successfully completed on Kickstarter







SHAPES are aesthetically pleasing geometrical figures made of metal which are designed to hold cables, wires, chargers and also to serve as an perfect addition to your home decor. They help organize your work space and make your interior more unique and modern.













SHAPES were designed with the best traditions of elegance and minimalism:







 Colors:
• Silver
• Gold
• Rose gold

Each figure has a passageway for cable 6,3 mm x 6,3 mm. This is an optimal size for all current cable types.

Sphere has a diameter of 33 mm and height of 27 mm. Pyramid with a side of 33 mm and height of 33 mm.



For better stability each figure have recesses filling with rubber bushings, which will protect the table surface from scratches and won't let SHAPES fall down.




They are made of hard alloy of metal like brass via turning and milling production and further grinding and polishing.

We offer you figures covered by electroplating with a silver, gold and rose gold. It prevents corrosion and protects from aging and also gives amazing and nice appearance.

Be sure that SHAPES will significantly lighten your life and delight you with its functionality and beauty.

column1: Your go-to kitchen knife
column2:
>

Your chef knife is central to creating nearly every dish. Whether you’re mincing chives, or cutting apart a whole chicken, the chef knife can do it all.

However, your choices at the store are confusing. Cheap knives are clunky to use and dull quickly. Even if you're willing to spend more, unfamiliar features and a wide spectrum of prices can make the options overwhelming. Finding the right blade can be a frustrating experience, but we don’t think that needs to be the case.
column3:
>

An incredible knife for a fair price 

The world of chef knives is out of date. The big knife brands are operating on outdated sales margins that inflate the price of knives sold at a retail store. By avoiding the traditional retail sales model and bringing our product to you directly online, we have created a great knife for a fraction of the price.

Don’t waste your money on a knife block filled with knives you’ll never use. Get the one knife you’ll reach for again and again.
column4: >
column5:
>Comparison of the costs that go into bringing you a knife

 

One great blade

A good knife stays sharp and is comfortable to use. A great knife is the one you reach for.

We’ve put a ton of attention into how people hold and use their knives, and we think we’ve designed the ultimate hybrid. A knife that takes the best elements of western and eastern knifemaking, and combines them into one blade.

After experimenting with dozens of blade profiles, grip shapes and types of steel, we’ve created an incredibly sharp blade that feels right at home in your hand. A long deep belly helps with effortless chopping, while the lowered tip makes slicing and finer work more approachable.
column9:
>

 

The grip and bolster are designed with intention. The contour of the grip makes it feel secure regardless of your preferred grip style or the the size of your hands. Olive Wood - a durable hardwood - keeps the handle grippy whether it's wet or dry.

Even when holding the blade in a pinch grip, a thumb groove in the bolster makes for a more confident and comfortable grip on the blade.
column10: >
column12:
>

 

The vast majority of stainless steel blades are made with soft steel that won’t hold an edge. Our blade has a cutting core made of Japanese VG-10 steel. This innovative high-carbon stainless steel holds an incredible edge and won’t corrode like other high carbon steels.

This cutting core is then sandwiched in 66 layers of alternating stainless steels. This technique - sometimes referred to as “San Mai” which is used in traditional Japanese sword making - allows the VG10 to be used for the edge while the other layers form a jacket around it. This layering protects the cutting core, while providing a beautiful layered finish on the faces of the blade.

How sharp? Very sharp. 

Many knives on the market are sharp, but few stay that way for long. Being as sharp as possible isn’t necessarily best, particularly if you’re trading off the knife’s ability to retain that sharp edge. A scalpel may be sharper than a kitchen knife, but it would dull quickly.

If your steel is too hard it becomes brittle, and if your edge angle is too fine it will dull quickly. We experimented until we found the right steel and edge profile that maximizes edge retention. The result is a blade that’s razor sharp and stays that way.

Our steel is hardened to between 57-59 rockwell hardness, which allows for a more finely sharpened edge. The blade is then tapered to a 17 degree edge angle, allowing you to glide through even the toughest of root vegetables.
column14:
>

 

Testing… Testing... 

We’ve tested our blade with both chefs and home cooks to develop something that feels intuitive for everyone. After more than a year of designing, prototyping, testing, and manufacturing samples we’re ready to go to production. Dozens of revisions have helped us to develop a knife we can’t wait to share with the world.
column15:
>

 

Why we need your help 

Our knife is ready for production - now we need to funds for the first production run. All the funds raised will go directly towards sourcing the materials and expert labor needed to create these handmade blades. We have the suppliers and manufacturers lined up and ready to go, we just need your help to bring the blade to life.
column16:
>

 

Timeline 

 

Who are we?
column18: >
column19:
>Get Your Project Funded Today!

A night-light so smart it teaches toddlers to go to sleep quickly and quietly.
Whisper the Hush Buddy is a night-light that listens to the room. If the toddler is noisy, Whisper dims until the child is quiet again.

A special bedtime story accompanies Whisper. In one reading, the child meets Whisper, and learns Hush Buddies need quiet to glow their brightest. Their new friend gives them gentle but effective motivation to stay quiet at bedtime.
Hush Buddy was invented by a father of twins who was trying to sleep when the 2 year old in the next room began to cry out. That was the Eureka moment.
Sleep experts were consulted. The behavioral science behind the idea checked out.
A prototype was built. The bedtime story written and illustrated. Test families recruited. All reported Hush Buddy ""very effective"" in no more than two night's use.
Best of all, we learned toddlers who get more sleep have better cognitive development that benefits them the rest of their lives. And we could be a part of that!
By this point, we're excited, our test families are excited, and we hope you are too. It's time to get this life changing system out to eager families.

column2: />Tracy, mother of 3 year old:  “Before we had Hush Buddy, my child had to be rocked to sleep. Bedtime took anywhere from 45 minutes to an hour and half. If he got up in the middle of the night it had to be repeated to get him back to sleep.

column1: The first night with Hush Buddy, I didn’t have to rock him to sleep. That, to me, is huge.
By the fourth night, as soon as we read the story, we put him right in the bed and that was it. I pulled covers up, turned the light off and left.  It took him 5 or 10 minutes to go to sleep.”

column2: />Kathy, mother of 2 year old: “Before Hush Buddy, bedtime went well until it was time to leave the room. Anywhere from 30 minutes to an hour and a half he’ll kind of yell, cry, kick the wall.

column1: The first night with Hush Buddy, we did our normal routine, and then we read the story about Whisper. And he LOVED the story. We closed the book, introduced Whisper, turned out the light, put him to bed, and that first night it took him maybe 15 minutes to go to sleep. It was definitely an immediate difference. We have seen some really impressive results.”

column2: />Maria, mother of 3 year old: “For three years, the night routine has been so frustrating. It was at least an hour and a half or more of putting him in bed. He would whine, cry, ask for water. In order to make him go to sleep by himself, he would have the light on and the door open.

column1: By the second night with Hush Buddy it was a huge step. We could turn the light off and close the door. The third and fourth night, it was easy. We read the book, and that was it. I didn’t think it was going to work this easy.”
We've developed prototype after prototype ourselves and have finally arrived at the final design.

We need $35,000 from the Indiegogo community to begin production.  Specifically, the funds are targeted for a very key purchase-- the molds that will be used to mass produce the injection molding and blow mold plastic housing components. The molds will be produced in the U.S. and will take 12 to 14 weeks to manufacture. Then, we're off to the races, and Hush Buddy is off to homes across the country.
What you get is, a complete Hush Buddy Sleep System! Or two (a bundle that's perfect for grandparents to give to their grand kids). Check out our perks:

It's a very attainable goal, we think. In the unlikely event we fall short, we'll gratefully accept the funds raised and join it with private investment dollars to fulfill the perks, and bring Hush Buddy to market.

Scott Hanson is the father of twins and the inventor of Hush Buddy. After two decades as an award-winning television journalist, he began his own video marketing business, until one night when his two year old nephew began crying in the middle of the night. That was the spark for Hush Buddy, and bringing it to market to help children and parents has been his passion ever since.

column2: >Ed Danyo is an entrepreneur who has performed on stage with Blue Man Group,  published in Forbes Magazine, and is now happily focused on the improving the quality of life for toddlers through precious sleep. He has a background in Electrical Engineering and Six Sigma coupled with an MBA.

column1: Jim Passe is a patent attorney specializing in helping small to medium companies file for intellectual property protection while developing coherent patent and trademark strategies. He shepherds all Hush Buddy patents and trademarks.

Taking Hush Buddy to market is not without risk of course. Toddlers are notoriously unpredictable, and while our research with actual families has been highly successful, we understand, once we're in the broader market, some families may continue to struggle. We don't want to give up on them, so we are developing a robust plan for customer service to help support parents with the stress of the preschool set at bedtime.
Another challenge comes from parents who may not understand the absolute importance of repeatable bedtime routines.

Finally, whenever taking a first-of-its-kind product to the market, one faces the challenge of introducing customers to something they've never seen nor tried before. Fortunately, we have good success stories to tell, and stories are easily spread.
Tell people! Tell lots and lots of people.
• Share our campaign on Facebook, and be sure to tag friends who have toddlers. Indiegogo has some easy share tools.
• Email family and colleagues who are parents or grandparents of toddlers.
• If you belong to a mom blog, let your community know about Hush Buddy and our campaign.
• Check out our perks for a way you can chip in even if you don't need a Hush Buddy personally.
What ages are well suited for Hush Buddy?
We recommend Hush Buddy for children ages 2 to 4.
Won't my child cry MORE if the room's dark?

First, Hush Buddy doesn't go completely dark. It just dims. Second, thanks to the bedtime story, the child learns to expect that behavior from Whisper. Our test families reported their children wanted to be quiet to help their new friend.
Hush Buddy stands about 6 inches tall, and 5 inches wide and deep. The size makes it easy to put Whisper in a suitcase for travel.
I've ordered the perk with my child's name listed in the book, but there was nowhere to enter the name. How will you know what name to add to the list?
We will contact you via email for the child's name.
How will my child's name be listed in the book?
The bedtime story has both an English and Spanish version. In between will be a list of approximately 400 names receiving a special Thank You from the Hush Buddies.
Does the character move or do anything? Maybe play music?
No. That's by design. We don't want Whisper to be stimulative, or associated with playtime. Our instructions and storybook set up Whisper to be associated with quiet and bedtime.

So much that will help you have better bedtimes! First, you'll learn to view bedtime through your child's eyes. It's surprising! You'll learn good routines to put in place leading up to bedtime, and night-by-night strategies to employ when using Hush Buddy.
What if my child has sleep apnea or some other medical issue?
Hush Buddy isn't a medical device, and isn't intended to treat medical conditions like sleep apnea.
Will it stop my child from coming into my room in the middle of the night?

We consulted sleep doctors about this very issue. They tell us, as a child learns to go to sleep independently at the beginning of the night, they have a better chance of simply falling back to sleep by themselves when they wake in the middle of the night. Often, child seek out their parents because they think they need that parent to be able to fall asleep. With Hush Buddy, the child can learn how to go to sleep independently.
Does Hush Buddy stay on all night?

Yes. It's important for the child to have a consistent environment all night long. If they wake and the room is different somehow, there's a chance that will disturb the child enough that they won't fall back to sleep.
A night-light so smart it teaches toddlers to go to sleep quickly and quietly.
Whisper the Hush Buddy is a night-light that listens to the room. If the toddler is noisy, Whisper dims until the child is quiet again.

A special bedtime story accompanies Whisper. In one reading, the child meets Whisper, and learns Hush Buddies need quiet to glow their brightest. Their new friend gives them gentle but effective motivation to stay quiet at bedtime.
Hush Buddy was invented by a father of twins who was trying to sleep when the 2 year old in the next room began to cry out. That was the Eureka moment.
Sleep experts were consulted. The behavioral science behind the idea checked out.
A prototype was built. The bedtime story written and illustrated. Test families recruited. All reported Hush Buddy ""very effective"" in no more than two night's use.
Best of all, we learned toddlers who get more sleep have better cognitive development that benefits them the rest of their lives. And we could be a part of that!
By this point, we're excited, our test families are excited, and we hope you are too. It's time to get this life changing system out to eager families.

Tracy, mother of 3 year old:  “Before we had Hush Buddy, my child had to be rocked to sleep. Bedtime took anywhere from 45 minutes to an hour and half. If he got up in the middle of the night it had to be repeated to get him back to sleep.
The first night with Hush Buddy, I didn’t have to rock him to sleep. That, to me, is huge.
By the fourth night, as soon as we read the story, we put him right in the bed and that was it. I pulled covers up, turned the light off and left.  It took him 5 or 10 minutes to go to sleep.”
Kathy, mother of 2 year old: “Before Hush Buddy, bedtime went well until it was time to leave the room. Anywhere from 30 minutes to an hour and a half he’ll kind of yell, cry, kick the wall.

The first night with Hush Buddy, we did our normal routine, and then we read the story about Whisper. And he LOVED the story. We closed the book, introduced Whisper, turned out the light, put him to bed, and that first night it took him maybe 15 minutes to go to sleep. It was definitely an immediate difference. We have seen some really impressive results.”

Maria, mother of 3 year old: “For three years, the night routine has been so frustrating. It was at least an hour and a half or more of putting him in bed. He would whine, cry, ask for water. In order to make him go to sleep by himself, he would have the light on and the door open.

By the second night with Hush Buddy it was a huge step. We could turn the light off and close the door. The third and fourth night, it was easy. We read the book, and that was it. I didn’t think it was going to work this easy.”
What We Need & What You Get
We've developed prototype after prototype ourselves and have finally arrived at the final design.

We need $35,000 from the Indiegogo community to begin production.  Specifically, the funds are targeted for a very key purchase-- the molds that will be used to mass produce the injection molding and blow mold plastic housing components. The founder of our company, Marvin Philip, hurt his back while working.  This not only caused Marvin to miss work, but it also made it difficult to do things at home such as bending over to empty his laundry hamper.

His injury lead him to search for a hamper that would not cause additional strain on his back.  Marvin searched everywhere in hopes of finding a product that would fulfill his needs.  He even solicited help from family members to find a hamper that would work for him.
Unfortunately, there was not a product found on the market to help Marvin.  Last year, Marvin decided that he would create a product to help fill the need that he saw existing in the marketplace.

Over the course of the past 15 months, Marvin has dedicated all of his time and financial resources into creating the Lifter Hamper™.  The product has gone through multiple designs and toolings.  It has been put through rigorus tests so that it can be a quality product.  Patents have been filed and engineers have fine tuned the Lifter Hamper™ so that the hamper will be unique and do exactly what Marvin has envisioned it would do.

You may know someone who is elderly, suffers from back pain, is pregnant, or struggles to bend over for whatever reason.  They probably dread the task of doing laundry.  The Lifter Hamper™ is a product that has been designed to simply help these people!

The Lifter Hamper™ doesn't have to be just for those who have problems bending over. It can benefit anyone and everyone who does their laundy.  Why should anyone put a strain on your back when you don't have to???

You now have the limited time opportunity to become one of the first owners of the new Lifter Hamper™ by participating now.  Your contribution will help us bring this improved product to market.  For your contribution, you will receive the following:
$5 Donation - Coupon Good for 25% off a Lifter Hamper™ - good through 12/31/2013.
$30 Donation - One Lifter Hamper™ - includes shipping.
$55 Donation - Two Lifter Hampers™ - includes shipping.
$100 Donation - Four Lifter Hampers™ - includes shipping.

*The color of the Lifter Hamper™ will be a special limited crowd funding edition black, with the Lifter Hamper™ logo embroidered in gold lettering.  All future editions will include the Lifter Hamper™ logo embroidered in our silver lettering, similar to the one shown in the picture on this site. 

If for any reason you cannot contribute financially, we would appreciate your support by helping us get the word out about our product.  You can simply let other people know about the Lifter Hamper™ by using the tools in this listing to share this others.

Thank you to everyone who contributed to our funding campaign!  We are very fortunate to have so many avid supporters of Terranaut.
We are pleased to announce that we raised a total of $5,170 in just 63 days!  Thatï¿½s an average of over $80 per day!

Rest assured this money is being put to good use.  Producing the Molecule Chairï¿½s design requires several pieces of unique tooling, all of which have to be built before we can make a single chair.  Weï¿½re using the funds youï¿½ve helped raise to buy the tooling and also to produce a first run of chairs.
This month, weï¿½ll begin making the tooling, producing the chairs and importing them here.  After that theyï¿½ll be repackaged and sent to you as soon as possible.
Although youï¿½ll have to patiently wait a little longer for the chair, the rest of your rewards will be shipped out very soon.  Expect to have sticker, coozie, and t-shirt by early November!
Also, be sure to check our website
column2: >TerranautOutdoors.com to see your name in the list of contributors plus photos of the chair from its travels this summer.

column1: Again, we are truly grateful for your help as we start this exciting new company.  We look forward to sharing a great success story down the road - and having your support as a vital part which helped it get off the ground.

Do you remember how you felt when you woke up in the morning? It may have seemed unbelievable at first. You may have thought sleep could never be so wonderful. Try and try as you might, you could never quite capture that same magic.

You try everything, even buying an ""orthopedic pillow"" in the hope that it would make a difference. Unfortunately, it is NOT the same. You wake up feeling less-than-completely rested, and there is even a kink in your neck.

We know your frustration. Constantly searching for a deep and restful sleep that seemed intent on evading us, we took action, creating the SOFY® Pillow for softer and more comfortable sleep than may have ever thought possible.

Pre-order the SOFY® Pillow and revolutionize your sleep once and for all! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The next generation of contouring pillows is here. It's the inner technology that counts!

Featuring the patent-pending multi-regional contouring technology, the SOFY Pillow conforms to the shade of your body perfectly, optimizing the support and alignment you can expect while you are asleep. Going beyond the mere responsiveness and soft texture of memory foam, the SOFY Pillow is the type of sleep innovation that only comes along just once in a generation.

The major difference between the SOFY Pillow and all other high-quality pillows is that its impact reaches deep below the surface, its inner mechanisms working more effectively than traditional memory foam can. You are giving your body complete, reliable support because of the inner contour piston technology we have built into the SOFY pillow, so whatever position you sleep in, you can fall asleep more quickly and stay asleep more deeply. You never need to worry about turning over in your sleep, either: the pillow adjusts as you do for constant, perfect repositioning.

 

SOFY® Pillow helps to restore your natural neck c-curve for proper alignment and distribute the weight off your head, neck and shoulders for optimal pressure relief on your nerves and muscles. Sofy promotes better spine health. Compare the difference!

 

 

Over-heating will be a thing of the past!

SOFY® Pillow has ventilation holes so that the heat coming from the body will dissipate and not build up on the pillow.

 

 

 

Furthermore, we've constructed a double-sided pillow cover to maximize breathability even more!
• The bamboo side consists of bamboo, which is a natural ingredient that prevents heat build-up.

• The mesh side is for maximum breathability. The micro vents in the mesh material promotes even more efficient ventilation so that you won’t have to worry about the heat bothering your sleep anymore.
Built for comfort &
column2:
built to last!

SOFY® Pillow will not go flat on you, soothing you to sleep night after night. We made sure to use high-quality materials for long-lasting durability.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SOFY® Pillow is germ-resistant and hypoallergenic. It fights back against the particles that cause discomfort, illness, and disease, including bacteria, mold, viruses, mildew, dust mites, and allergens. Simultaneously, the SOFY Pillow prevents odor-causing germs from taking root so that you can always count on a fresh scent and pleasant texture.

 

 

 

 

 

Super-functional dual-sided cover with an all-around zipper for easy cover removal

 

 

The pillow cover, which includes a 180-degree zipper system, is easy to remove for simple cleaning too, and it is washer-safe and dryer-safe.

column2:
>

 

Designed for side sleepers, the SleepSmart Pillow uses innovative adjustable technology, so that every night is your best night’s sleep.

The SleepSmart Pillow comes with ‘Sophie,’ an intelligent sleep coach who monitors your sleep quality and helps you track your lifestyle behaviors in the SleepSmart app. Sophie analyzes your REM cycle through the SleepSmart Pillow as well as data you manually provide about your lifestyle choices to help you become the master of your own sleep.
column8: >
column10: >
column12:
>

 

The SleepSmart Pillow is a one of a kind adjustable pillow system with state-of-the-art technology that blows other luxury pillows away.

While traditional pillows require you to remove or add stuffing to adjust the height, the SleepSmart Pillow can easily be adjusted to the height that's just right for you using the valve on the side of the pillow.

We believe that pillows should not be one size fits all, which is why our CloudComfort system allows you to uniquely customize your fit.
column15:
> 

Intelligent Coach Sophie monitors and learns from your lifestyle and sleeping patterns to give you insight for better rest.

During the day, use the SleepSmart app as a journal to keep track of your daily habits. Then at night, Sophie will automatically record your nightly sleep cycle including when you lift your head off of the pillow and any sounds you make.
column18:
>

In the morning, Sophie will use all of the information provided to help you fine-tune your habits for your best possible night’s rest.
column20: >
column24:
>      
The unique height-adjustable system allows you to tailor your pillow to your
exact customized support, depending on your size and preference.
Unlike other adjustable pillows, you can simply squeeze to change the height
of the SleepSmart Pillow while laying down on it to find the best support height that you need.
column27:
>The Cloud Support System is topped with a Comfort Layer, which is surrounded by an
innovative 3D weave fabric that’s removable and washable. The 3D weave is not only
incredibly soft, but also breathable, so you feel like your head is resting on a cloud
and, unlike memory foam, you’ll always be on the cool side of the pillow.
column28:
>
The SleepSmart Pillow has a built-in vibration alarm that will wake you up
during the lightest phase of your sleep cycle. Use the SleepSmart app to
set the time you want to be woken up as well the intensity of the vibration.
The vibration gradually increases in intensity to wake you up,
but will not generate noise to disturb your partner.
column31:
>Don't just take our word for it!
Here's why people love the SleepSmart Pillow:
column45: >
column50: >

column3:
>

The gap between your head and the surface of the mattress is what we refer to as the support void. In order to keep your spine in proper alignment, your pillow should perfectly fill this space.
column13:
>


We’d like to give a special thanks to our design and engineering team at PPS as well as Jae Y., Tiantian, and Sam for developing the pillow shape, colors, and materials.

We’d also like to thank our software and firmware developers Sophia, Curtis, MJ, Ken, and Thomas as well as our production team, JT, Jenson, David, Max, Yuan, Miki, and Henry.

Finally, thank you to our marketing and business teams, including Tonya and Jared from JCI, Jared and Val from Prominence Films, Sarah and Turner from Enventys, and Eli and Pauline from PPS.
column14: >
column15: >
column16:
>

For years, one of the SleepSmart founders, Dr. Jae Son, had neck pain and struggled to find a pillow that could meet his comfort and support needs. He tried folding the pillow in half, sleeping with an arm under his pillow, or even stacking two pillows, but no solution was ideal. He decided that pillows shouldn’t be one size fits all, and that’s how SleepSmart was born.

Technologist Brandon Larson dedicated six months to evaluating apps and trackers and their connection to research on the science of sleep to understand what works, and more importantly, what doesn’t. On top of that, he dedicated three and a half years to personal sleep-data tracking.

After hearing and analyzing the needs of many, Dr. Jae Son and Brandon Larson put their heads together to create a better sleep system.
column20:
>
 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make SleepSmart a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us by pre-ordering, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a SleepSmart Pillow, if you’re a supporter of SleepSmart, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!
 


 

","Designed for side sleepers, the SleepSmart Pillow uses innovative adjustable technology, so that every night is your best night’s sleep.The SleepSmart Pillow comes with ‘Sophie,’ an intelligent sleep coach who monitors your sleep quality and helps you track your lifestyle behaviors in the SleepSmart app. Sophie analyzes your REM cycle through the SleepSmart Pillow as well as data you manually provide about your lifestyle choices to help you become the master of your own sleep.      The SleepSmart Pillow is a one of a kind adjustable pillow system with state-of-the-art technology that blows other luxury pillows away.While traditional pillows require you to remove or add stuffing to adjust the height, the SleepSmart Pillow can easily be adjusted to the height that's just right for you using the valve on the side of the pillow.We believe that pillows should not be one size fits all, which is why our CloudComfort system allows you to uniquely customize your fit.   Intelligent Coach Sophie monitors and learns from your lifestyle and sleeping patterns to give you insight for better rest.During the day, use the SleepSmart app as a journal to keep track of your daily habits. Then at night, Sophie will automatically record your nightly sleep cycle including when you lift your head off of the pillow and any sounds you make. In the morning, Sophie will use all of the information provided to help you fine-tune your habits for your best possible night’s rest.        The unique height-adjustable system allows you to tailor your pillow to yourexact customized support, depending on your size and preference.Unlike other adjustable pillows, you can simply squeeze to change the heightof the SleepSmart Pillow while laying down on it to find the best support height that you need. The Cloud Support System is topped with a Comfort Layer, which is surrounded by aninnovative 3D weave fabric that’s removable and washable. The 3D weave is not onlyincredibly soft, but also breathable, so you feel like your head is resting on a cloudand, unlike memory foam, you’ll always be on the cool side of the pillow. The SleepSmart Pillow has a built-in vibration alarm that will wake you upduring the lightest phase of your sleep cycle. Use the SleepSmart app toset the time you want to be woken up as well the intensity of the vibration.The vibration gradually increases in intensity to wake you up,but will not generate noise to disturb your partner. Don't just take our word for it!Here's why people love the SleepSmart Pillow:

column1: The gap between your head and the surface of the mattress is what we refer to as the support void. In order to keep your spine in proper alignment, your pillow should perfectly fill this space.    We’d like to give a special thanks to our design and engineering team at PPS as well as Jae Y., Tiantian, and Sam for developing the pillow shape, colors, and materials.We’d also like to thank our software and firmware developers Sophia, Curtis, MJ, Ken, and Thomas as well as our production team, JT, Jenson, David, Max, Yuan, Miki, and Henry.Finally, thank you to our marketing and business teams, including Tonya and Jared from JCI, Jared and Val from Prominence Films, Sarah and Turner from Enventys, and Eli and Pauline from PPS.  For years, one of the SleepSmart founders, Dr. Jae Son, had neck pain and struggled to find a pillow that could meet his comfort and support needs. He tried folding the pillow in half, sleeping with an arm under his pillow, or even stacking two pillows, but no solution was ideal. He decided that pillows shouldn’t be one size fits all, and that’s how SleepSmart was born.Technologist Brandon Larson dedicated six months to evaluating apps and trackers and their connection to research on the science of sleep to understand what works, and more importantly, what doesn’t. On top of that, he dedicated three and a half years to personal sleep-data tracking.After hearing and analyzing the needs of many, Dr. Jae Son and Brandon Larson put their heads together to create a better sleep system.   We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make SleepSmart a reality.We know not everyone will be able to support us by pre-ordering, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase a SleepSmart Pillow, if you’re a supporter of SleepSmart, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!",54.0,4,"1 Campaign

• Then RoomMe’s app sets lights, thermostats and other IoT Smart Home devices in the room according to their person-specific predefined rules.
• Android and iOS Developer SDKs available for developers to create custom Presence Based applications
No need to talk or point at devices, just walk around and have your devices automate themselves for you while feeling like a wizard.

column16:
>

We’ve invested a lot in RoomMe’s architecture in order to ensure maximum security and safety:

No Cloud - All presence detection decisions are done locally on and by the RoomMe Sensor.

No Personal Identification - RoomMe Sensor will notify an entering smart phone about its Room location. No personal identification required.

No Data Sharing - Your automation rules are yours. The RoomMe app does not share this information or backup it on a RoomMe cloud. Rules are stored on your SmartPhone only.

Local Control - Whenever possible, RoomMe will use local communications in order to control Smart Home devices.

No External Commands - RoomMe does not accept Smart Home device operation commands from external sources, making it impossible to tweak your defined rules or bypass them.
column23: >Meet the RoomMe Control App
column26:
>Smart Homes Aren’t Too Smart

 

No offense, but your “Smart Home” isn’t really all that clever.

It can’t even tell who’s in which room of the house.  A dog can do that.  With RoomMe, your smart home knows who’s in which room, and adjusts all the settings automatically to your preferences. And that’s when the real magic happens. With each additional smart home device in your home, your customization options grow.  

Set your preferences then let your phone's presence set your home in motion.

column1:
FAQ's

Q1. I have a hub, why do I need RoomMe?

RoomMe enables you to set up your home to be totally automated. So when you walk into a room your settings are activated, without needing to adjust them yourself.

Q2. How many sensors do I need?

One for every room you'd like to automate. Since RoomMe detects 'exiting rooms' as entering another, in order to activate RoomMe in one room only, you need two- one for the room, and one for just outside the room to detect the exit event.

Q3. Is one sensor per room enough?

Yes

Q4. Is it easy to setup?

Yes, just a few minutes and no professional assistance with the included detailed instructions.

Q5. Where do I install RoomMe? 

RoomMe is installed at the ceiling above the room entrance.

Q6. Can it detect leaving a room?

RoomMe detects room leave by detecting an entry to another room.

Q7. Which devices does RoomMe work with for presence detection?

Currently RoomMe works only with Smartphones and tablets with Bluetooth 4.0 Peripheral mode capabilities. Included are all Apple Phones (From iPhone 4 onward) and Tablets as well as newer Android devices (most devices which shipped with Android 5.0 from factory).

Q8. Is there a monthly fee?

No, absolutely not!

Q9. Is RoomMe battery operated?

Yes. RoomMe requires two standard Alkaline D-Type batteries which are not included in the kit.

column3:
showinfo=0"">





It is also remote-controlled, meaning you can direct it where you need cleaning and keep it focused on a dirty floor until it sparkles.
column5:
showinfo=0"">
 
 

 

Everybot developed the RoboSpin Technology which controls the speed and direction using two dual spin mops without having to utilize wheels. RoboSpin Technology, which was developed after years of study and testing, consists of mechanical engineered technology, dynamics technology, and motor controlled algorithm. 

With this system, our device can use optimized cleaning modes to clean everything from harmful fine dust to wax residue to stains. It can control speed and direction of each pad on its own, meaning it can implement and optimize cleaning action automatically. This device knows everything we know about mopping floors and then some! 

 

Patented water tanks and water supply system can easily clean your floor using the wet mops, thus saving you from the hassle of refilling the water tank every once in a while.

 

 

Perfect wet-mop cleaning by two kinds of mop constructions (Diving Yarn + Microﬁber)

Diving yarn can wipe dirt and polluted particles. Microﬁber can absorb the ﬁne dust and stains effectively. Two different mop constructions can improve the cleaning capability and performance.  Mop pads can be cleaned in the laundry or you can hand wash them.  It will be as good as new. 

 

One Touch Operation for Ease of Use

Extremely easy to operate, simply at the touch of a button or a remote controller, this device is wireless, eliminating all the hassle and mess of tangling cables in the house.

 

When met with obstacles such as a wall or furniture while in motion, this sensor can detect it and travel on a different route to minimize contact with its bumpers. 

 

When met with a falling area such a stairway, cliff, while cleaning, sensors will be able to avoid it and travel on a different route.  

 

ESA (Exit Shadow Area) Technology 

If you think the obstacle sensors are all the electronics this little device has, you’re in for a surprise. What if we told you the Everybot knows to move back to a well-lit location after it is done cleaning? Think about it. If you have a dirty floor under a piece of furniture, normally you would have to move that furniture out of the way and then mop the floor yourself. But not anymore. Not only can the Everybot drive right under that furniture and clean the floor until it is spotless, it will drive itself back out from under that piece of furniture when the job is done using its unique ESA (Exit Shadow Area) technology!
column7:
showinfo=0"">

Customers can select optimized cleaning modes according to their house conditions

- Floor materials, structures, and types
- Types of furniture arrangements and the level of cleanliness on the floors

 

Handy Cleaning Mode: Users can clean anywhere using the EVERYBOT's handle. Clean everything from desks, tables, glass windows, and cars which are all difficult to clean.

 

Dry Mop Cleaning Mode: Dry mop cleaning mode can adsorb ﬁnd dust tightly. RS700 can clean the ﬂoors by not only wet mop cleaning patterns but also a dry mop cleaning pattern designed by numerous test and know-how. Electrostatics cleaning method can remove pet hair, clothes lint, and tiny dust which is not visible to eyes.

column1:
Conquered the world with the wet mop cleaning robot, Everybot CEO Woochul Chung, “we made it solely practical”

Everybot, founded in January 2015 by Woochul Chung the CEO, developed the 1st generation personal service robot. Chung is the expert of the expert now that he has been in the robot cleaner industry for 12 years. Chung started off as a development manager at a robot company but since the company was experiencing a financial downfall, he had to stand alone. Everybot consists mostly of the employees from the experts at the previous company, and Chung is actively growing the company. We heard more from Woochul Chung, CEO, who made people around the world fall in love with the unique peanut shaped machine with outstanding technology and reasonable price, about his inspiration for starting the business, his business philosophy, and more.

The birth of “Everybot” from the conceptual shift.

“I have been developing the robot, and the consumers were very interested in the first generation everyday use robot. However, the reality of the robot cleaners was that they could not properly clean because there were obstacles in the way and the consumers were dissatisfied about the high price. After asking a 3rd party to research what the consumers want, we found out that the answers were “cheap price” and “mop cleaning”. The normal vacuum cleaners are not hard to use, but just gets lazy to do it. However, mopping requires strength so the consumers constantly found it needy. So I thought of making a robot cleaner that could mop.”

Of the former robot cleaners, there have been ones that also had the mopping feature. Because they only rely on their weight, they lacked strength like a child would mop. While Chung pondered about how to make it cheaper and still effectively clean, he thought of the car’s alignment, which measures the suspension and caster angles in the front of the car. Chung said, “the car wheels look like they are straight from the naked eye but they have intricate angles within that we cannot see. In order to make the circular mop rotating panel to rotate in a stationary position, it becomes harder to move around but changing angles to this allows for it to move forward. Our product cleans while rotating but also is made to move and work only with the rotating panel and the mop so that we could reduce the unit cost. Therefore, we produced a product, “Everybot,” that meets the practical needs.”

Attract the consumers with a unique identity.

Chung believes that the most important aspect in dominating over the market are unique product and idea, and he said, “the funny thing is that there are globally large-scale companies in the home electronics market but the middle and small sized companies tend to outstand them. This is because they begin with a unique idea and they are able to dominate the market. Also, I think that the design is as important as the technique in making a product. A lot of the products that the middle and small sized companies produce lack in the design aspect. We focus a lot on making the product design, catalog, and web skills all match in style and unique.” He also emphasized that he wants to grow the company and at the same time make everyone around the world think of “Everybot” for the personal service robot by using the B2B (Business to Business) method along with foreign companies to make more profit and provide techniques.

3 conditions to success: challenge, overcome, accomplishment

When Chung was young, he thought “how do people succeed?” and tried to look for the methods to success. The answer was pretty simple. It was “challenge.” He said that he needs to challenge himself because if he doesn’t do anything, nothing happens. Also, he believes that a strong will to “overcome” the obstacles is necessary after challenging himself and when various techniques harmoniously come together, he is able to “accomplish” something. So he highlighted those three words, challenge, overcome, and accomplishment. “We can’t live all our lives by just working and we need to enjoy our lives. We need to work hard and be competent in the social role outside and at home, we need to be great in taking part as the head of the family and a parent, spending good times with the kids.”

I wish the best for Everybot to be the world’s “Everybot” through Woochul Chung’s, CEO, endless challenges and passion for the better quality of life.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


There is so much to tell you about this marvel of technology that we’re running out of room! We want to bring this product to market, and to do that we need your help. In exchange for your generous contribution, we would like to invite you to be a part of autonomous cleaning history and help us bring the Everybot to every home. We have some interesting exclusives for our contributors and some one-of-a-kind rewards for our top backers. We consider this a unique opportunity to literally blaze a path for other time and money-saving household robots to follow, and we want to make sure all our customers and contributors get a top value for their financial contributions to our exciting campaign. Join us, and help us finally advance mop technology into the 21st century. Thank you for your time and generous contributions.

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Most engineers including CEO in R&

And, have the technical and human resource/system to cooperate with the global brand company.

EVERYBOT will introduce new products continually by own technology and new idea. In addition, EVERYBOT will develop new high-end cleaners to lead the market trend and service the convenience and freedom to customers by creativity and innovation. By launching the high-end robot mop cleaner and vacuum cleaner in Year 2017, EVERYBOT will be the specialized cleaner manufacturer. EVERTBOT will be Number 3 by Year 2020.

Ever have trouble locating a part for something? Not just who has it, but exactly the thing you are looking for?  How would you like to easily find a replacement part for something needing repairs and be reasonably certain that what you are ordering is nearly as exact as what you think you ordered?  How about never needing a part number?  3D Click-to-Buy(TM) from OpenGadget will allow you to do just that with a touch of the finger.  True point and click to add to your shopping cart...in 3D!

The idea for improving the ordering processes for us was actually hatched some 10 years ago at the office water cooler (yes really, before OpenGadget) with some colleagues who were working on their BMW.  It wasn't until working on a particularly difficult generator about 5 years ago that the idea actually stuck and I thought, ""Hey, this is possible.""  It took tossing out or replacing perfectly good digital cameras because the battery door would not stay closed and no one knew where to get replacements. It has taken another 3 years to develop the concept, processes, patents, research, endless meetings and even more field testing of ideas to get where we are today.  We are passionate about delivering the right parts and we found out that using 3D Click-to-Buy(TM) was fun!  When we show it to unsuspecting customers we can barely get our tablets away from them...seriously.  We even had one potential customer who said he knew nothing about computers.  When he saw the level of detail and how easy it was to point and click the parts he proudly yelled out to his team to ""come over here and look at this, let me show you how this is done.""  I don't think we saw the tablet for another 2 hours.

We think this is the ultimate field service tool so we are also working on mobile versions for tablets and smartphones.  When we have the application ready and you install the app on your device, you can download and take the instructions with you. Take them into the field or garage.  Need to order the part from your supplier while in the field? We can set up accounts to order in-house instead.  Your mobile device becomes the ultimate tool for field service work.
A Better Way to Shop - Especially for Hard to Find Things

Repairs can sometimes be difficult, but the most difficult aspect should not be in identifying the part you need.  Even then it can be a hassle to describe when it comes time to order.  Who remembers all those part numbers anyway?  Even the very best parts managers get tripped up. In a flat 2D world this problem happens every day. We have even been asked to help sort out ordering systems for auto dealerships because the order taking process is so difficult even for them. Either way, 3D Click-to-Buy(TM) will have you covered.
Remember the matching game?  It was kind of fun as a kid, but it isn't so fun when the repairs are costing you money.

You or your repairman plays this matching game every time with parts diagrams like the one above.  The diagram callout shows a little line pointing to the part you *think* its is pointing to, and then you must spend time trying to find the matching number or symbol on a separate list. Sometimes it takes an eternity to work the matching process the other way by finding the number in the list and then finding the right callout in the diagram.  It seems they never put them in the picture in any sort of correct order.

Shopping should not be a mind teaser, but playing the matching game can sure feel like it.  These two questions below are typical of the kinds of problems to tackle when identifying a part.  No these are not trick questions, promise! Use the 2D picture above.
• Is component that 2B523 callout is referring to pointing at the entire tube or just the connector in that tube?
• Does 2078 include the connection located where HM1 is supposed to go or is it only the lower portion?

Questions like these are asked of the employees at the parts counter all the time and it is frustrating for everyone waiting line.  We don't know the answers to these questions and neither did the parts person we asked.  His suggestion was that we order the parts with our credit card and then we would both know.  We said, ""No thank you!"" (By the way, did you notice there are two 2078  and two HM1 part numbers?)

That is not the way we want to do business and we highly suspect you don't either.  Good customer service would have just ordered them both for you but waiting and seeing is not very efficient either, for you or for the company you are ordering from.  And if it isn't the right one, everyone gets to start the process all over again.

With our patented 3D Click-to-Buy(TM) you simply click on the part you want and add it to your shopping cart. No more part numbers to jot down. No guesswork.  No more matching games.  Just a simple interface to locate the part you need.  If you need a part number for some reason, it will still be there, just in case.
These are all in 3D and can be broken down to find the parts just like in the video.

column3:
/>

Easily add the whole item or just the individual parts you need.  Simple!

column1:
We are specifically looking for funds to work on a very focused portion of software development so that we can start taking on testers in our open alpha and beta programs.  So much work has already been completed, but there are a few hurdles remaining to tie all of the pieces together.  That is where you come in!  All of the work so far has been part time and self funded.  Working late at night (ok through to early in the morning) and it starts to get in the way of day jobs. We think it is time to make the switch to full time, but we need your help.

Many of the perk levels will be granted access to the alpha and beta programs prior to public launch.  This will give us some valuable feedback on where we can make improvements but more importantly it gives you the opportunity to shape the product.  We know there will be some bugs to squash during this time and so we will reward our customers with priority specials and discounts just for being there through the testing periods.  We probably will have a few t-shirts and other cool gadgets to give away too, but it all depends on you.

If we are unable to reach our goal then we will only be able to provide a smaller number of items and it will take much longer before they are available to everyone.  But if we exceed our goal then we will be able to offer a much wider range of items and be able to work on some of the other exciting applications that we have in store and do it much sooner.  We would really like to step this up even more.  If you already like what you see we think we have even more cool features to add, but we need your help to get the first part completed.
T-Shirt, Coffee Mug, Cap (which of course will get delivered right away!)
What if during the testing I don't see anything I like?

Let us know and we will try to get it on our site as quickly as possible.  We know that right out of the gate the variety may contain items that will not apply to everyone.  Tell us what you need and we will make every attempt to get it on as quickly as possible.  However, as we grow we are pretty certain that we will have something for you and so at that point we offer you two options.  You can start your free shipping period anytime you want after the launch or you can pass your perk on to anyone that you choose, your best friend, a charity, anyone (except commercial business), it is up to you.  It is only a one time transfer and becomes active at the time of transfer so choose carefully.
I just see a bunch of pictures, how is this different from other shopping experiences? - Because the software will run on our servers or on a mobile device application the 3D features cannot be demonstrated here. The video shows an example of how someone might attempt to locate a number of parts with just their finger (or mouse) and eventually put them in their shopping cart.  The items can be moved in all directions and nearly unlimited levels of detail.  This is not just purely a magnifying glass to make it bigger, you can get in as close as you want, even inside the items.  Try doing that with other shopping sites.
How do I get what I want added to the list? - We will provide you with an email directly to us for the alpha and beta periods, so just tell us.  After these periods are over a special request feature will be added for a time and you will be issued a priority code (no you won't have to remember it) so that your requests are reviewed more quickly.
How can I get my items on the list? -  We will work directly with you to get your products loaded. There are several options that we have discovered work well for small part counts but not for larger items and vise versa.  We also offer the ability to show specific repairs or complete tear down in addition to the complete assembled component all with the same click and add to the cart technology.

","Ever have trouble locating a part for something? Not just who has it, but exactly the thing you are looking for?  How would you like to easily find a replacement part for something needing repairs and be reasonably certain that what you are ordering is nearly as exact as what you think you ordered?  How about never needing a part number?  3D Click-to-Buy(TM) from OpenGadget will allow you to do just that with a touch of the finger.  True point and click to add to your shopping cart...in 3D!

column1: The idea for improving the ordering processes for us was actually hatched some 10 years ago at the office water cooler (yes really, before OpenGadget) with some colleagues who were working on their BMW.  It wasn't until working on a particularly difficult generator about 5 years ago that the idea actually stuck and I thought, ""Hey, this is possible.""  It took tossing out or replacing perfectly good digital cameras because the battery door would not stay closed and no one knew where to get replacements. It has taken another 3 years to develop the concept, processes, patents, research, endless meetings and even more field testing of ideas to get where we are today.  We are passionate about delivering the right parts and we found out that using 3D Click-to-Buy(TM) was fun!  When we show it to unsuspecting customers we can barely get our tablets away from them...seriously.  We even had one potential customer who said he knew nothing about computers.  When he saw the level of detail and how easy it was to point and click the parts he proudly yelled out to his team to ""come over here and look at this, let me show you how this is done.""  I don't think we saw the tablet for another 2 hours.

We think this is the ultimate field service tool so we are also working on mobile versions for tablets and smartphones.  When we have the application ready and you install the app on your device, you can download and take the instructions with you. Take them into the field or garage.  Need to order the part from your supplier while in the field? We can set up accounts to order in-house instead.  Your mobile device becomes the ultimate tool for field service work.
A Better Way to Shop - Especially for Hard to Find Things

Repairs can sometimes be difficult, but the most difficult aspect should not be in identifying the part you need.  Even then it can be a hassle to describe when it comes time to order.  Who remembers all those part numbers anyway?  Even the very best parts managers get tripped up. In a flat 2D world this problem happens every day. We have even been asked to help sort out ordering systems for auto dealerships because the order taking process is so difficult even for them. Either way, 3D Click-to-Buy(TM) will have you covered.
Remember the matching game?  It was kind of fun as a kid, but it isn't so fun when the repairs are costing you money.

You or your repairman plays this matching game every time with parts diagrams like the one above.  The diagram callout shows a little line pointing to the part you *think* its is pointing to, and then you must spend time trying to find the matching number or symbol on a separate list. Sometimes it takes an eternity to work the matching process the other way by finding the number in the list and then finding the right callout in the diagram.  It seems they never put them in the picture in any sort of correct order.

Shopping should not be a mind teaser, but playing the matching game can sure feel like it.  These two questions below are typical of the kinds of problems to tackle when identifying a part.  No these are not trick questions, promise! Use the 2D picture above.
Is component that 2B523 callout is referring to pointing at the entire tube or just the connector in that tube?
Does 2078 include the connection located where HM1 is supposed to go or is it only the lower portion?

Questions like these are asked of the employees at the parts counter all the time and it is frustrating for everyone waiting line.  We don't know the answers to these questions and neither did the parts person we asked.  His suggestion was that we order the parts with our credit card and then we would both know.  We said, ""No thank you!"" (By the way, did you notice there are two 2078  and two HM1 part numbers?)

That is not the way we want to do business and we highly suspect you don't either.  Good customer service would have just ordered them both for you but waiting and seeing is not very efficient either, for you or for the company you are ordering from.  And if it isn't the right one, everyone gets to start the process all over again.

With our patented 3D Click-to-Buy(TM) you simply click on the part you want and add it to your shopping cart. No more part numbers to jot down. No guesswork.  No more matching games.  Just a simple interface to locate the part you need.  If you need a part number for some reason, it will still be there, just in case.
These are all in 3D and can be broken down to find the parts just like in the video.
Easily add the whole item or just the individual parts you need.  Simple!
What We Need & What You Get

FAQ
What are the differences between the Whome, Lifx ,Hue or Sonos?

Highly integrated with strong scalability, along with HUE, Sonos and other equipment function, we offer great advantages for the KickStarter early bird price making Whome very cost effective for its exceptionally high quality.

We use a heat resistant material of the highest quality from the world's top speaker manufacturer that is able to meet the Whome’s heating demands. The Whome speaker cavity contains a part aluminum and part heat resistant material that functions consistently in temperatures under 100 ℃. At the same time, the speaker comes with a rising vibration basin that can reduce the horn effect effectively. This ensures the best sound quality. In order to make the small speakers with enough bass capability, we made an accurate alignment of module. Now, we are proud to tell you that we have created an outstanding music speaker module that can provide us with a new 80Hz~20KHz range of sound.

A ‘Media’ is a combination of our unique three-dimensional multimedia elements of the Whome music platform. Whome including the color of light on your Whome bulb, music playing, pictures displayed and text shown, etc.. The user can through the Whome self starter share these personalized pieces of content with friends through our social application.
