What if every scientist had access to the latest technology?  What could be accomplished?  We want to find out.
Through the non-profit Seeding Labs, ten Scientists with limited resources and from all over the world have requested our
portable, DNA amplification platform called the Smart-DART Platform.  The Smart-DART Platform will expand the tools and methods available to these Scientists and will
improve their research on topics such as food security or disease detection.
meet our fundraising goal, we will be able to provide a Smart-DART Platform (Device, App, and Tablet) to TEN resource-limited scientists and jump start production for our newest devices.
For every FOUR Smart-DART Devices purchased beyond our fundraising goal we will donate an additional Smart-DART Platform to a scientist identified by Seeding Labs.
These Scientists are doing invaluable work for their community, from helping
improve food security to better detecting diseases.  To see profiles of
all ten scientists click here.

The Smart-DART Platform is one of the only portable, real-time, DNA amplification technologies on the market.  The Platform is currently being used by researchers in numerous Federal agencies, universities, and private industry.

It supports any isothermal amplification method and has been used successfully with the following amplification methods: LAMP (Loop Mediated Isothermal Amplification), RPA (Recombinase Polyermase Amplification), and NEAR (Nicking Enzyme Amplification Reaction).
Through this campaign we are offering for the first time our 3rd generation, Smart-DART
8-well Device and our newly developed Single-Well Device.  Each device
includes the Smart-DART App (Android only), which controls the device and provides

The Single-Well Device is so small it easily fit in your pocket.  It is perfect for those customers who have extremely low test volume and with extreme space constraints.  With a very low price, it also provides a great opportunity for those new to DNA amplification to expand their tool set. 

The 8-Well Device V.3.0 fits in the palm of your hand and suits those seeking to transition their existing lab testing to on-site testing.  It builds upon our base model V.2.5 (shown in the videos) by incorporating feedback from our early customers and supporters.

Diagenetix, Inc. is founded by researchers with over 30 cumulative years experience in molecular and biological research, engineering, and business.   Our mission is to develop tools and solutions for scientists and researchers to better understand the microbial world around us.
The Smart-DART Platform have been fully developed. We currently

have units being used in varying Federal agencies, universities, and private organizations.  We have fully functional Smart-DART 8-Well V.3.0 and the Smart-DART Single-Well Devices.  We are finalizing material choices and aesthetic related components in preparation of mass manufacturing.  The Smart-DART App is fully developed.

column3:
>...................................................

1.  PURCHASING AND SHIPPING

When will I receive my Smart-DART Platform?  Your Smart-DART Platform (Device and Smart-DART App) will be shipped by February 2015.  We will provide consistent updates throughout the production process and notify you as your order becomes ready for shipping.

Where do you ship?  We will ship to all locations FedEx or UPS delivers to.

Is there a warranty for the Smart-DART Platform?  Yes.  Each Smart-DART Device and its associated Smart-DART App comes with a 1 year replacement warranty.

2.  COMPATIBILITY

The Smart-DART App is Android based.   It has been extensively used with Google Nexus tablets.  We are currently working to resolve incompatibility with the Bluetooth components contained in Samsung tablets and Smart phones.

There are plans to expand support for iOS in the near future.

3.  DONATED SMART-DART PLATFORMS

Each Scientist will be provided a Smart-DART Device and an Android based tablet with the Smart-DART App pre-installed and paired to the accompanying Device.   Additionally, included on each tablet will be a digital tutorial explaining how to utilize the tablet and Smart-DART Platform.

4.  SEEDING LABS

Seeding Labs is a 501c3 non-profit  that invests in exceptional scientists in developing countries who

support vital research and create a more connected global scientific
provided used laboratory equipment and training to over 15,000
scientists, researchers and students at 29 institutions in 22

countries.

On our behalf Seeding Labs reached out to their network of scientists throughout Africa, Central and South America, and Southeast Asia to find those who need the Smart-DART Platforms.   

We mutually hope this campaign can be an extension of the great work they do.

We are Sustʻāina ble Molokai. Our mission is to
maintain our island's rich culture and historic legacy of ʻāina momona
(abundant land) and embrace modern pathways to a sustainable future. Our
objectives include creating an environmentally, economically, and culturally
sustainable and self-sufficient island that serves as a model for Hawaiʻi and
the world.  We focus on education,

column2: identify existing community assets and inherent
and we fill complementary roles that advance local efforts.

column1: As a strong native community, we take kuleana (responsibility) as the
architects of our own destiny, knowing that homegrown solutions work best. Our
current work is focused within the following program areas:  Molokai-pedia (a database for the island),
Food Security, Energy Independence, Watershed Restoration, and Green Economic

Development.

*For all donations of any size, if we receive enough funding to build our prototype structure, we will send you updates and photos from the build that you helped to make possible.
column5:
> video, for a broader overview of our project and organization:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JyqPL-Tcvr8

column1: island where close to 100% of everything we eat, build with, wear and use is
imported. Molokai, like many islands, has had to contend with poor agricultural
choices, which have created erosion and denuded the soil, causing harm to reefs
and endangering traditional fishing areas. As we looked to address these
environmental concerns, we realized we could alleviate two unsustainable
problems with one giant bamboo! We are proposing to plant 17 acres of bamboo in
a watershed restoration area that will work as a carbon sink for greenhouse gas
emissions, hold soil, and bring down precipitation. By using structural bamboo,
we can address the issue of affordable housing on Molokai. Hawaii has the
highest cost of living in the United States, and Molokai has the highest cost
Rich Van Wellsheim, from Whispering Winds Bamboo on Maui. Whispering Winds has
been growing and processing bamboo for ten years, and Rich was working with a
young and innovative architect named Yuliya Bentcheva. Yuliya had designed a simple
strapping system that holds bamboo in place—a lovely, innovative, modular
design we are calling the Molokai Ohana House. It is small enough to be
affordable for tropical outdoor living, is a safe space against inclement
weather, has simple lines, is made of renewable material, and can all be grown
years to grow before the first harvest, so to get us started we are hoping,
with your help, to purchase raw bamboo materials from Whispering Winds to build
our first prototype. Although much of the world already builds with bamboo, for
our island community it is a new concept. We want to initiate and introduce
bamboo to the island with a structure people can stand in, touch and see. Once
the structure is up, and people are able to interact with it, we are confident
the community will embrace this building material.
the investor, and bamboo believer, can come in! We need the raw materials to
build this prototype, and for that we need your help. Our goal is to raise
$5,000 to purchase the raw materials and to cover any labor costs.
forefront of creating a sustainable model for rural economies around the world,
make possible the first affordable bamboo structure on the island, and
help us to further fine tune the design and cost. This design and “grow your
own house” concept could change the lives of thousands of families, providing
sustainable, affordable housing to the people who need it most.
$7,000 for the first structure. We now have $2,000 from a grant, but as this is
the proto-type, we will not really understand the true cost of everything until
we build it. We will also be training local youth in the bamboo building

column2: so some of the funds will be directed towards securing building tools.

column1: using it as a construction material will help to lower the carbon footprint of
those on the island. It will also help us create safe and secure housing for
sustainablemolokai.org to check out our other great projects. Read our blog,
learn about our school gardens, check out our Agricultural and Energy needs
assessments, and follow our food map to local organic produce on Molokai.
to give funding we would still love your help getting the word out on social
media about our project. We appreciate so much that you've taken the time to

read our proposal. 

Architect and Molokai artist Donald Sunshine has completed his watercolor rendition of the Bamboo Ohana Homes Structure. We have 20 signed prints ready to send off... we are so enthralled with the beauty of this vision!

objectives include creating an environmentally, economically, and culturally
sustainable and self-sufficient island that serves as a model for Hawaiʻi and
the world.  We focus on education,

column2: identify existing community assets and inherent
and we fill complementary roles that advance local efforts.

column1: As a strong native community, we take kuleana (responsibility) as the
architects of our own destiny, knowing that homegrown solutions work best. Our
current work is focused within the following program areas:  Molokai-pedia (a database for the island),
Food Security, Energy Independence, Watershed Restoration, and Green Economic

Development.*For all donations of any size, if we receive enough funding to build our prototype structure, we will send you updates and photos from the build that you helped to make possible. Follow this link to a separate video, for a broader overview of our project and organization:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JyqPL-Tcvr8
island where close to 100% of everything we eat, build with, wear and use is
imported. Molokai, like many islands, has had to contend with poor agricultural
choices, which have created erosion and denuded the soil, causing harm to reefs
and endangering traditional fishing areas. As we looked to address these
environmental concerns, we realized we could alleviate two unsustainable
problems with one giant bamboo! We are proposing to plant 17 acres of bamboo in
a watershed restoration area that will work as a carbon sink for greenhouse gas
emissions, hold soil, and bring down precipitation. By using structural bamboo,
we can address the issue of affordable housing on Molokai. Hawaii has the
highest cost of living in the United States, and Molokai has the highest cost
Rich Van Wellsheim, from Whispering Winds Bamboo on Maui. Whispering Winds has
been growing and processing bamboo for ten years, and Rich was working with a
young and innovative architect named Yuliya Bentcheva. Yuliya had designed a simple
strapping system that holds bamboo in place—a lovely, innovative, modular
design we are calling the Molokai Ohana House. It is small enough to be
affordable for tropical outdoor living, is a safe space against inclement
weather, has simple lines, is made of renewable material, and can all be grown
years to grow before the first harvest, so to get us started we are hoping,
with your help, to purchase raw bamboo materials from Whispering Winds to build
our first prototype. Although much of the world already builds with bamboo, for
our island community it is a new concept. We want to initiate and introduce
bamboo to the island with a structure people can stand in, touch and see. Once
the structure is up, and people are able to interact with it, we are confident
the community will embrace this building material.
the investor, and bamboo believer, can come in! We need the raw materials to
build this prototype, and for that we need your help. Our goal is to raise
$5,000 to purchase the raw materials and to cover any labor costs.
forefront of creating a sustainable model for rural economies around the world,
make possible the first affordable bamboo structure on the island, and
help us to further fine tune the design and cost. This design and “grow your
own house” concept could change the lives of thousands of families, providing
sustainable, affordable housing to the people who need it most.
$7,000 for the first structure. We now have $2,000 from a grant, but as this is
the proto-type, we will not really understand the true cost of everything until
we build it. We will also be training local youth in the bamboo building

Gixie Clock is a modern device that reproduces the retro beauty of Nixie tube displays.

 

Regarding the Bluetooth version of Gixie Clock, we have implemented some features and are now developing smoothly.

Gixie Clock uses probes and magnets, so you can change each tube at will. You don't have to worry about the time after the power failure, because we have added a clock chip inside, to ensure that the clock can continue to be clocked after the power is turned off.

We use WS2812LED, its color is adjustable, and its life is very long. 

Gixie Clock meet raw wood and steel in an uber-cool material combination that’s very in-mode right now. 

You can decorate the Gixie Clock in many places.I believe that its unique display will attract a lot of people.

The outer casing of Gixie Clock is made of aluminum alloy. We offer black, silver and red.
column2:
>How to use Gixie Clock

The Gixie Clock is rated at 5V and you can use any 5V USB adapter to make it work.

We also offer the Gixie Clock Kit, You need to assemble the parts yourself and solder the PCB with a soldering iron.Make sure you can finish it!

It’s important that you must be logged into your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo’s share link. You can share the Gixie Clock link to facebook, Twitter or other websites. If someone uses your link to purchase the Gixie Clock, I can see it in the background.

 

 

Risk &
column3:
Challenges

Although this is our first time to participate in the Indiegogo campaign,But we have enough confidence. the electronic product design and production are no strangers to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. 

When do we start shipping?

Estimated delivery|Our first products will be shipped from our factory in February 2019.

Do you offer Warranty ? 

Yes, we offer 12 months Limited warranty against factory defects. 

Can the Gixie Clock be charged?

Can't charge because Gixie Clock has no battery.

Hi! We are Amy Yahna and Brian Musician of Alambria Springs Farm!

10 years ago we moved to this beautiful land to build our off the grid timber-framed straw-bale home and establish an organic vegetable farm. For our farm operation to be successful it required building additional infrastructure, establishing markets, expanding our growing plots to meet those markets, and the knowledge to accomplish all of the above.  Now, we grow over 200 varieties of organic vegetables, herbs, and fruit using bio-dynamic and organic practices on 12 acres of land. Presently, we grow for our local community supported market share members, restaurants, colleges, and farmers markets. Recently, we have made a connection with a wholesale distributors in NYC. We are passionate about building our local economy an passionate about what we do!

Our passion to feed our surrounding communities healthy and nutritious foods led us to discover the benefits of fermented foods, most particularly sourdough breads. We then built a small earthen oven because the nutritional value of the sourdough breads are enhanced by the traditional baking environment of an earthen/masonry oven design. The response has been so great that we have outgrown our little earthen oven and we need to replace it with a larger masonry oven and support building to continue to meet the ever growing demand for our nutritious artisan sourdough breads. The many benefits of our bread baking are enjoyed by people living in over 5 counties in our surrounding area. By building our oven we will be helping to support the local farmers, millers, masons, carpenters, as well as provide nutritious food for our local communities. How supporting our project also has a larger impact is by helping to build grain production in the NE as an alternative to the mid-western grain belt. This also improves soil health when small grains are grown on farm land in a sustainable manner that would otherwise be used for corn, soybeans, etc. This encourages the local small sustainable farmer to choose small grains as an alternative. This stimulates the building of local mills that have the capacity to freshly mill small grains and alternative grains upon demand which leads to a greater variety of healthy flours available for local consumption. As this demonstrates our project multiples your contributions on many levels! This is community building, food security, and health all in one!

Initially, we thought we would grow the grains and mill them on the farm but recently discovered a local initiative already underway that has created a team of artisan crafters who are growing and milling the grains in the NE. Two members of this team include Elizabeth Dyke of Organic Growers Research and Information Sharing Network www.ogrin.org and Greg Mohl from Farmer Ground Flour www.farmergroundflour.squarespace.com and his supporting farmers.

Additionally, other members of our project team include John Sullivan and Sons Inc, the masons who will construct our masonry oven, Ron Jones of Ron Jones carpentry who will build the support building that will house the oven and additional work space.

Our funding goal is $30,000 to complete our project. Your contributions will be used to construct a larger masonry ""white"" oven, a building to protect the oven and provide work space around the oven, additional butcher blocks, counter space, coolers, a large elliptical mixer, and other necessary baking supplies.

We have some exciting perks to offer our contributors! Our exciting perks include some of the following: recipes for your own sourdough loaves, donations to the local food bank, bags of freshly milled Farmer Ground Flour, your very own ""Bread Share"", personal invitation to our Farm to Table dinner, and a ""Bread of the Month"" club and more!

If for some reason that we do not reach our funding goal the money that we raise will be applied to the construction of a new ""black"" masonry oven. The traditional black oven is an oven where the burning chamber and baking chamber are one in the same and is less expensive to build. This is in contrast to the ""white"" oven where the burning chamber is separate from the baking chamber which allows for a continuous fire and uninterrupted baking session. We prefer the ""white"" oven design as it is a more efficient use of our resources(wood, time, and energy)!
Today the small family farm is in decline with more often than not one partner working off farm to help support the farm operation.

Our oven project will further diversify our income stream thus allowing both of us to continue to remain on the farm. And in turn will help keep Alambria Springs Farm viable into the future and help support and save a host of other small businesses in our area. This is rebuilding of America from the ""grain"" roots up, empowering people to take back their communities and their lives and to create abundance for all! This is true community building!
In addition to your financial contribution, we would ask you to please share our project with all of your contacts. You can use the ""share tools"" located on the Indiegogo site to help you do this.

If you are unable to make a financial contribution we like to ask you to pass this along to all of your contacts who may be able to do so at this time. In addition, you may wish to volunteer your time at Alambria Spring Farm this season. We are always excited to share our adventures with others who come with willing hearts and hands!
Our communities are ours and we thank you deeply for helping in our efforts to build our ""collective"" community!

All my life... all 27 years of it, those who know me well, know that I have dreamed of owning a Ducati... Well for right now, that dream has been put on hold.. and has given way to a less expensive one. Approx 1/30th the expense. But still expensive enough. Not that I can't afford it, but hey... thought will give this a shot! Who knows? 

So here it goes... Help me, buy the 'Speciallized Allez Elite' (MRP ~ Rs 93,000\-) bicycle, for the 28 year old Dhruvan on his birthday.

Have researched long hours to figure out that is the exact bicycle I want, and it just looks dreamy, doesn't it? Plus with the last 8 months being spent on preparing for my first triathlon, I have come to realize the importance of owning a good bicycle.

So rather than buy me a meaningless birthday gift, I urge family and friends to contribute the same towards the fund to help me get my hands on this. Show some love won't you now?

Since the government only gives handouts to big corporations that don’t need it and Wall Street banks are run by a bunch of crooks, entrepreneurs have no where to when it comes to getting their products into mainstream retail.

That’s our present situation at Greensations. We have one of the greatest products to hit the personal energy market since Red Bull. It’s Turbo Snort, the worlds’ first caffeine nasal spray. Turbo Snort uses naturally derived herbal extracts, caffeine and essential amino acids to provide instant lasting energy without the side effects of pills, shots or drinks.

Caffeine is the best proven drug for mental focus, but when you take too much – it actually works against you. You feel awake, but you’re unproductive because you can’t completely focus on anything. Turbo Snort delivers tiny doses of caffeine directly into the nervous system so you get all the good benefits of caffeine without the side effects.

Best of all it works for anyone at every level of caffeine sensitivity. If you’re not a big caffeine user, two squirts of Turbo Snort provides up to 5 hours of useable energy like a small cup of coffee. If you’re a big caffeine user, just snort more for a bigger boost. It’s basically a new way for everyone to get the right amount of energy for their personal needs.

Since we launched Turbo Snort earlier this year, it’s been growing fast, but we just can’t afford to advertise the way big companies do. Our goal is to run a direct response campaign to introduce Turbo Snort to the world, but we just can’t afford the kind of campaign it would take to make a real impact.

The plan is to start our big ad campaign on the Howard Stern Show on Sirus. Howard Stern gives the best bang for the buck when it comes to reaching a national audience these days. His radio show has a bigger audience than most well known national tv shows and his listeners are the perfect target group for Turbo Snort. Best of all, we can create some commercials that are really outside the box. It’s all about marketing where you’ll have the biggest impact and we know what to do. We just don’t have enough money to do it.

So we’re turning to you to help us achieve this dream. To show our gratitude for your donations we’re adding some cool perks. Along with our extreme thanks, we’re giving out free bottles of Turbo Snort and exclusive coupon codes to save up to 50% Off Turbo Snort at our website.

Check out our company, Greensations on the web and you’ll see that we’re for real. Our unique products are sold by hundreds of small retailers. We have grown from nothing to having four employees in just 24 months, but we just cannot break through to the next level. Several of our products have been featured on Dr. Oz, The Doctors and in the New York Times. We’re doing our part to help bring the economy back, and all we need is a little capital to start advertising.

We think Turbo Snort will become the next big thing, and you’ll be helping us create jobs to strengthen the American Dream that seems to have disappeared many of us. It’s time for people to back each other and help new entrepreneurs get their products to market. After all, it’s the entrepreneurs who will bring the world economy back into gear – not the giant corporations.
And as we like to say…don’t drink your energy – snort it with Turbo Snort.

Ingredients: 2X Green Tea, 4X Guarana, 7X Spearmint. Other Ingredients: Purified Water, Proprietary Amino Acid Complex (Creatine, Glutamine, Taurine, Caffeine - 0.96 mg per metered spray), Vitamin C (as Citric Acid).

column7:

Digipot is a computer-based flower pot that ensures regular and accurate circulation of  water for your flowers.
column9: >stylish furnishment with support   functions decorating the house or office.
column11:
>Digipot flower pots are both lightweight and extremely durable, made from a tough fiberglass exterior that is 100% waterproof. 

Using Non-corrosive &
column12:
maintenance-free materials will require only soapy water for normal cleaning. Easily withstands harsh elements without fear of cracking, splitting or warping. 

Best quality material will provide a long-lasting, protective finish that is resistant to fading, scratching, chipping and even intense UV light, for a new or weathered look that maintains its character day after day. 

Our digipot will be perfectly suitable for homes, hotels and gardens. We are planning to produce Digipot in two different sizes, one fitting most of the places under window, on desks or working tables and one bigger for palms or other big beautiful plants.  


Specifications and Goals


If our campaign will be successful and we will raise enough money to make digipot came into life, we are planning to invest in various enhancements. 

Our dream is to produce Digipot that is not only smart enough to water your flowers but also connect to you and provides you a lot of different information. 

After our first goal is completed, we will make our best effort to raise enough money to add soil moisture sensors, thermometer and barometer. Then we will add Wi-Fi module and create application for you smartphones ( both iOS and Android ) which will make you to be able to view all the necessary info and eventually water your flowers from anywhere around the world just by few taps on your phone . In the best case scenario we will also make digital flower library where you will be able to pick the one you have and digipot will automatically calculate the best soil moisture and temperature conditions for your flower.
column20:
/>

Digipot matt color series

Digipot light color series

 Digipot art series


Color variations video

column1: product that is designed to bring more comfort into your everyday life. We believe in our product but we need a starting push to bring digipot into life.
list of what will happen to the funds that are raised:
is complete, we will immediately invest the money for the above expenses.

Updates will be sent on completion of  each phase, keeping supporters informed.

Where will money go:


1. We will spend approx. $ 11,000 to buy all components to assembly our first prototype. This contains 4 different sizes of pot, from which we will choose two that will perfectly fit our needs and will have perfect sizes for both:
column5: >Smaller for desk or window sills
column9:
>Bigger for garden or stand alone flowersother than that, we will buy several displays, water pumps and other accessories needed to assembly first prototype with the best possible quality. 
In addition, if we will rise enought money, we will also need to buy different senzors like soil moisture senzor, thermometer and barometer and of course Wi-Fi module for connecting your digipot with mobile device. 

2. We will produce 10 Digipots with different functionalities from which we will choose the best ones to go for sale. This investment will be around $ 4,000 because we are planning to work with different components 

3. We will either choose manofaturer, that will perfectly fit our needs and high quality standard and place order for first 100 early birds of Digipot that we will distribute to our backers and contributors. 

4. If we will rise more money than our goal, we will start to work on iOS and Android applications that will make possible to water your flowers from anywhere around the world anytime with only few taps of your finger. This application will also provide you lot of information about your flower and conditions - gathering info from all senzors. 


 OUR SPECIAL PERKS


  DIGIPOT FEATURES
column13:
>SMART

Digipot will automatically water your flowers on a regular basis, let you know when water tank is low on water providing the best care for your flowers.

QUALITY

Our goal is to use only the best quality materials and cooperate with manufacturers with a long-established history. 

AESTHETIC

Digipot features an exclusive modern design in different colors that will perfectly fit any interior or exterior decor.

REMARKABLE

Innovative and stylish, modern and intense.
column14:
>EASY-TO-USE

Easy to use operation of Digipot with smart button and beautiful display.
column19:
>ABOUT US

We are a group of enthusiastic people with a dream to create a quality product that will satisfy even the most demanding customers in both, design and functionality. 

Our first challenge is to produce our first prototype of Digipot with premium quality. Only after we will be 100% satisfied with our product, we will hire manofacturer able to fulfil our standards. 


Other Ways You Can Help
column25: >If you are interested in our product and you just can’t contribute, you can still help us. Share our project via different social media and blogs, we will be more than grateful!
column30:
>FAQ

Q: I notice that the funding for this is flexible, so what happens if you don't reach the goal?
A : We have lots of trust in our product an we will spend every single dollar to bring Digipot from idea to real deals. This means, creating and finishing Digipot is not only our dream but also our liability. We will create a videos from our workshop with updates how far we are.
column38:
> Do you offer any warranty? Will you ship worldwide?

A: After we will obtain all necessary certificates we will ship Digipot worldwide and also we will offer international warranty for at least one or two years
column46:
>What about your team members John? It looks like you are alone.

A : We are making the video from our workshop where I will introduce you to people that will be responsible for this project and also amazing things that we came up with. I will keep you posted
column48:

","Product  Digipot is a computer-based flower pot that ensures regular and accurate circulation of  water for your flowers. It is also a stylish furnishment with support   functions decorating the house or office. Digipot flower pots are both lightweight and extremely durable, made from a tough fiberglass exterior that is 100% waterproof. Using Non-corrosive & maintenance-free materials will require only soapy water for normal cleaning. Easily withstands harsh elements without fear of cracking, splitting or warping. Best quality material will provide a long-lasting, protective finish that is resistant to fading, scratching, chipping and even intense UV light, for a new or weathered look that maintains its character day after day. Our digipot will be perfectly suitable for homes, hotels and gardens. We are planning to produce Digipot in two different sizes, one fitting most of the places under window, on desks or working tables and one bigger for palms or other big beautiful plants.  Specifications and GoalsIf our campaign will be successful and we will raise enough money to make digipot came into life, we are planning to invest in various enhancements. Our dream is to produce Digipot that is not only smart enough to water your flowers but also connect to you and provides you a lot of different information. After our first goal is completed, we will make our best effort to raise enough money to add soil moisture sensors, thermometer and barometer. Then we will add Wi-Fi module and create application for you smartphones ( both iOS and Android ) which will make you to be able to view all the necessary info and eventually water your flowers from anywhere around the world just by few taps on your phone . In the best case scenario we will also make digital flower library where you will be able to pick the one you have and digipot will automatically calculate the best soil moisture and temperature conditions for your flower. Digipot classic seriesDigipot gender seriesDigipot matt color seriesDigipot light color series Digipot art seriesColor variations video What We Need & What You GetDigipot is a

column1: product that is designed to bring more comfort into your everyday life. We believe in our product but we need a starting push to bring digipot into life.
list of what will happen to the funds that are raised:
is complete, we will immediately invest the money for the above expenses.

Updates will be sent on completion of  each phase, keeping supporters informed.Where will money go:1. We will spend approx. $ 11,000 to buy all components to assembly our first prototype. This contains 4 different sizes of pot, from which we will choose two that will perfectly fit our needs and will have perfect sizes for both:Smaller for desk or window sills Bigger for garden or stand alone flowersother than that, we will buy several displays, water pumps and other accessories needed to assembly first prototype with the best possible quality. In addition, if we will rise enought money, we will also need to buy different senzors like soil moisture senzor, thermometer and barometer and of course Wi-Fi module for connecting your digipot with mobile device. 2. We will produce 10 Digipots with different functionalities from which we will choose the best ones to go for sale. This investment will be around $ 4,000 because we are planning to work with different components 3. We will either choose manofaturer, that will perfectly fit our needs and high quality standard and place order for first 100 early birds of Digipot that we will distribute to our backers and contributors. 4. If we will rise more money than our goal, we will start to work on iOS and Android applications that will make possible to water your flowers from anywhere around the world anytime with only few taps of your finger. This application will also provide you lot of information about your flower and conditions - gathering info from all senzors.  OUR SPECIAL PERKS  DIGIPOT FEATURESSMARTDigipot will automatically water your flowers on a regular basis, let you know when water tank is low on water providing the best care for your flowers.QUALITYOur goal is to use only the best quality materials and cooperate with manufacturers with a long-established history. AESTHETICDigipot features an exclusive modern design in different colors that will perfectly fit any interior or exterior decor.REMARKABLEInnovative and stylish, modern and intense.EASY-TO-USEEasy to use operation of Digipot with smart button and beautiful display. ABOUT USWe are a group of enthusiastic people with a dream to create a quality product that will satisfy even the most demanding customers in both, design and functionality. Our first challenge is to produce our first prototype of Digipot with premium quality. Only after we will be 100% satisfied with our product, we will hire manofacturer able to fulfil our standards. Other Ways You Can HelpSpread the word If you are interested in our product and you just can’t contribute, you can still help us. Share our project via different social media and blogs, we will be more than grateful!FAQQ: I notice that the funding for this is flexible, so what happens if you don't reach the goal?A : We have lots of trust in our product an we will spend every single dollar to bring Digipot from idea to real deals. This means, creating and finishing Digipot is not only our dream but also our liability. We will create a videos from our workshop with updates how far we are. Q: Do you offer any warranty? Will you ship worldwide?A: After we will obtain all necessary certificates we will ship Digipot worldwide and also we will offer international warranty for at least one or two years Q: What about your team members John? It looks like you are alone.A : We are making the video from our workshop where I will introduce you to people that will be responsible for this project and also amazing things that we came up with. I will keep you posted For any other questions feel free to write us an email at media.digipot@gmail.com",8.0,1,"1 Campaign

Don't miss ROIDMI's latest vacuum cleaner. Click to Learn more:
What the media says about Roidmi F8 Storm

Traditional vacuum cleaners with cords are heavy and not very user-friendly. But upgraded, cordless vacuum cleaners often aren't as powerful as their bigger counterparts.. After extensive work, Roidmi came up with its latest F8 Storm vacuum cleaner, a combination of powerful suction and lightweight construction.

Powered by an 100,000 rpm brushless DC motor,the Roidmi F8 Storm generates strong suction power. It's engineered to capture ingrained dirt and mess from carpets, crevices in the floor, and even mattresses. The digital motor generates up to 18,5KPa centrifugal air pressure, effectively removes the dust on the ground.

We use simplicity as a design concept to achieve an all-white attractive exterior while allowing the cleaner to remain lightweight and user-friendly. The 270-degree curved, large handle designed for easy gripping works with various cleaning heads for different tasks.

A high-performance Samsung lithium battery provides up to 55 minutes of powerful suction while in standard mode, covering an estimated area of 350 square meters (3800 square feet). The battery can last up to 10 minutes while the vacuum is in max mode, giving enough operating power to deep-clean your home.  In addition, an intelligent power management system ensures the battery is used to its full capacity each time.

With its four-layer filtration system, the Roidmi F8 Storm intercepts hair, dust, allergens and dirt, resulting in cleaner air. The filtration system absorbs participles as small as PM0.3,  purifying up to 99% of your air.

With its variety of swappable cleaning heads and tools, the vacuum cleaner allows for easy adaptation to any kind of cleaning chore. Its unique self-driven cleaning function also makes cleaning effortless. The Roidmi F8 Storm has a built-in DC motor in the brush head, which transfers torque more efficiently, making for more powerful and deeper cleaning.

The Roidmi F8 Storm easily transforms into a handheld vacuum cleaner with a anti-mite brush to clean mattress. The electric brush employs flexible nylon bristles combined with a rubber strip to remove mites, germs, hair, and dander from deep within fabrics.
Innovative Magnetic Holder for 2-in-1 Charging and Storing

The vacuum's magnetic holder is designed for easy storage.  Simply bring your Roidmi F8 Storm near enough and it will automatically 'stick'. With a charger installed next to the holder, the Roidmi F8 Storm will always be ready whenever you need it.
The vacuum has a searchlight combined with a photosensitive sensor. When cleaning in dark places, the light automatically turns on.
With its cord-free versatility, the cleaner is light and small enough to reach every nook inside the car.

You can connect the Roidmi F8 Storm to your smartphone via Bluetooth technology. With the Roidmi Intelligent Life App, you can check battery usage, filter capacity,  and receive alerts to empty the vacuum. The app even tells you how many calories you’ve burned while cleaning.
Roidmi F8 Storm has great PERFORMANCE and PRICE

The Roidmi F8 Storm employs the four-layer filtration system, which intercepts hair, dust, allergens and dirt, resulting in a cleaner air. The filtration system absorbs participles as small as PM0.3, purifying up to 99% of your air. The replaceable filter can last up to 90 days. It is recommended to wash or change the filter every three months.
Now, you have the opportunity to get 1 filter for FREE just by sharing our Indiegogo campaign to any of your social media sites. It takes less than 60 seconds and is super easy to do.

Step 1: Just click on the Facebook or Twitter share button at the top right corner of the campaign page, right beside the “BACK IT” button. Or generate your own link to share on your personal blog, Instagram, or anywhere you want.

Step 2: Once you’ve done that, go to our “COMMENTS” page and: - Let us know you shared our campaign. Write something as simple as: “Just shared on my Facebook (insert the link here) and I’m so excited about the Roidmi F8 Storm because its lightweight design and powerful suction makes cleaning effortless”. That’s it!

Mass Production

Work With Partners:

Follow us on social media

FAQ

Q1: Why won't my Roidmi F8 vacuum cleaner start after I press the power button?
A1: Hold the power button for more than 2 seconds to start the vacuum. If the battery is low, charge the vacuum and then restart it.

Q2: How many modes does Roidmi F8 have? How strong is the suction?
A2: Roidmi F8 has two work modes, standard mode and max mode.  Standard mode is strong enough for daily household use. You can switch between standard and max modes depending on your needs. You also can switch among three more suction modes freely using the app.

Q3: How long does it take for the Roidmi F8 to fully charge after the battery runs out?
A3: It takes about 2.5 hours to fully charge the battery after normal use.

Q4: How long can each mode last after the product is fully charged?
A4: Roidmi F8 uses LG's 8-cell 2500mAh 18650 Li-ion battery.  The maximum operating time for max mode is 10 minutes, while the maximum duration for standard mode is 55 minutes. Battery life may also vary depending on operating  environment and length of use.  


Q5: If I fully charge the Roidmi F8 and then don't use or charge it afterwards, how long can the battery last?
A5: If you're not using your Roidmi F8, only the Bluetooth function will consume power. Battery life can last up to one year after being fully charged. 

Q6: What’s the adapter's voltage range?
A6: The adapter has a wide voltage range and can be used worldwide. We supply an EU-standard plug to IGG backers. You can also purchase plug accessories separately.

Q7: Is the Roidmi app necessary when using the vacuum?
A7: Roidmi F8 can be used normally without the app. Refer to the manual for detailed instructions. However, using the app gives you useful information about the state and better life of the vacuum cleaner. 


Q8: How long does the warranty for the  Roidmi F8 vacuum cleaner last?
A8: The warranty for the vacuum lasts for one year. The filter is disposable and does not come with a warranty.

Say Hello to Trivae

A handy kitchen tool and tabletop accessory that holds lids while cooking and then transforms into a display stand and a trivet (small or large) for serving and entertaining. With its chic, modern design, it's the perfect kitchen assistant that fits seamlessly with any kitchen decor and goes with you from the kitchen to the dinner table when your meal is ready to serve. For a casual dinner with the family or a large, formal party, this tool is the perfect complement for any occasion.
column2:
>

Visit us at Trivae.com once this campaign ends.

WHAT IS IT?

UNIQUE 4-IN-1 MULTI-FUNCTIONAL KITCHEN TOOL:

column1: • Display stand for cakes, pizzas and appetizers when entertaining

THE PERFECT GIFT IDEA - unique gift for women, moms, dads, newlyweds, new homeowners, sisters, grandmothers, grandfathers, neighbors (you get the idea)...anyone who loves to cook or spends any time in the kitchen! 

HOW IS IT MADE?

DURABLE &
• Sturdy aluminum frame - holds lids and dishes up to 10 lbs.
• Works for all your hot lids (even heavier cast iron enamel cookware, slow cookers and the like).
• Non-slip silicone pads provide extra grip on surfaces to prevent it from sliding
• Stylish shape fits seamlessly with any kitchen décor
• Heat resistant silicone (up to 475°F) protects all your surfaces
• Unlike other lid holders, this unique design keeps your lids inverted to contain the messy drips from cooking and the lid handles within easy reach
• Lessens the risk of burns and spills from dirty, hot lids.
• Collapsible form folds up flat for compact storage
• Expands into a long trivet perfect for serving large casseroles, two dishes at once or use as a cooling rack for baked goodies.
• The perfect way to elevate party platters to maximize table serving space and show off your culinary creations to your guests.

column2:
FUNCTION at its finest, a must-have cooking and serving tool for any kitchen!

 

1 Beautiful Tool -->
column5:
>

WHY DO YOU NEED ONE?

column1: • Makes clean up a breeze by keeping your cooking messes contained
• It reduces the risk of burns from hot lids, damage to surfaces, and the spread of germs
• It's multi-functional and takes the place of several tools in one
• It folds up and stores compactly to make the most of your kitchen storage space

HERE'S HOW IT WORKS!

The Z-Shape:

A Burning Problem...Solved - The Lid Holder
• A practical solution to the ""What to do with this lid?"" problem while cooking
•  Inverted position keeps the messes on the lid and lid handle within reach
• Leaves both hands free for cooking, spicing and stirring
• Can stack multiple lids and act as a spoon rest
• Perfect as a cake stand or buffet server for catering events
• Stores compactly in any kitchen drawer or cupboard

column2:
>

 

The Expandable Trivet

column1: • Elevates up to two dishes at once
• The perfect cooling rack for cookie sheets

column2:
>

P.S. It's easy to use:

column1: • Each button (at the top and bottom of the spine) operates the ring closest to it
• Push the buttons toward the center (one at a time - the arrows point the way) to release the ring and rotate to the desired position
• When you hear a click, the ring has locked into place and is ready for use

column2:
>

 

Serve and Entertain in Style:

Trivae is visually appealing and perfect for presenting finished dishes in an elegant and unique way in a casual or formal setting.
column3:
>

It's also quite useful in a restaurant or catering setting for elevating dishes--like charcuterie or a pizza! 

It's the perfect gift for:

column1: • Birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, bridal showers or housewarming
• That hard to shop for person who has everything!
• There's probably someone we left out and they would love this gift too!

Trivae in the Media!

We are not the only ones who love Trivae! A special thanks to everyone who has featured us and helped us to spread the word! Over the last couple of years, Trivae has made an appearance both in print and on TV, including:

column2:
>

The Back Story

Trivae 1.0 was originally dreamed up by Svetlana and her sister, Ruslana. They're avid cooks who finally got tired of doing what they called ""the kitchen dance"" (aka the dance between the stove and the sink, to drop the lid to stir, spice and taste their food while cooking). When they couldn't find a product to solve that problem, the sisters, along with Svetlana's best friend (and business partner), Rebecca, decided to create it. 

During the creative and design process, Trivae became so much more than just a simple lid holder. After the initial design was finalized, Svetlana and Rebecca, took to the Kickstarter community to help bring the product to life.
column3:
>

 

That's right, we've been here before and our first crowdfunding campaign was an amazing experience. It was a big learning curve (of course) and we hit a few snags along the way (who hasn't!) but in the end we made it work and got our first shipment of product manufactured. We had our hands full (and a huge blast) shipping out all of the orders to the wonderful group of backers who took a chance on us and helped bring the very first version of our product to market.
column4: >

column1: Now a few years later, three sold out production runs and a boatload of lessons under our belt, we're back again with big plans! We've had so much positive feedback both from backers of our original campaign and customers since then who've shared with us how much better and easier it is to cook with their Trivae. Here's what some of them had to say:
column3:
>

We absolutely love that we're helping people solving life's pesky little cooking problems and making their lives easier in the process. We want to bring Trivaes to as many homes and kitchens as possible. In order to do that, we've made some design changes that will make it lighter, more sleek and easier to use. The reduced weight of the product will also create additional cost savings in shipping, and those are savings that we'll be able to pass directly on to our customers. Unfortunately, these design changes require new tooling and that's where we need your help. The funds we raise through this campaign will help to fund production tooling with the remainder going towards our first production run of Trivae 2.0.

The Final Product

All of the changes have now been incorporated into the new CAD design by our engineers. Check out what the final product will look like in all three of our base color options.
column4:
>

 

The end result will be a product that is lightweight, durable, easy to use and will stylishly travel from the kitchen to the table with you. You'll love it, we promise!

The Perks!

We've crafted some awesome rewards for you to choose from! We think you'll love them but if you can't find exactly what you're looking for, email us and we'll see if we can make it happen for you!

Can stack multiple lids and act as a spoon rest
Minimizes kitchen clutter & clean up after cooking
Perfect as a cake stand or buffet server for catering events
Elevates hot pots, pans and dishes
Stores compactly in any kitchen drawer or cupboard
Elevates up to two dishes at once
Eliminates the need for multiple trivets
The perfect cooling rack for cookie sheets
Each button (at the top and bottom of the spine) operates the ring closest to it
Push the buttons toward the center (one at a time - the arrows point the way) to release the ring and rotate to the desired position
When you hear a click, the ring has locked into place and is ready for use

The Locking Mechanism at Work Serve and Entertain in Style:Trivae is visually appealing and perfect for presenting finished dishes in an elegant and unique way in a casual or formal setting.It's also quite useful in a restaurant or catering setting for elevating dishes--like charcuterie or a pizza! It's the perfect gift for:
Birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, bridal showers or housewarming
That hard to shop for person who has everything!
Anyone with a kitchen (regardless of occasion)
There's probably someone we left out and they would love this gift too!

Trivae in the Media!We are not the only ones who love Trivae! A special thanks to everyone who has featured us and helped us to spread the word! Over the last couple of years, Trivae has made an appearance both in print and on TV, including:
DIY Network's I Want That  Show

The Back StoryTrivae 1.0 was originally dreamed up by Svetlana and her sister, Ruslana. They're avid cooks who finally got tired of doing what they called ""the kitchen dance"" (aka the dance between the stove and the sink, to drop the lid to stir, spice and taste their food while cooking). When they couldn't find a product to solve that problem, the sisters, along with Svetlana's best friend (and business partner), Rebecca, decided to create it. During the creative and design process, Trivae became so much more than just a simple lid holder. After the initial design was finalized, Svetlana and Rebecca, took to the Kickstarter community to help bring the product to life. Svetlana (left) and Rebecca (right)...goofing off between video takes :) That's right, we've been here before and our first crowdfunding campaign was an amazing experience. It was a big learning curve (of course) and we hit a few snags along the way (who hasn't!) but in the end we made it work and got our first shipment of product manufactured. We had our hands full (and a huge blast) shipping out all of the orders to the wonderful group of backers who took a chance on us and helped bring the very first version of our product to market. At our warehouse in the midwest happily packing up Trivaes! All hands on deck...ages 7-90 represented :)

Now a few years later, three sold out production runs and a boatload of lessons under our belt, we're back again with big plans! We've had so much positive feedback both from backers of our original campaign and customers since then who've shared with us how much better and easier it is to cook with their Trivae. Here's what some of them had to say:We absolutely love that we're helping people solving life's pesky little cooking problems and making their lives easier in the process. We want to bring Trivaes to as many homes and kitchens as possible. In order to do that, we've made some design changes that will make it lighter, more sleek and easier to use. The reduced weight of the product will also create additional cost savings in shipping, and those are savings that we'll be able to pass directly on to our customers. Unfortunately, these design changes require new tooling and that's where we need your help. The funds we raise through this campaign will help to fund production tooling with the remainder going towards our first production run of Trivae 2.0.The Final ProductAll of the changes have now been incorporated into the new CAD design by our engineers. Check out what the final product will look like in all three of our base color options.The Final Design in Classic Black, Flame Red and Royal Blue The end result will be a product that is lightweight, durable, easy to use and will stylishly travel from the kitchen to the table with you. You'll love it, we promise!The Perks!We've crafted some awesome rewards for you to choose from! We think you'll love them but if you can't find exactly what you're looking for, email us and we'll see if we can make it happen for you!",16.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column2: >

column1:
WUUK is the most affordable and easiest to install smart video doorbell that lets you monitor your doorstep, see who’s there, and communicate with visitors. It’s a perfect mix of form and function elegantly designed around an advanced smart camera of 1536x1536 resolution, with AI facial recognition and IR night vision.

WUUK gives your home or business 24 hour professional-level wireless security, reliability and convenience without hidden storage fees or expensive monthly subscriptions.

 

 

WUUK can be setup fast without the need for professional installation. Any homeowner can install WUUK easily, using mounting screws or double-sided tape. The doorbell can be wired in for power or simply run off the internal battery for up to 8 months. Because it works over Wi-Fi, no other wires are necessary.
column2: >STEP 1
column3: >STEP 2
column4:
>

 

WUUK detects motion when someone is at your door and sends you notification immediately with a 0.35s quick wake-up speed. You can open the camera to say hello, send a pre-recorded response or simply monitor the situation. With WUUK, you will know everything that is happening at your home’s door, instantly.

 

When someone presses the doorbell you can receive a 1080p HD two-way video call via your smartphone. You will never miss a visitor again! Enjoy instant real-time communication with your visitor from anywhere. Or, if you are busy or it is an unsolicited visit, you may send a pre-recorded voice message of your choice. 

 

WUUK helps you to see more with a 162 degree HDR camera of 1536x1536 resolution. This enables a wider view so more of your doorstep and property is visible, packages can be watched and you can see every visitor from head to toe.

 

WUUK captures the image data of every person that stops by your door. You can browse all the faces that show up in your data history and label frequent visitors so that WUUK can recognize them the next time they visit using an advanced AI facial recognition algorithm.   

 

 

Although it’s super easy to install WUUK it is difficult to tamper with. If anyone attempts to remove, disable, or sabotage the device, it will sound a loud siren alert to scare away the criminal.

 

WUUK features an ultra-sensitive IR night vision capability with a 16 foot range. This advanced long-range infrared system lets you look deep into the night to monitor your property in low light or nighttime conditions.

 

 

Unlike other front door monitors, WUUK doesn’t have hidden fees for data storage or expensive monthly subscription charges. The system uses two methods of collecting video footage. The data can be stored locally using SD card storage or it can capture, record and store 48 hours’ worth of footage securely in cloud storage （2-day rolling footages）so valuable evidence is available in the event of an incident.

*We also offer optional  Cloud Storage service for $3/month per camera for 7 days rolling footages.

 

WiFi router too far from the doorbell? No problem! WUUK Doorbell has a built-in WiFi amplifier in the chime to extend your WiFi coverage. Enjoy the premium quality of images and two-way video &
column5:
audio calls sent from the doorbell without worrying WiFi dropping.

Plug-in standard outlets in any room of yours, you can hear security alerts even when you’re not near your smartphone.
column10:
>1st Round Trial Production

WUUK Labs is founded by 4 cohorts who all spent years working in Silicon Valley’s tech companies. They found that their friends or even family would do tons of researches - even up to months - for buying smart devices, especially smart home systems, and many devices are not friendly to people just like themselves, apartment tenants. As tech enthusiasts, they believe that it shouldn't be this complicated, and started working towards this mission.

WUUK Labs is established to research on popularizing smart home and simplifying the processes. We’re approaching this goal via these means - a simple price model, user-friendly design, and reliable high-quality products. 

WUUK Doorbell is the very first step in building this ecosystem. ?

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions:

1. What are the dimensions of the Wuuk? 

L15.6cm / W5.6cm / H3.6cm

 

2. Is there an option to purchase more chimes? Can I buy an additional plugin chime?

So far the WUUK Doorbell and the chime work on a 1-for-1 pairing setting, meaning only one chime can be connected to one doorbell. So there is no option for purchasing extra chimes.

 

3. Is there a way to take the doorbell with you when you move house? how do you remove to charge without breaking anything?

If you use the 3M tape as the installation method, we'd suggest getting a new back mount as you move to a new location. The doorbell is detachable from the backplate using a mechanic (see the 2nd video in the media gallery, or check this gif for that information. For charging the doorbell, it is the same way.)

 

4. What type of microSD card does WUUK work with? What is the biggest SD Card you can place in the chime?

Micro SD Card Class 10. 

64GB is the biggest SD card our chime can take.  On average, a 32GB SD card could store video footage for up to 20 months.

 

5. Can more than 1 person receive alerts at the same time, and each has the option to respond?

There is a family sharing setting in the owner's account in the WUUK app. More than one person (the owner account) can receive alerts if the owner chooses to share access. And the owner account can grant levels of access to shared accounts.

 

6. Is this compatible with the Ring chime / mechanical chimes my house has? Can I install the doorbell without plugging in the chime?

The WUUK Chime is required because it is not only a ringer but also stores data and provides wireless access to the doorbell. Each WUUK Chime and WUUK Doorbell are paired when you receive them, and they must work together. :)

 

7. Will the chime be supplied with a UK plug or just a US plug?

We offer 4 types of plugs - US, AUS, EU, and UK sizes. Once you proceed to the payment step, you will be able to select from the dropdown menu.

 

8. Can I monitor the camera without someone ringing the doorbell and/or motion detection? 

Yes, you can access the camera anytime via the Live View on your WUUK app installed in your smartphone. :)

 

9. Could you advise what versions of Android the app will support? 

We support Android 5.1 as the lowest version. However, to ensure an ideal user experience, we recommend having at least 3GB RAM on the phone and the recent releases of the Android system are preferred. 

---------

Security is a fundamental need, but buying a security camera is always costly. A battery security camera always costs over 100 dollars, even over 200 dollars, that so many people can not afford it.

Litmor Battery Cam is designed to meet that need and fill the gap. It comes with all the basic and innovative functions that you need as a security camera. You can watch, listen-in and talk back to visitors through Litmor App anywhere in the world. Through its smart alert algorithm, you can know who is there, a stranger, a car or an animal. It also comes with a bright LED lighting so you can watch color live view after sunset.

At the same time, leverage on the genius product design we manage to control the costs and squeeze our profit, therefore we can offer a decent product with a much lower entry cost.
column3:
showinfo=0"" width=""695"">

Here are what you get with Litmor Battery Cam

Here are what you get with Litmor Battery Cam

1. Crystal clear 1080p HD image quality, day and night.

2. 100% pure Wire-Free security camera with an ultra-long battery life that can last up to 365 days (Under the condition of 10 motion detections per day under ECO battery mode).

3. A security camera fit for all usage scenarios, one mount for all surfaces, super easy installation.

4. Secure, reliable local micro-SD card storage, no more monthly fees, no hidden costs.

5. Easy-to-use Litmor App allows you to see, listen in and talk to visitor from everywhere at anytime.

6. Configurable monitoring settings including motion zone and monitor schedule.

7. Elegant design that fits for your beautiful home both outdoor and indoor.

8. Smart alert, most trustful. Litmor Battery Camera recognizes people, car and animal, and send you instant alert .

Thanks to the excellent product engineering, Litmor Battery Cam comes with the flexibility, having that allows you to put it anyplace outside home to monitor the most critical area. You can also use it indoor, its slightly nifty appearance fits perfectly your home decoration, and catch all the lovely moments of your life.

Wondering about carry it on a trip? No problem! Set it up with hotel or Airbnb guest house WiFi, it will start to work right away. 

Litmor Battery cam is designed to provide you truly wireless freedom. The creative mount system allows you to mount your Litmor Battery Cam on any surface and adjust the camera to any direction you like. 

 Cost of ownership for first year

Unlike most home security cameras that require Cloud Storage to work, Litmor Battery Cam brings new local storage approach (Support micro-SD up to 128GB), while providing optional Cloud services. Less burden, more peace of mind. 

*128GB micro-SD card stores up to 240 hours video footage in 1080p video quality.

*Cloud Storage optional for $1.99/month per camera.
column5:
showinfo=0"" width=""695"">

 

Forget blurry, black and white night vision, the 1080p HD Litmor Cam reveals clear and colorful images no matter how dark the environment is. Cystal clear, day and night.
column7:
showinfo=0"" width=""695"">
This night vision video was recorded in a pitch dark environment with no light source.

column1:
In order to better display the real environment, we turn off the camera's light at beginning of the recording. In the real use, the light will automatically turn on before you watch the video, so it's always color night vision whenever you watch it.

Tell Alexa to switch the mode before you leave home or use Google Assistant to turn on alarm if there’s a stranger.  The Litmor Battery Cam has powerful integrations to help you manage your smart home.

Replying on Litmor A.I. Technology, the Litmor Battery Cam can recognize people, car, animal, and send you different notifications.

*Vehicle, children and animal recognition is paid services
column3:
showinfo=0"" width=""695"">

Take advantage of those two rechargeable 18650 batteries, Litmor Team introduces ECO Battery mode. 

ECO Battery mode wakes up Litmor Battery Cam instantly and starts to record when motion is detected. And then Litmor App send notification to your phone, so you will get a clear look at who or what triggered the alert. 

This mode is designed to improve the power efficiency and extend the battery life to a whole year long, when there are less than 8 recordings per day.
column5:
showinfo=0"" width=""695"">

 

The Litmor Battery Cam is weatherproof and IP66 waterproof, not afraid to brave the snow, rain, or heat. The Litmor Battery Cam can work perfectly indoors and outdoors.
column9:
showinfo=0"" width=""695"">

 

Your home security status at a glance. Litmor day brief reports your day-to-day security situation about alert number, trends and usage of Litmor App. 

Motion zone allows you to define a specific area you want to monitor. You can have your Litmor device effectively monitor the area you care and at the same time reduce false alerts.

Litmor monitoring schedule feature is designed to meet to your personal arrangement of your security. It allows you to schedule a specific period of time when you do not want to receive alert.

Our mission: Security is a fundamental need, Litmor® is making it easier to have.

This mission drives our team focus on creating outstanding security products with elegant appearance and intelligent functions. And at the same, we keep squeezing profits to offer the most affordable product for the public. 

From that, Litmor is making a more connected and more enjoyable life with easier access from everywhere in the world. Therefore, you won’t miss any visitor, any interesting moments at home.

Cooperation &
