column1: experience together happened soon after Bonnie’s mom passed away from cancer. Bonnie’s
birthday came a few months later and needless to say she didn’t feel much like
celebrating. A friend told us about her own self-wedding experience and it
seemed like just the right way to honor Bonnie’s mom by looking within. We also
wanted to bring healing into our community, many of whom were also going
through their own significant hardships—relationships on the rocks, the
economic downturn and illness. So we had a small self-wedding ceremony for all
of the party guests to ignite good, positive energy. It was such a loving,
powerful experience and it lifted everyone a little higher and made the path a
little easier. The impact has stayed with us to this day.
years ago we had a backyard wedding BUT with a twist. The day, the occasion was
about celebration and love and we wanted our friends to feel what we were
feeling. So we wrote special vows for our friends and made 120 sterling silver
rings and after our ceremony was over, we married our guests to
themselves. The laughter, the love, the genuine surprise in some at it being
about them only, no one else was extraordinary. People who were there keep telling us even
now, ""I haven't taken my ring off since your wedding."" ""It holds

as many places as possible.

","Thank you for all of your generosity and support! Please visit imarriedme.com
JOIN US IN THE SELF-WEDDING MOVEMENT!
Jeffrey is originally from Cape Town, South Africa. Bonnie is a New Yorker that grew up in Houston. We met in Los Angeles (on match.com!) in 2007. Here’s how we came to design this kit.
experience together happened soon after Bonnie’s mom passed away from cancer. Bonnie’s
birthday came a few months later and needless to say she didn’t feel much like
celebrating. A friend told us about her own self-wedding experience and it
seemed like just the right way to honor Bonnie’s mom by looking within. We also
wanted to bring healing into our community, many of whom were also going
through their own significant hardships—relationships on the rocks, the
economic downturn and illness. So we had a small self-wedding ceremony for all
of the party guests to ignite good, positive energy. It was such a loving,
powerful experience and it lifted everyone a little higher and made the path a
little easier. The impact has stayed with us to this day.

about celebration and love and we wanted our friends to feel what we were
feeling. So we wrote special vows for our friends and made 120 sterling silver
rings and after our ceremony was over, we married our guests to
themselves. The laughter, the love, the genuine surprise in some at it being
about them only, no one else was extraordinary. People who were there keep telling us even
now, ""I haven't taken my ring off since your wedding."" ""It holds
so much meaning for me!"", ""It reminds me every day that I'm
We've done 3 or 4 large and small ceremonies since then and it remains so very powerful and fulfilling that we decided
we wanted to keep spreading that feeling. Our dilemma was how to continue the
movement so we could impact the most people. It’s taken us a while
to figure out a sustainable model and here we are today. We think this is the
perfect way and we look forward to growing this idea to bigger celebrations in
This is a live-like-you-mean-it moment that can be celebrated alone or with others who recognize the need for the love of self. We are, after all, fabulous!
Inner peace makes for more balanced citizens and more compassionate communities. Save the planet!

This is not about waiting for the “right one” to complete you. A self-wedding is about completing yourself. Loving yourself. Realizing YOU are the “right” one. The more you love yourself, the better able you are to love others. Divorce rates are high in marriage but we are sure you will be sleeping with the person you self-marry today for the rest of your life. ☺

A self-wedding is a genuinely inspirational practice that reminds you, every day after, as you wear your ring, of the simplest thing you can do to make for a happier, more content life: LOVE YOURSELF. Come on, join us!!
We've created the I Married Me Self-Wedding In-A-Box™ so that we can spread love beyond our own community. To yours.
Our kit gives you the tools you need to celebrate your most
fabulous self. You can be single or in a relationship, you can have a
self-wedding for one, for you and your besty, for a group of friends, to
celebrate a birthday or special occasion, or officiate a self-wedding at your
own wedding to give the gift of self-love to all of your guests.
A self-wedding is a refreshingly modern way
to remind yourself of your own true gifts. Isn't it time to proclaim your

package (all components will be made in Los Angeles, CA) comes complete with a hallmarked perfectly simple handcrafted super skinny sterling silver or 14K solid gold handcrafted ring designed by Jeffrey Levin.
7 Affirmation Cards (one bold reminder of your awesomeness for every day of the week).
jewelry designer for over 30 years and he understands the potency of symbolism. It's how it makes you feel about yourself. Wear the ring to give yourself daily reminders that you are fabulous!
WHAT WE NEED & WHAT YOU GET
Our plan is to manufacture 1,000s of I
Married Me Self-Wedding In-A-Box™ kits so that as the movement grows,

In order to produce the various components, we need to order a minimum quantity for printing to keep the pricing low and make the kit affordable. We need to raise $10,000 for the first run! We know it's not thousands of kits but it's a first step and we'll get there or we'll stretch there with your help!
Buy in to the idea at the minimum perk and help us toward our goal, buy a kit, buy 100 kits. Join us in spreading self-love across the planet!
Please get the word out, make some noise and use the tools provided at the bottom of this page to push the message. You are awesome! We thank you.

*Any and all amounts contributed are appreciated! I thank you all in advance*

My name is Cristiano Lagares and I am 26 years old. I came from Brazil in 1998 and grew up in Massachusetts. I'm a full time student, a full time worker and a full time husband. I do feel a bit of shame asking for help, however, I also believe that this cause and my wife's smile if this works will be worth anything in the world.
• Have a job I can make a career out of

My wife is Rachel Lagares. She comes from a humble family and lived in the same house for 27 years. She has 5 sisters, yes, 5 sisters! Rachel loves photography, books and music. All her life, Rachel always dreamed of finding the right guy, having a beautiful proposal and having a beautiful wedding.

Rachel accomplished some of her chidlhood dreams. She found the right guy (statement taken from her, this is not self claimed :P), she had a meaningful and beautiful proposal, however, I wasn't able to provider her with the wedding she deserves.
My Goal and Where this is going:
Rachel and I got married on May, 2nd 2012 and we haven't had a ceremony or a honeymoon yet because I simply can't afford to provide for those.
Rachel, being the most understanding girl I'm yet to meet, put aside her ambitions and desires and married me even though I couldnt afford her a ceremony and our deserved time off together.

I'm hoping that this campaign will turn our life around even if only a little bit. My goal is to give Rachel at least the ceremony she deserves! ( I won't get into honeymoon, that's way over my budget)
What I have and what I need:
Assuming I reach my goal ($2000) I will try my best to spread the funding into:
• Using the church premises for the wedding.
If I reach above my goal, the funds will be used to further my Wife's wedding experience by:
I have no plans on using the funds for anything else not related to this ceremony.

If you can't or won't contribute to my cause, I still thank you for taking the time to read about it! Please, help me spread the word and give my wife a well deserving break. Indegogo makes it very easy to share this campaign.

column1: I’m-Possible Energy is trying to establish a relations with ‘To Write Love On Her Arms’ (TWLOHA) ""a non-profit movement dedicated to presenting hope and finding help for people struggling with depression, addiction, self-injury and suicide… They exists to encourage, inform, inspire and also to invest directly into treatment and recovery.

We wish to be able to donate a portion of every sale to this organization to help those in need. We can’t quite put a dollar or a percentage on what we are able to give right now. That all depends on how well the business is doing at that current point. But we are dedicated to doing as much as we can for a cause we truly care about!
For every dollar we raise over our funding goal, we will donate to To Write Love On Her Arm’s organization! So keep updated, and keep spreading the word! We need all of your help to make this happen.
All funders who donate more than $10, will receive one free can of I'm-possible Energy Drink when it is released (international add $10) For International T-Shirt orders add $10!

After experiencing terrible side effects from mainstream energy drinks, the founder of I'm-possible energy decided to do his own research. The result of this research was this: some of the most common ingredients in popular energy drinks are added to ""give natural energy"" but are actually ineffective in the amounts added. These ingredients were also the ingredients giving John nausea, a cloudy mind, jitters and grogginess.

While searching many stores for alternative energy drinks that didn't contain these ingredients, John could only find coffee and teas. Not being an avid coffee or tea drinker, John decided to take on the challenge of creating his own energy drink. With a plan to fulfill the needs of other energy lacking individuals by creating a no-nonsense beverage to meet their needs!

We are dedicated to providing consumers a great tasting energy drink without any of the side effects caused by some of the common ingredients added to energy drink companies. These companies want you to buy into their “magic potion” but we at I'm possible energy know you are smarter than that, we know you will value our product for its honesty. And we respect your opinion, that's why we are giving you exactly what you are looking for... a no-nonsense, pure energy drink!

I'm-possible energy drink, is a functional beverage giving the consumer hours of energy, without the side effects of many mainstream energy drinks, by avoiding all of the added untested, possibly harmful supplements included to make a drink sell, NOT to make a drink more effective.

I'm-Possible Energy has done the research to find out exactly what works and what doesn't. That is why we are able to give consumers a drink that truly works and is healthy for them.  This is done by keeping the ingredients natural and maximizing the taste without adding tons of sugar and artificial flavorings!!!

I'm-possible energy was named by our founder John Mawson, who was on a mission to prove to the world that he could start his business from a very early age (18) while only having a shoe-string budget. From hard work and an attitude that refused to fail, John was able to found I'm-Possible Energy drink. While still raising capital to have our drink mass-produced, I'm-Possible Energy is rapidly growing and attracting a great amount of attention!

Once John had proved to people that it was indeed possible for him to create his business with only a high school diploma, a low level income job and no initial start-up capital, John decided that it was time to start influencing other people to reach their full potential. John believed that this potential could be reached through hard work, a positive outlook and a dedication to find a solution to each challenge that happens on the way and of course with a willingness to keep going and never give up. Through years of studying psychology and struggling with anxiety and depression himself, John has researched into many organizations, and treatment methods, which lead to his curing in late 2012. This is why John is determined to work with only the best organizations that help people overcome anxiety and depression. Through doing this, John has contacted non-profit movements and is in the process of trying to establish partnerships, while still dedicated to donating a percentage of all profits towards them, even if gone unnoticed. We will also be working closely with psychologists and therapists to be able to give one on one therapy to those who need it, along with many successful life coaches to help those who need guidance in their lives to go out and fulfill their goals, dreams and ambitions.

column1: Stop trying to shove a pillow-shaped peg into a shoulder-shaped hole.

Everyone wants a soft pillow, but what you (desperately) need at night is support, especially if you are a side sleeper. Last year we re-invented the pillow with the Pillow Cube*. This year we are RE-inventing our re-invention with the Pillow Cube with DOUBLE the width of support.
So far we have shipped over 5,000 Pillows to squares JUST LIKE YOU.
The Idea for pillow cube started as a perfect cube of foam. As we tested that idea we came up with two different dimensions, and the crowd went wild.
People are sleeping LONGER and BETTER and taking MORE PRODUCTIVE NAPS with the Pillow Cube.
The Pillow Cube offered (almost) a whole cubic foot of comfort.

But a few of you (you know who you are) it just wasn’t good enough. You are chronic rollers. Not high rollers, just rollers, and want to sleep on both sides of your head. So we have stretched the cube to its limit for 28 inches of cuboidal comfort, allowing you to easily roll from one side to the other.
And now we are offering it in even more thicknesses for your variably- sized shoulders.
We are now sourcing our own materials and producing right here in the US of the A. We want to bring the price down by buying materials in bulk and get it sown by our expert craftsmen in the US.
Cost is always on our mind and with a cube-shaped* pillow it’s hard to think anywhere but INSIDE the box, but stick with me here.

What if we sent the pillow to you WITHOUT a BOX, but a reusable travel bag that totally sucks. We suck the air out of the bag, ship it to you in a totally boss recyclable envelope, and you can re-use the bag as much as you want. Way less waste, way less cost.
Our First Kickstarter was a BIG learning experience. We shipped 2 months later than we anticipated, but we still delivered and since then we have grown.
We are extremely confident that we can ship in July. How confident? Well if you knew how beautiful my wife was and how ugly I am, you would understand what “EXTREMELY” confident means.
*Technically it’s a rectangular prism or cuboidal pillow, but you know, that just doesn’t have the same ring to it.
","Stop trying to shove a pillow-shaped peg into a shoulder-shaped hole.

Everyone wants a soft pillow, but what you (desperately) need at night is support, especially if you are a side sleeper. Last year we re-invented the pillow with the Pillow Cube*. This year we are RE-inventing our re-invention with the Pillow Cube with DOUBLE the width of support.
So far we have shipped over 5,000 Pillows to squares JUST LIKE YOU.
And the response has been OVERWHELMING.
The Idea for pillow cube started as a perfect cube of foam. As we tested that idea we came up with two different dimensions, and the crowd went wild.
People are sleeping LONGER and BETTER and taking MORE PRODUCTIVE NAPS with the Pillow Cube.
The Pillow Cube offered (almost) a whole cubic foot of comfort.

But a few of you (you know who you are) it just wasn’t good enough. You are chronic rollers. Not high rollers, just rollers, and want to sleep on both sides of your head. So we have stretched the cube to its limit for 28 inches of cuboidal comfort, allowing you to easily roll from one side to the other.
And now we are offering it in even more thicknesses for your variably- sized shoulders.
We are now sourcing our own materials and producing right here in the US of the A. We want to bring the price down by buying materials in bulk and get it sown by our expert craftsmen in the US.
Cost is always on our mind and with a cube-shaped* pillow it’s hard to think anywhere but INSIDE the box, but stick with me here.

What if we sent the pillow to you WITHOUT a BOX, but a reusable travel bag that totally sucks. We suck the air out of the bag, ship it to you in a totally boss recyclable envelope, and you can re-use the bag as much as you want. Way less waste, way less cost.
Our First Kickstarter was a BIG learning experience. We shipped 2 months later than we anticipated, but we still delivered and since then we have grown.
We are extremely confident that we can ship in July. How confident? Well if you knew how beautiful my wife was and how ugly I am, you would understand what “EXTREMELY” confident means.
*Technically it’s a rectangular prism or cuboidal pillow, but you know, that just doesn’t have the same ring to it.",12.0,0,"3 Campaigns

column2:
>


MELLA is the all-in-one children's clock and sleep trainer designed to keep your kid in bed longer.
column4: >* Shown in Arctic Blue. See below for more colors!
column5:
>

""This is a great gift for any parent with young children who constantly looks tired, AKA all of them."" - Mashable
column8:
>

 

With MELLA, there's no need for multiple sleep aids anymore - MELLA has everything you need! 

Oh, and it's pretty darn cute too.
column10:
>

Studies show that children do not fully understand the concept of time until around 8 years old. MELLA uses colors and facial expressions to teach your kid when it's time for bed and when it's okay to wake up. With MELLA, your kid can learn to stay in bed longer, giving you more sleep! Pretty awesome.

When your kid sleeps, so does MELLA.

Set the desired sleep time and every night, MELLA will go to sleep with your kid. MELLA sleeps through the night so your kid knows to stay in bed.

 

MELLA introduces delayed gratification with the Play Period.

Good things come to those who wait! Half an hour before the wake time, MELLA will display a playful expression and glow a yellow light. Teach your kid to play quietly and wait patiently until the light turns green!

column1: When MELLA turns green, it's time to wake up!
Set the desired wake time and MELLA will greet your kid with a smile and glow green. It's time to start the day!

We spent months studying the most popular sleep trainers on the market. Some clocks didn't have nearly enough features to justify their price. Others had feature overload with buttons and programs parents can't keep track of. Some had nonsensical design choices (i.e. blue light as the only night light color option - read HERE why blue light is detrimental to sleep health).
And across the board? None of them focused on beautiful design.
So, we designed a beautiful kid's clock that strikes a perfect balance between features and usability.

1) features you'll actually use,  
2) an easy-to-use interface (""set it and forget it""), 
3) at a reasonable price, 
4) in a beautiful package.
Choose from five soft night light colors to keep the bedtime monsters at bay!
Choose from three relaxing sleep sound options to help your kid fall asleep quickly: rain, white noise and ocean.
What about those midday naps, time outs and other play activities? MELLA's got you covered. MELLA has multiple duration options for all your countdown needs.
If your kid needs help waking up, choose from three alarm sounds (with child-friendly, non-scary options!) to jump start the day.
We're kicking off our campaign with three color options. MELLA is available in Arctic Blue, Blush Pink, Bright Purple, and our limited edition color, Kickstarter Green!
Once we sell through our initial minimum order quantity of Kickstarter Green, we will NEVER offer this fun shade again so grab yours today!
KELVIN was unlocked during our Kickstarter campaign as an add-on and now we're making it available at a discount on Indiegogo InDemand!
KELVIN is a color changing night light, room thermometer and room hygrometer.

KELVIN changes color depending on the temperature in the room - blue means that it is too cold, amber means it is just right, and red means it is too hot. KELVIN's default program is based around safer infant sleep guidelines.
Additionally, to provide greater flexibility, you can customize KELVIN's temperature range setting based on your own preferences or your physician recommendations.
Check out KELVIN's specs and features below!

Two years ago, we had a thought: why aren't kid's electronics designed with the parent in mind? After all, parents are the ones buying the product! Sleep trainers on the market looked extremely kiddy/childish or had ugly designs, were made with cheap materials and broke quickly. We wanted to do better.

Our mission is to create beautiful, modern children's products even adults would want for themselves. Our goal is to design products that customers wouldn't necessarily think were children's products at first glance, yet still bring delight to children everywhere. Most importantly, we set out to build high quality products - minus the sky-high price tags.
With MELLA, we believe we've created just that.
Inquiries: If you have any questions about MELLA, please email us at hello@littlehippo.com.
We've been working on MELLA for the last two years. Check out our progress below!
Mella was lovingly created and designed in San Francisco, California.
We are a team of passionate individuals with backgrounds in engineering, business, marketing, and product design!

column77: >All communications are encrypted using secure 128-bit AES via an embedded hardware coprocessor. The second layer of protection is the Dynamic Key. This key code is randomized for every single data transfer. Even if somebody were able to capture the AES encrypted data, the Dynamic Key protection would make it impossible for them to unlock your door.
column91: >Ultraloq Lever is designed to fit any US standard interior and exterior door with a single hole prep. The simple installation takes minutes and only four screws. No wiring and no drilling.

column1: To create incredible luxury bedding designed for men, and deliver it to their doorstep in an affordable, no-nonsense package.

Our bedding bundles not only offer the highest quality pillows, sheets, duvets and covers on the market (without the department store markup), but they are also tailor-made for any sleep style or preference.

After years of working in the bedding industry — selling some of the highest user rated pillows on the market and earning a reputation as “The Pillow Guy” — founder and CEO Isaac Scharf, started to see just how overwhelming it was for guys to find quality luxury bedding.

“I was a single guy living in Los Angeles. My friends and I enjoy the finer things in life, and we knew what we wanted when it came to our cars, our clothes, restaurants, and travel. But when it came to bedding —

“I knew there had to be a way to streamline the process for guys who just wanted high quality, luxury bedding without the hassle of combing through countless reviews or aimlessly roaming department store aisles.
“We put in the hard work, R&
column2: D and field testing to find the finest fabrics, most comfortable fills and optimized densities for stomach, side or back sleepers. The materials are ethically sourced with sustainable options, and we’ve chosen colors and designs that will fit into any guy’s bedroom.

column1: “When you order from Pillow Guy, all you need to do is answer three simple questions in our Sleep Science Questionnaire, and we take care of the rest.

Our fabrics and fills are the best on the market, and many of our products are cut, sewn and filled in the U.S.A. We use only the finest materials from our trusted partners to ensure that you are getting the best.
All of that comfort comes in exclusive Pillow Guy colors like Dark Navy Blue, Charcoal, Cadet Blue, Sandy Taupe, Light Grey and our personal favorite, Classy White.
The attention to detail — fine stitching, sewn-in elastic, hidden zippers and hand-selected colors — will add that perfect touch to every guy’s bedroom.
When you see it and feel it, you’ll know the difference.

This is the pillow that started it all for Pillow Guy, and now it’s even better. Filled with a soft, cool poly-gel that is spun into the finest fiber to mimic real down, it also comes in options for stomach, side and back sleepers.

It’s covered in a soft-brushed microfiber shell and encased in our exclusive pillow protector dyed in Pillow Guy Blue, and made from our cool, crisp Percale cotton weave with hidden zipper and luxurious white satin piping.   [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) Down Alternative Pillow + FREE pillowcase ONLY $47]
Our 100% Certified RDS (Responsible Down Standard) 700 fill power White Goose Down pillows are truly the best on the market, and we’ve created customized fills for stomach, side and back sleepers.

Each pillow comes covered in a completely down-proof cotton shell and encased in our Pillow Guy exclusive, white sateen cover with hidden zipper and luxurious blue satin piping.    [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) 100% Certified RDS Down Pillow + FREE pillowcase ONLY $97]

This is our vegan-friendly option and like our Down alternative pillows, we’ve tried and tested every type of fill to find the best. This comforter is filled with our 3D-3V fiber and feels almost exactly like our pure Goose Down. We’ve added just the right amount of fill keep you nice and cool in the summer heat and cozy in the winter.
Sewn with the same baffle box stitching to ensure no lumps or shifting, it comes covered in our Cool &
column2: Crisp cotton and dyed Pillow Guy Blue with our luxurious white satin piping. [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) Down Alternative Comforter ONLY $187]

column1: These comforters will make you never want to leave your bed. Filled with only 100% Certified RDS (Responsible Down Standard), White Goose Down, these are truly the finest in the market.

Each comforter comes in a down-proof, white sateen shell to keep the goose down secure, along with a baffle box construction to guarantee no shifting. Finished off with a luxurious blue satin piping, this is the comforter that dreams are made of.  [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) 100% Certified RDS Down Comforter ONLY $287]

These sheets are 400TC 100% Cotton Percale woven for that cool, crisp 5-star hotel sleep every night. Percale is plain in weave and characterized by a matte finish and crisp hand. Just like your favorite crisp white shirt, percale sheets are a bedroom must-have, especially during the hot summer months. Our high-end cotton percale linens are light and invigorating yet incredibly soft. Percale fabric is lighter in weight and more breathable making it perfect for summertime or warmer climates.
Each sheet set includes one (1) fitted sheet, one (1) flat sheet and two (2) pillowcases. [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) four-piece sheet set ONLY $127]
Each Duvet set includes one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams. The Classic Cool set is available in Dark Navy Blue, Charcoal, Cadet Blue, Sandy Taupe, Light Grey and Classy White.

Made with the silky fibers of the eucalyptus tree, these 600TC MicroTencel sheets are futuristically luxurious and environmentally savvy. Tencel lyocell fibers are also gentle to the skin, with a silk like feel. The microscopic sufaces of the fibers are smoother than even Modal, Cotton and Wool. Soft, smooth, and extremely breathable, so there’s no need to sweat these sheets. Tencel moves moisture across the sheeting to where it will evaporate more quickly and not pool and cool interrupting R.E.M. sleeping patters, guaranteeing the BEST sleep of your life!
Each Sheet Set includes one (1) fitted sheet, one (1) flat sheet and four (4) pillowcases.  [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) six-piece sheet set ONLY $167]
The Duvet Set includes one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams. The Luxe Smooth set is available in Charcoal, Cadet Blue and Classy White.
When you order from Pillow Guy, you’ll fill out our Sleep Science Questionnaire. You tell us if you’re a stomach, side or back sleeper
column2: whether you prefer a cool and crisp sheets or soft, smooth sheets, and if you want ethically sourced White Goose Down or our vegan-friendly poly gel alternative.

column1: We’ll send a bundle -- including two (2) down alternative pillows, one (1) down alternative comforter, one (1) four-piece sheet set, one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams -- of the best luxury bedding you’ve ever experienced right to your doorstep. It’s an instant upgrade that will have you relaxing like a king and sleeping like a baby.

We’ll send a bundle -- including two (2) white goose down pillows, one (1) white goose down comforter, one (1) four-piece sheet set, one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams -- of the best luxury bedding you’ve ever experienced right to your doorstep. It’s an instant upgrade that will have you relaxing like a king and sleeping like a baby
• From our partners to our warehouse, directly to you. Many of our products are made in the U.S.A., and we cut out the middleman and their markups and pass the savings onto you.
• We offer free shipping in the U.S.A, and for our international Pillow Guys, we’ve engineered our packaging to save space and to keep shipping costs to a minimum.
• Unlike retailers, we own every part of the supply chain, and that means we get the best deals in the industry every time.
• Our White Goose Down is hypoallergenic, certified-RDS (Responsible Down Standard) to ensure cruelty-free, responsibly sourced material.
• The down alternative is our vegan-friendly option that could fool even the most discerning bedding connoisseur.
• Our Luxe Smooth Tencel sheets are made from the eucalyptus plant, which requires 1/5th of the farmland used for other materials.
• Pillow Guy’s packaging saves room on the truck, but it also saves on shipping materials which means less waste all around.
• We developed the Pillow Guy look and feel based on conversations and research with a select test audience of real guys, and we used their feedback to improve every step of the way.
• Our proprietary Sleep Science Questionnaire is based on years of research and development, and we’ve used this data to help you determine the best bedding for your sleeping style.
• We measure every one of our products against the strictest industry standards and we exceed those standards wherever possible.
Pre-order now for some of the best deals on the market (it won’t get any better than this, trust us).
Experience the perfect pillows, sheets, and comforters for your sleep style and your lifestyle, and help Pillow Guy revolutionize the way guys shop for bedding.

We are proud of the relationships we have developed over the years in this industry. Now as we launch our own company, these hardworking individuals will be partnering with us. Here are some highlights of our manufacturing process:
• All sheet sets and down products are made in the U.S.A.
• Factories are compliant under the strictest international labor laws
• All of our materials are environmentally sustainable with a low carbon footprint.
See our CEO in action as he personally sources Pillow Guy materials!
To purchase Pillow Guy bedding, please go to pillowguy.com

These sheets are 400TC 100% Cotton Percale woven for that cool, crisp 5-star hotel sleep every night. Percale is plain in weave and characterized by a matte finish and crisp hand. Just like your favorite crisp white shirt, percale sheets are a bedroom must-have, especially during the hot summer months. Our high-end cotton percale linens are light and invigorating yet incredibly soft. Percale fabric is lighter in weight and more breathable making it perfect for summertime or warmer climates.
Each sheet set includes one (1) fitted sheet, one (1) flat sheet and two (2) pillowcases. [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) four-piece sheet set ONLY $127]
Each Duvet set includes one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams. The Classic Cool set is available in Dark Navy Blue, Charcoal, Cadet Blue, Sandy Taupe, Light Grey and Classy White.

Made with the silky fibers of the eucalyptus tree, these 600TC MicroTencel sheets are futuristically luxurious and environmentally savvy. Tencel lyocell fibers are also gentle to the skin, with a silk like feel. The microscopic sufaces of the fibers are smoother than even Modal, Cotton and Wool. Soft, smooth, and extremely breathable, so there’s no need to sweat these sheets. Tencel moves moisture across the sheeting to where it will evaporate more quickly and not pool and cool interrupting R.E.M. sleeping patters, guaranteeing the BEST sleep of your life!
Each Sheet Set includes one (1) fitted sheet, one (1) flat sheet and four (4) pillowcases.  [Pre-Order IndieGoGo Special: One (1) six-piece sheet set ONLY $167]
The Duvet Set includes one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams. The Luxe Smooth set is available in Charcoal, Cadet Blue and Classy White.
When you order from Pillow Guy, you’ll fill out our Sleep Science Questionnaire. You tell us if you’re a stomach, side or back sleeper
column2: whether you prefer a cool and crisp sheets or soft, smooth sheets, and if you want ethically sourced White Goose Down or our vegan-friendly poly gel alternative.

column1: We’ll send a bundle -- including two (2) down alternative pillows, one (1) down alternative comforter, one (1) four-piece sheet set, one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams -- of the best luxury bedding you’ve ever experienced right to your doorstep. It’s an instant upgrade that will have you relaxing like a king and sleeping like a baby.

We’ll send a bundle -- including two (2) white goose down pillows, one (1) white goose down comforter, one (1) four-piece sheet set, one (1) duvet cover and two (2) shams -- of the best luxury bedding you’ve ever experienced right to your doorstep. It’s an instant upgrade that will have you relaxing like a king and sleeping like a baby
With Pillow Guy bedding, you get:
From our partners to our warehouse, directly to you. Many of our products are made in the U.S.A., and we cut out the middleman and their markups and pass the savings onto you.
We offer free shipping in the U.S.A, and for our international Pillow Guys, we’ve engineered our packaging to save space and to keep shipping costs to a minimum.
Unlike retailers, we own every part of the supply chain, and that means we get the best deals in the industry every time.
Our White Goose Down is hypoallergenic, certified-RDS (Responsible Down Standard) to ensure cruelty-free, responsibly sourced material.
The down alternative is our vegan-friendly option that could fool even the most discerning bedding connoisseur.
Our Luxe Smooth Tencel sheets are made from the eucalyptus plant, which requires 1/5th of the farmland used for other materials.
Pillow Guy’s packaging saves room on the truck, but it also saves on shipping materials which means less waste all around.
Comfort and Style Backed by Data
We developed the Pillow Guy look and feel based on conversations and research with a select test audience of real guys, and we used their feedback to improve every step of the way.
Our proprietary Sleep Science Questionnaire is based on years of research and development, and we’ve used this data to help you determine the best bedding for your sleeping style.
We measure every one of our products against the strictest industry standards and we exceed those standards wherever possible.
Pre-order now for some of the best deals on the market (it won’t get any better than this, trust us).
Experience the perfect pillows, sheets, and comforters for your sleep style and your lifestyle, and help Pillow Guy revolutionize the way guys shop for bedding.

We are proud of the relationships we have developed over the years in this industry. Now as we launch our own company, these hardworking individuals will be partnering with us. Here are some highlights of our manufacturing process:
All sheet sets and down products are made in the U.S.A.
Factories are compliant under the strictest international labor laws
All of our materials are environmentally sustainable with a low carbon footprint.
See our CEO in action as he personally sources Pillow Guy materials!
To purchase Pillow Guy bedding, please go to pillowguy.com",47.0,1,"1 Campaign

Create virtual remote controls of your favorite smart home products wherever you want for whatever you need. Want to make your coffee table a play button for Sonos? Or place an on/off button for your HUE lights right above your bed? Hayo can do that - it's like using the force for your home.

column3: >

column4: >Place Hayo in a room where you would like to set up a virtual remote control. Hayo will then create a 3D image map of the room.

column2: >Using Hayo’s augmented reality app, create virtual remote controls on top of objects or right in thin air. Then connect them to your favorite connected home platforms and products. Our app will be available for IOS and Android.
>Since Hayo is always sensing your movements and gestures, you can start using the remote controls right away.

column10:
>Create as many controls as you want.
It's your house, you decide!

column1: Hayo works best where you and your family spend the most time at home, usually the kitchen or living room.

column10:
>You only need 1 Hayo per room,
not one for each surface.

column3: >Hayo's performance is made possible by our suite of patented technology, software, and algorithms. Hayo sees and interprets space within its field of view thanks to advanced computer vision, which is used to reduce false positives and react only when a person interacts with the virtual remote controls or barriers. Any other motion outside this type of zone does not alter Hayo's behavior.

>Most 3D spatial technologies scan a person's gestures and motion. Hayo takes the opposite approach: it scans your physical space and objects, taking action when a person comes in contact with that space or object in unique ways.
>We are looking forward to collaborating with developers to inspire new ways of unlocking and fostering creativity for all users across contexts.
>We have built a complete open API kit that will be available to technologists and tinkerers shortly after launch. Please get in touch with us here:

>In 2010, we found ourselves having a discussion with the lead designer of Minority Report’s interactive scenes and sequences. A few days later, we quit our jobs and started Space-Connect, the company behind Hayo.
column5: >We are Hayo. We empower people to create amazing shared experiences that improve our lives, only limited by our imaginations.

column3: >We are a very passionate team who has devoted nearly six years of research and development solely into crafting an amazing product. During all these years, we have done our best to refine Hayo, and minimize the risks before this campaign, in all possible ways.

>As we go through the logistics of manufacturing in large scale, there is always a possibility of unforeseen events that could impact on our production time-frame. If an issue arises, we will continue to be transparent to our supporter, and honor the quality and expectations set for Hayo.

>We fundamentally believe that technology can improve our lives and make them more fun. Through the growth of spatial imaging, augmented reality, and connected home platforms, we believe there is an opportunity to activate this belief with our product.
>Hayo is fully functional and ready for market. We are asking for your contribution to manufacture the device in large scale, and get them into your hands: our early adopters and developers.
>From there we can make Hayo even better, and reach the people around the word.

>Do you still have questions or special requests? We will be happy to help.
Feel free to contact us at
column4: >info@hayo.io, and we will respond as fast as possible.

column6: > How does Hayo respect my privacy?
column7: >Hayo doesn't capture or record images and we don't use a microphone. The information we collect about your virtual control set-ups is only for you.

column4: >Images acquired by Hayo are processed within the camera only, on a one-time basis and deleted right afterwards. The only image that might leave the camera is when the alarm is triggered to send a picture to the user.

>There are two cameras inside Hayo, a depth camera and an RGB (Normal camera). The depth camera is used in real-time, so no capture is performed. The RGB camera is only used during set up or, if the user chooses to trigger a picture capture for security.

column6: > How do you create virtual controls?
column7: >Thanks to our Augmented Reality app, which will be available both on iOS and Android.

column6: > What smart home devices can Hayo connect with?
column7: >You can connect to Sonos, Nest, Hue, Lifx, Roku, Chromecast and many more. Using Wink, IFTTT or Logitech Harmony, you can connect to more than 270,000 devices and services.

column6:
> How many virtual controls can I use at the same time?
You can use one virtual remote control at a time but can setup up to 15 for each Hayo device.

column8: >Hayo lets you create three types of virtual remote controls.
column11: >Buttons, barriers and sliders. You can interact with them as you like. No special gestures are required. Just create virtual remote controls and start playing with them.

column6: > What happens if I move Hayo after scanning and setting up controls in my home?
column7: >Hayo remembers where you set up your controls and knows when you move it. So don't worry if you do some spring cleaning and the shelf across the room is a better spot for Hayo - you won't lose your controls.

column6: > Can I set up and save profiles for different rooms in my home?
column7: >Yes, we think the best place for Hayo is where you spend the most time. Probably in the living room or kitchen. Maybe the bedroom, too.

column6: > If I have more than one device, do they communicate to each other?
column7: >Yes, Hayos know when other Hayos are around and work with one another. So, if you have a huge room or one with a lot of weird angles, you may need more than one Hayo to get coverage. Not to worry: teamwork is essential with multiple Hayos, too!

column6: > Can I be a beta tester?
column9: >We will invite a select group of the early bird supporters to become beta testers. This will be invite-only based on certain factors, such as age, geography and used cases. We’ll send a notice later this fall to allow for beta test submissions.

column7: >We offer a 30-day warranty for defective sensors and hardware. Just send your hurting Hayo back to us and we'll replace your unit, free of charge.

column5: >Q. How can I reach out to your team?
column8: >We are developing a community portal on our website to get to know you! In the meantime, message us on Facebook and we’ll be sure to respond as soon as possible.

column6: >Can you ship outside of the USA?
column7: >We will ship internationally, and shipping costs are automatically calculated when you pre-order.

column3: >We'd like to give a very special thanks to Runyon, for helping us develop our business and brand strategy. We'd also like to thank No Design for creating such a beautiful product design!

column1: ","Create virtual remote controls of your favorite smart home products wherever you want for whatever you need. Want to make your coffee table a play button for Sonos? Or place an on/off button for your HUE lights right above your bed? Hayo can do that - it's like using the force for your home.
Place Hayo in a room where you would like to set up a virtual remote control. Hayo will then create a 3D image map of the room.

Using Hayo’s augmented reality app, create virtual remote controls on top of objects or right in thin air. Then connect them to your favorite connected home platforms and products. Our app will be available for IOS and Android.
Since Hayo is always sensing your movements and gestures, you can start using the remote controls right away.
Create as many controls as you want.It's your house, you decide!
Hayo works best where you and your family spend the most time at home, usually the kitchen or living room.
You only need 1 Hayo per room,not one for each surface.

Hayo's performance is made possible by our suite of patented technology, software, and algorithms. Hayo sees and interprets space within its field of view thanks to advanced computer vision, which is used to reduce false positives and react only when a person interacts with the virtual remote controls or barriers. Any other motion outside this type of zone does not alter Hayo's behavior.

Most 3D spatial technologies scan a person's gestures and motion. Hayo takes the opposite approach: it scans your physical space and objects, taking action when a person comes in contact with that space or object in unique ways.
We are looking forward to collaborating with developers to inspire new ways of unlocking and fostering creativity for all users across contexts.
We have built a complete open API kit that will be available to technologists and tinkerers shortly after launch. Please get in touch with us here: developers@hayo.io.

In 2010, we found ourselves having a discussion with the lead designer of Minority Report’s interactive scenes and sequences. A few days later, we quit our jobs and started Space-Connect, the company behind Hayo.We are Hayo. We empower people to create amazing shared experiences that improve our lives, only limited by our imaginations.

We are a very passionate team who has devoted nearly six years of research and development solely into crafting an amazing product. During all these years, we have done our best to refine Hayo, and minimize the risks before this campaign, in all possible ways.

As we go through the logistics of manufacturing in large scale, there is always a possibility of unforeseen events that could impact on our production time-frame. If an issue arises, we will continue to be transparent to our supporter, and honor the quality and expectations set for Hayo.

We fundamentally believe that technology can improve our lives and make them more fun. Through the growth of spatial imaging, augmented reality, and connected home platforms, we believe there is an opportunity to activate this belief with our product.
Hayo is fully functional and ready for market. We are asking for your contribution to manufacture the device in large scale, and get them into your hands: our early adopters and developers.
From there we can make Hayo even better, and reach the people around the word.
Do you still have questions or special requests? We will be happy to help.Feel free to contact us at info@hayo.io, and we will respond as fast as possible.
Q. How does Hayo respect my privacy?Hayo doesn't capture or record images and we don't use a microphone. The information we collect about your virtual control set-ups is only for you.

Images acquired by Hayo are processed within the camera only, on a one-time basis and deleted right afterwards. The only image that might leave the camera is when the alarm is triggered to send a picture to the user.

There are two cameras inside Hayo, a depth camera and an RGB (Normal camera). The depth camera is used in real-time, so no capture is performed. The RGB camera is only used during set up or, if the user chooses to trigger a picture capture for security.
Q. How do you create virtual controls?Thanks to our Augmented Reality app, which will be available both on iOS and Android.

Q. What smart home devices can Hayo connect with?You can connect to Sonos, Nest, Hue, Lifx, Roku, Chromecast and many more. Using Wink, IFTTT or Logitech Harmony, you can connect to more than 270,000 devices and services.
Q. How many virtual controls can I use at the same time?You can use one virtual remote control at a time but can setup up to 15 for each Hayo device.

Q. Can I create customized controls?Hayo lets you create three types of virtual remote controls. Buttons, barriers and sliders. You can interact with them as you like. No special gestures are required. Just create virtual remote controls and start playing with them.

Q. What happens if I move Hayo after scanning and setting up controls in my home?Hayo remembers where you set up your controls and knows when you move it. So don't worry if you do some spring cleaning and the shelf across the room is a better spot for Hayo - you won't lose your controls.

Q. Can I set up and save profiles for different rooms in my home?Yes, we think the best place for Hayo is where you spend the most time. Probably in the living room or kitchen. Maybe the bedroom, too.

Q. If I have more than one device, do they communicate to each other?Yes, Hayos know when other Hayos are around and work with one another. So, if you have a huge room or one with a lot of weird angles, you may need more than one Hayo to get coverage. Not to worry: teamwork is essential with multiple Hayos, too!

Q. Can I be a beta tester?We will invite a select group of the early bird supporters to become beta testers. This will be invite-only based on certain factors, such as age, geography and used cases. We’ll send a notice later this fall to allow for beta test submissions.
Q. Is there a warranty?We offer a 30-day warranty for defective sensors and hardware. Just send your hurting Hayo back to us and we'll replace your unit, free of charge.
Q. How can I reach out to your team?We are developing a community portal on our website to get to know you! In the meantime, message us on Facebook and we’ll be sure to respond as soon as possible.
Q. Can you ship outside of the USA?We will ship internationally, and shipping costs are automatically calculated when you pre-order.

We'd like to give a very special thanks to Runyon, for helping us develop our business and brand strategy. We'd also like to thank No Design for creating such a beautiful product design!",46.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

GOOD MORNING!

One size does not fit all!

At HONGi, we know that we’re all unique, and so is our sleep.  So why should we still settle for mattresses that are “the perfect fit” for everyone?

With us, you can finally make your mattress a perfect fit for yourself – and your partner, if you choose.

 

 

Your mattress can be designed for an individual or built for couples, each side configured for the individual. Additionally, we offer two separate mattresses under one cover. So if you like a softer feel, but your partner prefers a more firm mattress, you can both have your way, no compromise necessary! 

We want people all over the globe to wake up happily and fueled by quality sleep, every day. We want people of any shape and size to get the rest they deserve. We can't change the world, but we can change the way you sleep. The rest is up to you.

 

HONGi mattresses are built using a variety of top quality materials, from micro inner-coils, latex, memory foam and beyond. With over 150 different sleep combinations, your mattress will truly be unique to you.  Additionally, you can combine your HONGi with the latest advancements in sleep technology to turn your HONGi into a smart mattress: Track heart rate, breathing rate and turnover rate to maximize the way you rest. Say goodbye to ‘one-fits-all’ and Good Morning to HONGi - your Mattress 2.0.

 

* Just an example of what some of your hybrid materials and layers could be that change based on your online answers

 

Each HONGi mattress boasts an 11' inch depth for maximum comfort and luxury. With two washable covers, every HONGi owner can expect a hygienic and easily maintained experience with every sleep.

Additionally, with a unique interchangeable top layer, your mattress can be changed even after purchase to adjust the firmness, foam, and extend the lifetime of your bed. This is a mattress that is unlike anything you have seen before.
column3:
>

 

 

 

 

This graphite, gel-infused, enhanced memory foam pillow provides superior thermal conductivity, pulling heat away from the body. Compression conduction technology improves heat transfer 7x better than conventional memory foam.

 

Smarten up your mattress and track your sleep with our easy-to-use hardware. You won’t even have to wear anything! Our contact free Smart Sleep Tracker records your heart rate, your heart rate variability, your breathing rate as well as your movement activity. Its' detailed result analysis (via browser or app) will help you and your partner identify patterns that keep you from getting your best nights' sleep!

 

Let's redefine the mattress shopping experience. With HONGi, everything is simplified. With a 100 Night Trial and Lifetime Warranty, we guarantee you will love your mattress.

To redeem your offer due to each HONGi being made specifically for YOU to use you will receive a unique discount code upon campaign completion that you will put on after completion of your mattress configuration to void payment. 

Our handy configurator turns you into a composer for your dream mattress.

This is all you have to do:

1.   Visit our website and enter the configurator.

2.   Take 3 minutes and answer the questions about yourself and your mattress usage.

3.   View your customized mattress results.

4.   Change whatever you want in the configuration.

5.   Order and wait for delivery!
column4:
>

We are proud to cooperate with high-class partners and Fortune 500 Organizations. That’s why our mattresses are not only individually comfortable but also of premium quality.

column1:
Our team, comprised of Mattress and Innovation Experts, came together to build the perfect mattress for everyone with the top quality and the top price.

Risks and challenges

Every business and every invention has risks. We have fully designed, tested and are ready to go into the manufacturing of our flagship product. We have done our own rigorous testing of materials in accordance with top quality standards. While there is a remote chance we missed something, if anything comes up during the current process of securing required and optional certifications, we will make necessary adjustments in order to conform and re-evaluate our timeline. 

 

We want to help more people to experience the benefits of a custom-made mattress. So if you decided to back our project or not, you can easily become part of our mission by spreading the word about HONGi. The more people know about HONGi, the more we can develop and adjust our offers and materials to any need or request.

Just share our story or give us reviews and feedback via our online channels. We appreciate any support!

Thank you and most of all: GOOD MORNING!

-Team HONGi

column2:
>Frequently Asked Questions

1. Can a HONGi be personalized for two people with individual sides?

Yes, absolutely. This will be selected during your mattress configuration. Just make sure to sleep on the right side to avoid any fights. 

2. How do I redeem my perk?

Upon completion of the campaign, you will receive an email with instructions to go on our configurator and answer the questions. You will enter your unique promo code that is provided in the email upon checkout. 

3, What is the delivery period for my mattress?

The delivery period depends on the variation of the HONGi Mattress. Depending on your unique configuration, different structure and some layers can are produced quickly while others take a bit longer. However, HONGi secures a delivery period of maximum 18 days after online configuration. Free Shipping in the USA, delivered to your door. 

4. Where and how can I try out the HONGi Mattresses?

HONGi is an online mattress vendor, which means that we are not building a brick and mortar stores chain. However, customer satisfaction in of major interest for HONGi.  We offer a 100 day trial period with every mattress purchase. If you are not fully satisfied with your mattress, you have an opportunity to exchange the top layer for free! If you are still not satisfied with your mattress even after the layer exchange, you can return your mattress for a full refund.

5. Is there an adjustment period for my new mattress?

Yes, every person has to get used to their new mattress, just like breaking in a new pair of shoes.The time to get used to your mattress generally depends on your age and is as follows:

under 20 years old – 10 days

20 – 40 years old – 20 days

40+ years old – ca. 35 days

6. Is HONGi a right mattress for those who have back/neck pain?

Yes. That is why our HONGi Configurator has particular questions addressing those needs, such as spine injuries or back pain, reading in bed etc. However, our mattress cannot replace medical treatment and prolonged pain should be addressed by a doctor. 

7. How long can I use my mattress?

We guarantee 10 years of usage duration, whereas from hygienic and healthcare matters we highly recommend to change your mattress at least every 8 years. Changing your top layer can help prolong the life if your mattress as well.

8. On which surface can a HONGi mattress be used?

HONGi Mattress can be used on every surface, whether it is a slatted frame, a pallet, or floor. However, in combination with slatted frames, the maximum level of comfort is provided and air flow is optimized Thus, in order to assure the maximum lifetime of your mattress, slatted frames are recommended.

9. What is the structure of the HONGi Mattress?

The HONGi Mattress consists of 5 layers, which are contained within two covers, an inner and an outer one, which can be opened with a zipper. The outer cover is thicker and aims to bring you a nice and soft comfort feeling. The inner cover is thinner and is designed to keep the layers together. This enables layer exchange if such a necessity arises.

Thanks and feel free to comment of message us at service@hongi.com for more information.

Good Morning!

The outer cover is thicker and aims to bring you a nice and soft comfort feeling. The inner cover is thinner and is designed to keep the layers together. This enables layer exchange if such a necessity arises.Thanks and feel free to comment of message us at service@hongi.com for more information.Good Morning!",49.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2:
>Our next goal is US$5000 which will enable us to also purchase a 300L solarhart solar hot water system to ensure that each child should have access to hot water. This is vital during the winter months when temperatures can drop as low as 0 degrees C, or 32 degrees F... BBRRRRRRR


Who we are &
column3:
who benefits from your generosity?

We at Chameleon Safaris are working hard to raise the much needed funds to renovate the bathroom at the Dolam Children's Home. We have been working with the Dolam Children's Home for approximately 1.5 years and have seen first hand the need to renovate the bathroom. 

The current bathroom is 1 room consisting of a bath, shower (with no door/curtain or proper shower head), toilet (with no toilet seat) and basin. I'm sure you all remember the days of sharing a bathroom with 1 or 2 siblings... these kids share with 18 others!!!!!! 

Our aim is to replace this bathroom with: 

*2 showers with dressing area,
column4:
>*a toilet with toilet seat
*a large basin, or possibly 2 basins depending on the space and budget
column5: >This will enable the 18 children/teenagers + house mother increase the bath/shower rate from 2-3 times per week per child and increase the level of hygiene
column6:
> in the house to prevent avoidable health issues as well as allowing more than 1 person to use the bathroom at one time.

What We Need &
column7:
What You Get

US$5000 which is
 
US$2000 for the renovations &
column8:
US$3000 for a 300L solar hot water geyser!!!

  • Perks include
column9:
*A video message from the children at the Dolam Children Home
*Great karma knowing you are helping improve the living standards of vulnerable Namibian children!

The Impact

The house itself is a small, 3 bedroom family home that has, over the years, become a safe haven for 18 vulnerable children of Namibia. These children have come into the care of Rosa Namises, a well known campaigner in women's &
column10:
children's rights here in Namibia, and are now living as 1 very large family in 1 very small space. Our hope is that eventually, we will be able to assist the Dolam Children's Home Trust to build their dream home, however in the meantime, we would like to make their current home as livable as possible.

We have in the past 2 months already renovated the kitchen. With the help of private donations and help from the local business community we managed, in just 2 days, to remove the old kitchen (a health and safety nightmare!!) and replace with a functioning and safe kitchen that now has cupboard doors, HOORAY! Check out the video we made from that weekend when we took 18 kids camping to get them out of the house and enable the guys from Creative Kitchens to do their thing!
column15:
>Other Ways You Can Help

No amount is too small, maybe you could give up coffee or beer or wine for the week and donate the money that you would otherwise spend. If you don't love coffee, beer or wine and you really can't give $$$ we do understand, we just ask you that you help us by spreading the word and asking those that you know to give just a little.

Every $ you give helps us get that much closer to our goals!

  • Remember, you can use the Indiegogo share tools to help reach all your Facebook friends, we know you have lots!!!

By supporting our campaign, all funds (once they reach Namibia) will go directly towards the project and nothing will be lost in administration fees etc.

Please note however that 4% of money raised will go to Indiegogo and US$25 for the transfer fee to send the money ALL the way to NAMIBIA!

column1: Ikigai is the Japanese word meaning ""A Reason for being, Finding your passion, a sense of purpose, and also a feeling of well-being. Finding your Ikigai is combining what you love, what the world needs, what you are good at, and what you can be paid for. Where they overlap in the center of the logo you have our Ikigai, the Japanese Kanji for ""blade"" which for us is beautiful amazing sharp ergonomic knives.

After many years of development we've created what we feel encompasses the ideal Chefs knife set. Specially designed blade profiles allow the knives to excel at slicing, rocking and everything in between.

All knives feature Recycled Carbon Fiber handles which are made from recycled and left over carbon fiber flakes, these flakes of carbon fiber are cast in resin and provide a truly unique look that will catch and shine in the light!

• 9"" Chefs knife - The perfect companion to tackle any task large or small. Its large, wide blade and weight make it perfect for chopping through any sized foods. Weight is balanced in the finger groove just past the bolster for ultimate control of a large knife

• 6"" Chefs knife - Both a fine dexterous tool and still able to perform mincing and slicing tasks this knife is a favorite among many for a multitude of tasks. The knife weight is balanced more to the handle for lighter more agile blade feel allowing for perfect performance

• 3.25"" Paring knife - The most agile and fine tasked knife in the kitchen these parings knives have a fine point and are designed to have an angular draw while held straight. As with most paring knives weight is balanced towards the handle for superb agility and weightlessness.
These knives utilize an AUS10V Japanese Super Steel core clad in 67 layers of our beautiful custom Damascus pattern.

AUS10V has a high level of carbon for strength and edge retention, chromium for stain resistance as well as high levels of Molybdenum and Vanadium to produce an amazing cutting steel.  AUS10V has a fine structure and good distribution of elements allowing them to undergo a cryogenic nitrogen cooling treatment which is not a different type of quenching method but is  an additional treatment used after quenching. The result of which achieves more complete transformation and formation of carbides within the steel structure.  This increases the hardness and cutting characteristics resulting in a durable 60-61HRC

All knives are sharpened to perfection on a Cutting edge 10” whetstone sharpening machine. Using up to a 2000 Grit whetstone wheel and leather strop a razor sharp hollow ground edge is formed at 17’ and will remain sharp for up to 10x longer than a standard stainless steel chef knife.
All knives come in a black case!

Our First campaign didn't get funded, we feel we acknowledge our mistakes and went back to the drawing board regarding some aspects of our knives. We have since been funded on kickstarter however need more funds to help bring more options for the future.  Please help create a future for our knives!
We understand that not everyone can spare money to help us, but if you appreciate what we're doing please take a moment to share our campaign we appreciate the support!

>We have 5 product designs -- campers, food carts, mercantile carts, a dinky dub (a smaller version of the above), and Dub Dekor retro-styled furniture.
column8: >The Dub Box design process starts with a new fiberglass mold.  We are not converting old VW’s.  Each Dub Box has the look of the great iconic van and the nostalgic feeling ones gets when something old is shiny and new again.
column11: >WHY IS DUB BOX USA ON INDIEGOGO?

column5: >We’ve overcome some big hurdles as most small start-ups do.  Dub Box USA needs additional funding to increase productivity and monthly output to meet our strong back log of orders.
>We are seeking your support to help us take the next step into making our shop more efficient and refine our design and building process so we can pass this on to our customers.
>Your support in these areas will really secure our sustainability for years to come.
>Funding would be targeted in the following areas:
>Shop Equipment to increase our lean manufacturing process
>Solid works Software and CAD design software
>Mold improvements to significantly reduce labor and production time
>Small inventory of “design ready” bodies for quick delivery

","WHAT IS DUB BOX USA?

column1: For 2-1/2 years we have been designing and manufacturing lightweight towable campers, food carts, retail carts and novelty furniture reminiscent of the vintage travel trailer and the VW camper van of the late 60s.

We have 5 product designs -- campers, food carts, mercantile carts, a dinky dub (a smaller version of the above), and Dub Dekor retro-styled furniture. The Dub Box design process starts with a new fiberglass mold.  We are not converting old VW’s.  Each Dub Box has the look of the great iconic van and the nostalgic feeling ones gets when something old is shiny and new again.  WHY IS DUB BOX USA ON INDIEGOGO?
We’ve overcome some big hurdles as most small start-ups do.  Dub Box USA needs additional funding to increase productivity and monthly output to meet our strong back log of orders.
We are seeking your support to help us take the next step into making our shop more efficient and refine our design and building process so we can pass this on to our customers.
Your support in these areas will really secure our sustainability for years to come.
Funding would be targeted in the following areas:
Shop Equipment to increase our lean manufacturing process
Solid works Software and CAD design software
Mold improvements to significantly reduce labor and production time
Small inventory of “design ready” bodies for quick delivery
WHY SHOULD YOU SUPPORT DUB BOX USA?
We hope you can support our company so we can continue to design innovative trailers.  Supporting Dub Box USA has many tangible and significant benefits:

Dub Box USA currently employs 10 people. That means 10 people keep their job and another 10 unemployed people can get a job.  That’s 20 people, maybe more, that will be so grateful to be employed (their families too).
When Dub Box USA production grows our vendors also benefit.  When we grow our vendors will have an up-tick in business.
Dub Box USA encourages people to start mobile businesses and encourages existing businesses to expand.  This boosts local economies and has a positive affect on employment.

Dub Box USA gets people and families outdoors, reducing stress, increasing physical activity and encouraging quality time together. Dub Box can help people and families disconnect from weekly stress and come home refreshed.  Let’s not forget, this also gives the travel and camping sector a good boost too.   OUR HEART-FELT THANK YOU!Thank you for taking the time to read our story and contributing to Dub Box. Please pass our story to your friends and family.  Every bit helps and we are very grateful.   From everyone at Dub Box, thank you!We want to thank the following businesses and media outlets for their wonderful support!",12.0,0,"1 Campaign

We need your help to ALERT Sumner County taxpayers about the facts surrounding the largest property tax hike in the history of Sumner County passed on November 3, 2014. 
We will be asking taxpayers to sign a petition demanding this tax hike be rescinded so taxpayers can be properly informed and involved in this decision BEFORE the largest tax hike in Sumner County is finalized.
Regarding the 23.4% Property Tax Hike, these facts are not in dispute:
-- This is the largest property tax hike in the history of Sumner County.

-- The vote to raise property taxes was NOT conducted at the regularly scheduled county commission meeting. A special meeting was called to vote on this extraordinary tax hike and meeting minutes indicate no citizens spoke in opposition.
-- The special called meeting was scheduled for November 3, 2014, a day before a major national election when the attention of the media and citizens was focused on national issues.

-- At the next regularly scheduled County Commission meeting after the special called meeting many people showed up to express their objections to the tax hike. One of the county commissioners made a motion asking that these citizens be allowed to speak. The County Commission defeated this motion and those citizens were not allowed to express their objections to the largest property tax hike in Sumner County History.

-- Most of the new slate of county commissioners who voted to raise property taxes for all Sumner Taxpayers were first nominated in the May primary where voter turn out was 10.74% of all voters and many were nominated with 50% to 30% of the vote. In other words, County Commissioners elected by less than 10% of the voters (and in some cases 3-5%) decided to raise the property taxes on 100% of Sumner County taxpayers at a special called meeting.

ENGLISH VERSION ----------- VERSION FRANCAISE

Step into your childhood dreams, spending a night in a tree-house, a barrel, an imp's house or furthermore, in our future Tarzan hut under the stars …

Join us in participating in Le Domaine de Poiseuil's future development : a unique place of interest, well known and settled in Southern Burgundy for more than ten years, near the Viré Clessé vineyards.
Jean-Christophe Robinet (a French unusual accommodation precursor) and his team wish to go one step beyond, bringing a real playful and exclusive family park in his centenary old magnificent property

"" More than ever, holiday customers look for novelties and every possible on the spot activity. We're now involved in a permanent innovative circle, and services development : leisure activities, well adapted facilities in harmony with nature. We must deal with our customers expectations, while anticipating their future needs.
      "" I'm still full of ideas and very confident in our future, provided we keep on challenging ourselves and being reactive. ""
J-C Robinet
Do you wish to discover more about our amazing projects ? Follow us into the very heart of our next plans …

column2: >Let's join this unique place today, to help it reach its full potential !

column1: To meet our new expectations, we'll propose unveiled curious accommodations (barrels, horsedrawn trailers, unknown tree houses), all of original conception, making of Domaine de Poiseuil, more than ever, a magical refreshing universe. Please give a look to our photo gallery !

A complete well being space, including sauna, jacuzzi, hammam, massages, swimming pool and showers will take place in the park centre. Furthermore, to stick on unusual facilities, a wood heated 4 people Scandinavian Bath will become available.
To seduce our faithfull customers, as well as our future ones, we also plan a new activities program. Taking place inside and outside the domain, you'll find :

- badminton
- volleyball, soccer, archery, riding, darts, mountain bike and horse riding, treasure hunt
- hot-air balloon or helicopter flight, carriage stroll, wine tasting sessions, thanks to local partnerships.
Beside our regular bikes, you'll also find electric assisted ones, to discover our countryside landscapes effortlessly !

Le Domaine de Poiseuil is naturally also a children reception and entertainment place. Ponies, a mini-farm, a bio kitchen garden and more playful activities will take place. This way, children and adults can share wonderful moments together. Do you feel a new desire for adventure ? A new treasure hunt will make its appearance and allow you to share more fun with your children. Last, but not least, a new playground will be settled.
Your comfort is our priority. All our paths will be lighted at night, and better toilet blocks will appear in the park.
Furthermore, electric small cars will be at your disposal to move your luggage, for example.

Today, more than ever, we aim to create a special harmony with nature. Thus we'll enlarge our present horse riding structures, allowing more horses and ponies in. The bio kitchen garden and the mini-farm will complete this relation to our natural surroundings. The pond will also be set up, for our guests pleasure.

The Domaine de Poiseuil is a 17 acres residential and leisure park, offering a 67 residents capacity. Its present facilities include 6 tree houses, 5 unusual huts, 4 shelters and 5 guest houses, and many leisure equipments (mountain bikes, ping-pong, babyfoot, swimming pool, spa, massages, …). More activities will help you discover the Domaine’s unique surroundings (horse or poney riding, horse carriage tours, wine tasting initiations, …). 

In the park, facing the main guest house, you’ll even find a dedicated restaurant : La Rôtisserie. If you prefer cooking by yourself, a huge barbecue is at our guests free disposal.

Poiseuil is a perfect place to releave and take positive energy. It’s also the starting point of many cultural experiences. Southern Burgundy has a worldwide reputation for wines, gastronomy, charming and varying landscapes,as well as a rich historical background and european influence, specially through the nearby Cluny’s abbey and Ducs de Bourgogne. 

The now fast developing wine tourism trend also makes for our growing success, in a very distinctive and exclusive environment.
Considering touristic evolutions and customers demand, we now face a major evolution for more services and comfort.

Funding such a project is a thrilling experience. For the first time, we’d like to involve our present and future customers in a unique and innovative partnership. Every Indiegogo fund, your own donations, will help the Domaine de Poiseuil’s next evolutions and improvements.
The overall project will cost $ 545 000 (412 000 €). This amount considers the new huts (conception + setting up), new equipments as well as renovations.

Giving our project its own testimony, our local General Council and Burgundy Regional Council support our project, and granted us a 105.000 € (139.000 $) total subsidy.

With an intermediary step at $ 200.000 (150.000 €), we invite your contribution to the development of a real family village , based on relaxation and leisure activities. This place, with his priviliged connection to nature, will be yours !
Your involvement into our next stage of development will make you an actor of this unique project.
You can follow our future evolutions, on our special dedicated website, or by calling directly on Jean-Christophe Robinet's mobile at 0033  660 888 511.
Here's our new constructions financial planning according to the importance of your contributions.

Compensations will come as a counterpart of presales. Our goal is to create a financial leverage effect, and complete our final budget with complementary financing.

Know that any contribution is a precious help for us. Even if it's small, every
donations is a step forward the realization of our project.
receive a digital thanks by e-mail and your name will be shown on a

column1: Reaching $ 200.000 (150.000 €) will be a great achievement. It""ll be a true endorsement to our project, going over this amount,  up to $ 400 000, can bring us to cover all our 2015 evolution expenses. Wise impr
Be assured there are so many wise, improvements and ideas to realize, that every cent will be worth it !

A former Paris catering school graduate, Jean-Christophe developed his experience in many different fields, creating many restaurants and working as a realtor.
A big achievement for him has been to work during ten years with famous interior designers.
In 2000, he decided to require his great grand parent's house The Domaine de Poiseuil (en italic). Discovering this place potential properties led him to create today's residential en leisure resort
Share our project, and  win a 3 days / 2 nights stay, all inclusive, with one activity of your choice !!!
