Create your own Indiegogo account, to get  your personal link. After your contribution, you'll discover sharing tools just below the video.
2. Copy your personnal link (ex : http://igg.me/)
You can promote our campaign, using your dedicated and personal link (ex : http://igg.me/at/hut-project/x/3252753 ) on your emails, Twitter or Facebook accounts and others social networks.
You like our project but you can't give a direct financial contribution. You can help us all the same :
Make our promotion to your relatives and friends, or simply on your social networks accounts, blogs or websites.
Un homme, des arbres, un rêve...

Vivez vos rêves d’enfant en venant dormir dans une cabane perchée, un tonneau, une maison de lutin ou encore dans la future cabane de Tarzan à la belle étoile … tout en participant au développement du Domaine de Poiseuil : un site touristique déjà reconnu et bien implanté depuis 10 ans en Bourgogne du sud, à proximité des vignobles de Viré Clessé.

Jean-Christophe Robinet (précurseur de l’hébergement insolite en France) et son équipe, souhaitent aller encore plus loin, en créant dans cette magnifique propriété centenaire, un véritable parc familial ludique et insolite.

""Plus que jamais la clientèle est exigeante et recherche de la nouveauté et des activités sur place. Nous devons apporter le maximum de services et sans cesse innover : créer des activités ludiques, une restauration familiale adaptée à tous et orienter l'ensemble au plus près de la nature avec un confort adapté au tourisme d'aujourd'hui tout en anticipant les besoins futurs. Je ne manque pas d'idées et l'avenir est prometteur avec une croissance élevée et constante si l'on sait se remettre en question et être réactif.""
Vous voulez en savoir plus ? Alors je vous invite à lire la suite de notre aventure !

column2: >Ensemble, aidons ce site somptueux à garder sa dynamique et à évoluer pour qu'il soit encore meilleur !

column1: A cette nouvelle étape de son évolution, le Domaine de Poiseuil proposera de nouveaux hébergements insolites (tonneaux, roulottes artisanales, cabanes perchées ...), tous de conception originale en éco-construction, pour faire de ce lieu de détente un univers féerique. N'hésitez pas à faire un tour dans la Galerie photos !

Un véritable espace ""Spa, Bien être"" comprenant sauna, jacuzzi, hammam et douches fera son apparition dans une dépendance. De plus, pour aller toujours au plus près de l'insolite, nous installerons un Bain Nordique de 4 personnes chauffé au bois.
Afin de séduire et fidéliser ses hôtes ainsi qu’une nouvelle
clientèle, le projet prévoit également un programme complet de nouvelles

activités, tant à l'intérieur du Domaine ( badminton, volley-ball, football, tir-à-l'arc, équitation, fléchettes,  promenade en VTT et à cheval, chasse au trésor, ...) qu'à l'extérieur (tour en montgolfière ou en hélicoptère, balade en calèche, parcours oenologique) grâce à des partenariats locaux. Nous prévoyons aussi de mettre en place une gamme de vélo à assistance électrique pour profiter des paysages sans effort !

Le Domaine de Poiseuil, c'est aussi un lieu d'accueil et de divertissement pour les enfants. Poney, Mini ferme, Potager Bio et activités ludiques seront au rendez-vous. Ainsi, petits et grands pourront partager, ensemble, de merveilleux moments. Une envie soudaine de partir à l'aventure ? Une nouvelle chasse au trésor fera son apparition et vous permettra de vous rapprocher de vos enfants tout en vous amusant ! Et pour couronner le tout, un véritable espace jeux avec toboggans sera installé.
Nous avons donc décidé de créer des allées éclairées ainsi qu'un nouveau bloc sanitaire extérieur accessible pour les hébergements nature.
De plus, des voiturettes électriques seront à votre disposition et vous permettront de déplacer vos bagages entre le parking et votre logement.
à créer un véritable parc en harmonie avec la nature. C'est pour cela que nous
voulons agrandir les structures équestres déjà en place, et ainsi, permettre
l'accueil de nouveaux chevaux et poneys. Un potager bio sera aménagé et la mini
ferme, quant à elle, fera son grand retour. Nous avons aussi prévu de redonner vie à la mare.

Le Domaine de Poiseuil est un parc résidentiel et d'activités de 7 hectares possédant une capacité d'accueil de 67 personnes. Il comprend 6 cabanes perchées, 5 cabanes insolites, 4 gîtes et 5 chambres d'hôtes. Nous proposons de nombreuses activités classiques (VTT, ping-pong, babyfoot, piscine, jacuzzi, massages, etc...) et ludiques (équitation ou randonnées à cheval, ballades en calèche, initiation à la dégustation des vins) ainsi qu'un restaurant : ""La Rôtisserie"". De plus, un barbecue est à votre disposition. C'est aussi un lieu idéal de détente, de repos, mais également de découvertes culturelles.
Cette initiative s'inscrit dans une région à fort
potentiel touristique, historique, culturel et gastronomique, sans oublier une
importante fréquentation internationale générée par l'œnotourisme en Bourgogne
Compte tenu des évolutions touristiques et de la demande, une nouvelle orientation s'impose :

Le budget de réalisation d'un tel projet est important. Aujourd'hui, notre besoin de financement complémentaire est certe significatif, mais atteignable. Les fonds que nous récolterons par le biais d'Indiegogo, vos dons, seront tout simplement alloués à l'amélioration et au développement du Domaine de Poiseuil.

Dans le cadre du projet, les travaux ont un coût de 412.000 € (545.000 $). Cette somme tient compte du coût total des nouvelles cabanes (construction + mise en place) ainsi que des rénovations et autres aménagements nécessaires. Nous pouvons d'ores et déjà vous annoncer que le conseil général de Saône et Loire et la Région Bourgogne soutiennent notre projet, et nous ont accordé une subvention totale de 105.000 € (139.000 $).

En fixant un palier initial à 150.000 € (200.000$), nous vous proposons tout simplement de contribuer au développement d'un véritable village familial de loisirs et de détente. Ce village, au plus près de la nature, sera le votre !
Vous l'aurez compris, en participant au financement participatif du projet du Domaine de Poiseuil, vous ferez de ce site un endroit qui vous ressemble. Vivez de l'intérieur ce projet unique !
Pour connaitre les détails de toutes les évolutions futures, n'hésitez pas à consulter notre site internet consacré à notre projet ou alors contactez nous directement au +33 (6) 60 88 85 11.
Vous trouverez, ci dessous l'avancement du financement des cabanes et de leur construction en fonction des contributions que vous nous apporterez.

Les compensations sont pour parti de la prévente (TVA incluse) nous redistribuons donc une importante partie de vos dons, il s’agit de collecter suffisamment de fonds pour créer un effet de levier et boucler notre budget par des financements complémentaires.
Sachez que la moindre contribution est une aide précieuse pour nous. Qu'il soit petit ou grand, chaque don est un pas de plus vers la réalisation de notre projet.
Pour voter, c'est simple. Après avoir contribuer à hauteur de 8$ (minimum), il vous est possible de nous envoyer un mail à
Préciser votre nom Indiegogo (si vous avez un compte) ainsi que le numéro ou le nom de la cabane que vous voulez élire.
Vous êtes une entreprise ? Transformez votre don en cadeau totalement personnalisé : surprenez vos clients avec un bureau-tonneau spécialement construit pour votre entreprise.

Le montant de vos contributions peut également vous permettre d'offrir des nuitées à vos collaborateurs, vos clients et vos salariés. Vous pouvez également privatiser le domaine pour quelques jours par an afin d'organiser vos manifestations et vos événements. Veuillez nous contacter pour plus d'informations.
Atteindre 150.000 € serait formidable. Cela nous permettrait de voir le grand intérêt que vous portez à notre projet et ne pourrait que nous réchauffer le coeur.

Obtenir un financement accru - jusqu'à 300.000 € - reviendrait à couvrir totalement les dépenses engagées pour les améliorations 2015. Nous pouvons vous l'assurer, il y a tant de choses à créer et d'idées à réaliser, qu'aucun don ne sera gaspillé inutilement ! Nous pourrions, par exemple, construire et installer la Cabane de Max (voir photos galerie).

Diplômé de l'école hôtelière de Paris, et doté d'une forte expérience dans de nombreux métiers (restauration, rénovation de bâtiments) il a beaucoup appris en travaillant pendant dix ans avec des décorateurs.
En 2000, il a décidé de racheter la maison de ses arrières grands parents. En voyant l'étendue et le potentiel du site, il s'est mis en tête de créer quelque chose d'unique.
Aujourd'hui, le Domaine de Poiseuil est la représentation de son expertise et de sa vision.
Partagez notre projet et gagnez un séjour de 3 jours, 2 nuits tout inclus avec une activité au choix !!!
Afin d'atteindre notre objectif de 200.000 $, nous avons décidé de mettre en place un concours dont le gagnant recevra un séjour tout compris au Domaine de Poiseuil.
1. Inscrivez-vous sur Indiegogo et allez sur notre campagne

Créez un compte sur Indiegogo et obtenez votre lien unique, grâce aux outils de partage en dessous de la vidéo. Vous devez être identifié à votre compte Indiegogo pour voir apparaître votre lien unique et vous devez déjà avoir contribué à notre campagne.
2. Copiez votre lien unique (ex : http://igg.me/)

N'oubliez pas de partager le lien vers notre campagne en indiquant bien votre numéro UNIQUE (le lien ressemble à celui-ci : http://igg.me/at/hut-project/x/3252753) par email, Twitter, Facebook et tout autre outil de communication.
Notre projet vous plait mais vous ne voulez pas contribuer financièrement ? Vous pouvez quand même nous aider! Comment ?

C'est très simple, il vous suffit de parler à vos proches, vos amis, votre entourage de notre projet ou tout simplement de le partager sur les réseaux sociaux, votre blog ou encore, sur votre site internet. Votre aide nous est précieuse, ne l'oubliez pas !
A man, a bush, a dream...

Step into your childhood dreams, spending a night in a tree-house, a barrel, an imp's house or furthermore, in our future Tarzan hut under the stars …Join us in participating in Le Domaine de Poiseuil's future development : a unique place of interest, well known and settled in Southern Burgundy for more than ten years, near the Viré Clessé vineyards.
Jean-Christophe Robinet (a French unusual accommodation precursor) and his team wish to go one step beyond, bringing a real playful and exclusive family park in his centenary old magnificent property

More than ever, holiday customers look for novelties and every possible on the spot activity. We're now involved in a permanent innovative circle, and services development : leisure activities, well adapted facilities in harmony with nature. We must deal with our customers expectations, while anticipating their future needs.      "" I'm still full of ideas and very confident in our future, provided we keep on challenging ourselves and being reactive. ""J-C Robinet
Do you wish to discover more about our amazing projects ? Follow us into the very heart of our next plans …
Domaine de Poiseuil :welcome, here's your home
Let's join this unique place today, to help it reach its full potential !

To meet our new expectations, we'll propose unveiled curious accommodations (barrels, horsedrawn trailers, unknown tree houses), all of original conception, making of Domaine de Poiseuil, more than ever, a magical refreshing universe. Please give a look to our photo gallery !

A complete well being space, including sauna, jacuzzi, hammam, massages, swimming pool and showers will take place in the park centre. Furthermore, to stick on unusual facilities, a wood heated 4 people Scandinavian Bath will become available.
To seduce our faithfull customers, as well as our future ones, we also plan a new activities program. Taking place inside and outside the domain, you'll find :

- badminton- volleyball, soccer, archery, riding, darts, mountain bike and horse riding, treasure hunt- hot-air balloon or helicopter flight, carriage stroll, wine tasting sessions, thanks to local partnerships.
Beside our regular bikes, you'll also find electric assisted ones, to discover our countryside landscapes effortlessly !

Le Domaine de Poiseuil is naturally also a children reception and entertainment place. Ponies, a mini-farm, a bio kitchen garden and more playful activities will take place. This way, children and adults can share wonderful moments together. Do you feel a new desire for adventure ? A new treasure hunt will make its appearance and allow you to share more fun with your children. Last, but not least, a new playground will be settled.
Your comfort is our priority. All our paths will be lighted at night, and better toilet blocks will appear in the park.
Furthermore, electric small cars will be at your disposal to move your luggage, for example.

Today, more than ever, we aim to create a special harmony with nature. Thus we'll enlarge our present horse riding structures, allowing more horses and ponies in. The bio kitchen garden and the mini-farm will complete this relation to our natural surroundings. The pond will also be set up, for our guests pleasure.

The Domaine de Poiseuil is a 17 acres residential and leisure park,  offering a 67 residents capacity. Its present facilities include 6 tree houses, 5 unusual huts, 4 shelters and 5 guest houses, and many leisure equipments (mountain bikes, ping-pong, babyfoot, swimming pool, spa, massages, …). More activities will help you discover the Domaine’s unique surroundings (horse or poney riding, horse carriage tours, wine tasting initiations, …). In the park, facing the main guest house, you’ll even find a dedicated restaurant : La Rôtisserie. If you prefer cooking by yourself, a huge barbecue is at our guests free disposal.

Poiseuil is a perfect place to releave and take positive energy. It’s also the starting point of many cultural experiences. Southern Burgundy has a worldwide reputation for wines, gastronomy, charming and varying landscapes,as well as a rich historical background and european influence, specially through the nearby Cluny’s abbey and Ducs de Bourgogne. The now fast developing wine tourism trend also makes for our growing success, in a very distinctive and exclusive environment.
How will be used my contribution ?
Considering touristic evolutions and customers demand, we now face a major evolution for more services and comfort.

Funding such a project is a thrilling experience. For the first time, we’d like to involve our present and future customers in a unique and innovative partnership. Every Indiegogo fund, your own donations, will help the Domaine de Poiseuil’s next evolutions and improvements.
The overall project will cost $ 545 000 (412 000 €). This amount considers the new huts (conception + setting up), new equipments as well as renovations.

Giving our project its own testimony, our local General Council and Burgundy Regional Council support our project, and granted us a 105.000 €  (139.000 $) total subsidy.With an intermediary step at $ 200.000 (150.000 €), we invite your contribution to the development of a real family village , based on relaxation and leisure activities. This place, with his priviliged connection to nature, will be yours !
Your involvement into our next stage of development will make you an actor of this unique project.
You can follow our future evolutions, on our special dedicated website, or by calling directly on Jean-Christophe Robinet's mobile at 0033  660 888 511.
Here's our new constructions financial planning according to the importance of your contributions.

Compensations will come as a counterpart of presales. Our goal is to create a financial leverage effect, and complete our final budget with complementary financing. Know that any contribution is a precious help for us. Even if it's small, every donations is a step forward the realization of our project.

You're a company executive ? Get a very personalized contribution's testimony, with a unique desk barrel, specially made for your company can also get spacial stays for your employees, customers and business partners. Or why not reserve the whole place for yourself one or many days for your business events. Contact us and let's define your best options !

Reaching $ 200.000 (150.000 €) will be a great achievement. It""ll be a true endorsement to our project, going over this amount,  up to $ 400 000, can bring us to cover all our 2015 evolution expenses. Wise impr
Be assured there are so many wise, improvements and ideas to realize, that every cent will be worth it !

A former Paris catering school graduate, Jean-Christophe developed his experience in many different fields, creating many restaurants and working as a realtor.A big achievement for him has been to work during ten years with famous interior designers.
In 2000, he decided to require his great grand parent's house The Domaine de Poiseuil (en italic). Discovering this place potential properties led him to create today's residential en leisure resort
Share our project, and  win a 3 days / 2 nights stay, all inclusive, with one activity of your choice !!!
1. Join on Indiegogo and go on our campaign.
Create your own Indiegogo account, to get  your personal link. After your contribution, you'll discover sharing tools just below the video.
You can promote our campaign, using your dedicated and personal link (ex : http://igg.me/at/hut-project/x/3252753 ) on your emails, Twitter or Facebook accounts and others social networks.
Our contest begins from now on !!
You like our project but you can't give a direct financial contribution. You can help us all the same :
Make our promotion to your relatives and friends, or simply on your social networks accounts, blogs or websites.
Your involvement is our precious gift !
Un homme, des arbres, un rêve...

Vivez vos rêves d’enfant en venant dormir dans  une cabane perchée, un tonneau, une maison de lutin ou encore dans la future cabane de Tarzan à la belle étoile … tout en participant au développement du Domaine de Poiseuil :  un site touristique déjà reconnu et bien implanté depuis 10 ans en Bourgogne du sud, à proximité des vignobles de Viré Clessé.

1. Inscrivez-vous sur Indiegogo et allez sur notre campagne

Créez un compte sur Indiegogo et obtenez votre lien unique, grâce aux outils de partage en dessous de la vidéo. Vous devez être identifié à votre compte Indiegogo pour voir apparaître votre lien unique et vous devez déjà avoir contribué à notre campagne.

N'oubliez pas de partager le lien vers notre campagne en indiquant bien votre numéro UNIQUE (le lien ressemble à celui-ci : http://igg.me/at/hut-project/x/3252753) par email, Twitter, Facebook et tout autre outil de communication.
Notre projet vous plait mais vous ne voulez pas contribuer financièrement ? Vous pouvez quand même nous aider! Comment ?

C'est très simple, il vous suffit de parler à vos proches, vos amis, votre entourage de notre projet ou tout simplement de le partager sur les réseaux sociaux, votre blog ou encore, sur votre site internet. Votre aide nous est précieuse, ne l'oubliez pas !",30.0,0,"1 Campaign

Poolhaus is returning to the playa for 2015! An oasis of water at the heart of Nowhere for you to splash about, cool off and relax!  First seen at Nowhere in 2011, Poolhaus returned bigger and better in 2014 with more splash space for you dusty Nooners and our trademark exploding filter system! This year, in 2015, we want to make all this awesomeness happen again, but we need your help!
We need a minimum of £500 to make the pool happen. A bit extra will ensure that we can stay open all week.

Mostly we need money for the most basic thing: water. Getting water to the desert is no trivial task and we need 10 tonnes of the stuff for one fill of our huge pool! Our target of £500 is the absolute minimum to give us one fill. Although we improve our filters every year, we know from experience that keeping our poolwater free of dust is a monumentally challenging task, even for our £1500 cleaning system! We've made improvements again this year but £800 would enable us to change our water halfway through the festival and guarantee we can stay open for the full duration!
It would be heartbreaking to have all that equipment set up on the Playa and no water to fill the pool,
column5: >so go on! Pledge what you can, and help us create a little moist patch in the dusty hotpants of Nowhere!

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

We Need to stop this terrible excuse for a pizza. Yeah, I get it. They still get the money. This is about respect. This is about standing up for pizza shops around the world. You get to be a part of the cause and solution here folks.

column1: For the most part I'm hoping to raise well over the $500. The burning of the pizza's is just fun because the pizza is shitty. All of the extra money will be donated to this Years Mayflower Marathon (http://rock102.com/mayflower-marathon/) Just trying to be creative and raise some money for the less fortunate.
Blah blah blah you think this is a scam whatever. Don't donate. I don't give a flying fuck.

column2:
>Meet CapsuleCam

CapsuleCam is the only indoor smart home camera with Starlight Vision. It allows you to see sharper, crisper images in color, in dark and low-light environments.

What is Starlight Vision?

CapsuleCam uses STARVIS® sensor, which was developed by Sony in 2015.

Compared with traditional security cameras, Starlight sensor-powered cameras deliver full color images without using artificial lighting (infrared lighting) under low-light environments.

Still image capture with CapsuleCam v.s. Other Cameras in the same low light environment:

 

Why Starlight Vision?

Starlight allows you to see more of your home with clearer images in color—whether in daylight, low light, or in the dark. By capturing dark areas in full color, you are getting additional descriptive details that will help identify people, shapes, and objects.

Whether it’s identifying the color of the intruder’s shirt, or figuring out where your pets are hiding, Starlight Vision captures all the details other cameras miss.

Video capture with CapsuleCam v.s. Other Cameras in the same low light environment: 

 

How does it work?

At a 0.01 minimum LUX, Starlight has the highest sensitivity to low light, which means you see sharper, crisper images in color.

With its wide aperture (F1.8), larger size sensor (2.0M pixel image sensor), and 0.01 minimum LUX, CapsuleCam’s Starlight Vision delivers clarity up to 16.4 feet away. Starlight also reduces the camera’s shutter speed to collect enough light for you to see clear human faces in low light.
column3:
>Features You'll Love

With CapsuleCam, you can stream live HD Video and speak using two-way audio communication. With Live View, you can check-in on your home 24/7 so you stay secured anywhere.

No Additional Subscription Fees With Local Storage

With local storage, you can simply store all your recordings/images on a microSD card. You don’t have to worry about monthly Cloud subscriptions fees, information privacy, or data hacks.

column1:
With the widest field of view in the indoor home security camera market, CapsuleCam lets you see more of your home in a single frame with 162° ultra-wide field of view.

Crisp Details With Wide Dynamic Range (WDR)

CapsuleCam is equipped with Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) technology that enables it to capture details clearly in areas with high-contrast lighting. This advanced sensor allows the camera to automatically brighten dark areas and darken light areas for easier detection and recognition.

Motion Detection

Get real-time notifications whenever motion is detected, straight to your smartphone or tablet devices. This helps you stay secured anywhere for better peace of mind.
With an impressive list of features and truly affordable price, we say why NOT?
CapsuleCam connects to your home Wi-Fi network and sends real-time notifications to your smartphone or tablet devices, alerting you whenever motion is detected. Available on iOS and Android.

At Bosma, we’re devoted to building products that create value in people’s lives and help them connect to what matters most. We always strive for excellence in the usability of our products, with intuitive apps, simple installation, and a US-based customer service team that is always there to help. Our team is committed to bringing innovative products to the marketplace and helping define the newly connected world.

We wanted to develop a more advanced, indoor smart home camera that provides clearer images in color—whether captured in low light or in the dark. By adding Starlight Vision to CapsuleCam, people will see additional important details other indoor security cameras just can’t see.
Crowdfunding on Indiegogo is a great way to introduce CapsuleCam to the masses. We also want people to experience an easier, smarter way to keep their families and home safe.
A: The only smart home security camera that captures images in stunning quality, color and clarity, even in the dark.

Other home security cameras do not and cannot capture images clearly under different lighting conditions, especially low-light. CapsuleCam is the only smart home camera with Starlight Vision technology that lets you see color in low-light conditions. By seeing images in full color, you are getting additional important details in identifying people and objects.
Amazon and the Bosma website when it’s launched.
What do we get when we order?
You will get the CapsuleCam, a manual, and one 16GB microSD card to store all your recordings/images.
To introduce the CapsuleCam experience to a larger number of people and offer our early supporters the lowest possible price.

CapsuleCam is equipped with Starlight Vision and Wide Dynamic Range (WDR) technology to help you see clearer, sharper images in color, even in dark, low-light and high-contrast areas. The camera also features a 162° ultra-wide field of view that lets you see more of your home, as well as local storage to help you save images/recordings on a microSD card.

CapsuleCam connects to your home Wi-Fi network and sends real-time notifications to your smartphone or tablet devices, alerting you whenever motion is detected. Using the free Bosma Living App, which is available on iOS and Android, you can stream live HD Video and speak using two-way audio communication. With Live View, you can check-in on your home 24/7.
Not at this time, but an outdoor camera is currently in the works!
CapsuleCam is 2.68 x 2.68 x 3.15 inches, 6.8 x 6.8 x 8.0 cm.
Does CapsuleCam require a power cable to work?
Yes, a power cable is needed and is included.

Other home security cameras do not and cannot capture images clearly under different lighting conditions, especially low-light. CapsuleCam is the only smart home camera with Starlight Vision technology that lets you see color in low-light conditions. By seeing images in full color, you are getting additional important details in identifying people and objects.
How can I get help with setup and installation of my CapsuleCam?
Our support team is available from 10:00 am to 5:00 pm, from Monday to Friday, U.S. holidays excluded. You can reach out to our support
Do I need Wi-Fi connection to setup my CapsuleCam?
CapsuleCam requires a wireless Internet connection for operation. CapsuleCam is compatible with wireless routers running 802.11 B, G or N on 2.4GHz~2.4835GHz.
Where can we download the Bosma Living App?
Download the free Bosma Living App from iTunes App Store or Google Play Store.
What version of iPhone, iPad, or Android will I need?
Apple devices must be iOS 8 or newer. Android devices must be version 4.3 or newer.
Yes, CapsuleCam supports WPA2, WPA and WEP.
Will I be charged now or when my CapsuleCam ships?
You will be charged as soon you place your order.
Will I receive an invoice for my CapsuleCam?
After you place your order, we will send you a purchase confirmation email. You can log into your Bosma Living account to view order history and from there view a printable invoice.
Yes, we offer PayPal as a payment option on the checkout page to purchase Bosma Living Products only.
What are my shipping options? Do you have offer overnight or expedited shipping?

We ship all domestic (within the U.S.) orders at no cost to you via USPS Priority Mail which generally takes 5-7 business days from the time the order is processed. We don’t ship internationally.
For domestic orders (within the U.S.), we offer two options for expedited shipping: FedEx Express Saver 3-day delivery for $20 and FedEx Overnight for $30.

We ship out orders Monday through Friday. All domestic orders placed through bosmaliving.com before 12PM PST, will ship the same day. All orders placed after 12:00PM PST will be shipped the following business day.
Can I add or remove items from an existing order?
We cannot modify an order once it's been placed. We offer a 30-day no questions asked return policy if you’d like to return any unwanted products once they’ve been delivered.

You have 30 days from the date you received your device(s) to request a full refund. You are responsible for covering the cost of return shipping. Once we receive back your product(s), you will be refunded the full amount of the returned devices to the original payment source used.
Do you have to have the app open in order to receive notifications?
As long as you’re not signed out of the app, your smartphone or tablet will receive the notification.
If I am on a smartphone without any Wi-Fi connection, will I still be able to see visitors?

You don't need a Wi-Fi connection as long as you have internet connectivity and your particular carrier doesn't block video streaming (e.g. FaceTime). If your carrier enables video streaming and you have a good 4G connection, you will be see real time HD video from your CAPSULECAM anywhere you have coverage.
How do I set up the camera?
Simply download the Bosma Living App and register your camera, then connect to a Wi-Fi network.
We offer a standard 1-year warranty which we service internally.
Are there additional costs associated with the camera (e.g., cloud storage or live streaming)?

There are no additional costs to view or keep recorded images/videos. CapsuleCam comes with a 16GB micro SD card to help you store all your footage, so you don’t have to worry about monthly subscription fees.
Does CapsuleCam provide a live video feed?
Yes. CapsuleCam allows users to stream live HD video and two-way audio on-demand. With Live View, you can check-in on your property 24/7.

When motion is detected, you will instantly receive a push notification on your smartphone, tablet and PC, letting you know that there’s activity on your property. If you answer the alert, the Bosma Living app will open, and you can access live footage of the activity. All motion-triggered events are automatically recorded in local SD card.
Can CapsuleCam capture clear video footage at night?
Yes, CampsuleCam features an array of Starlight and IR LEDs to illuminate the camera's field of view when a lack of light is detected within the device.

column22: >We know that not everyone needs full performance or functionality of the hi-tech routers available on the market. That is why we developed MOX. Turris MOX is the first modular router you can build according to your expectations. Plus it's powered by the secure self-updating operating system Turris OS.
column33:
>

Module with Marvell Armada 3720 1 GHz dual core CPU, USB 3.0 port, microSD slot and ""PoE ready"" GWAN. This module must be present in any MOX set.
column36:
>

Module with mPCIe slot which allows you to connect for example compatible Wi-Fi card, LTE modem (SIM card slot is on the board) or SSD. You can not combine more than one of this module in your MOX set.
column38:
/>

 

The module includes a four-port switch for a gigabit metallic ethernet with RJ-45 connectors with LEDs. You can not combine more than one of this modules in your MOX set. You can not combine this module with MOX D (SFP).
column39:
/>

 

This module includes a cage for an SFP connector (configured as WAN) and an optical connection for up to 2.5 Gbps. You can not combine more than one of this module in your MOX set. You can not combine this module with MOX C (Ethernet).
column40:
/>

 

The pass-through module includes an eight-port switch for a gigabit metallic ethernet with RJ-45 connectors. This module has double width compared to other modules. You can combine more than one of this module in your MOX set. You can combine this module with all other modules. Note that total number of switches (E and C) can't be bigger than three in total.
column41:
/>

 

The module contains four USB 3.0 ports. You can not combine more than one of this module in your MOX set. You can not combine this module with MOX B (Extension).
column42:
/>

 

The pass-through module with mPCIe slot which allows you to connect for example compatible Wi-Fi card. Also this module allow you to have up to two mPCIe cards in one set (in combination with the MOX B) or to combine it with MOX F (USB) module. You can combine this module with all other modules.

column2: >For more technical information, check Turris MOX modules specification.

column1: With these two upgrades, you can get compatible Wi-Fi cards for your custom made MOX. The same cards are used in MOX: Classic and MOX: Power Wi-Fi sets.
+Wi-Fi Upgrade contains a 2,4/5 GHz 2×2 MIMO switchable dual-band Wi-Fi card (SDIO). This card will be connected directly to the MOX A (Basic) module.
+Wi-Fi mPCIe Upgrade contains a 2,4/5 GHz 3×3 MIMO switchable dual-band Wi-Fi card (mPCIe). This card will be plugged into a mPCIe slot in MOX B (Extension) or MOX G (Super Extension) modules.
These upgrades won’t increase the size of your device.

This upgrade contains an internal dongle connected directly to the special pin on MOX A (Basic) module. PoE dongle won’t increase the size of your device. With PoE you will be able to power supply any MOX set.
The perfect choice for those who never have enough memory. This perk will upgrade your current MOX set to 1 GB of RAM (your MOX A module will have 1 GB instead of 512 MB RAM).
This set is made with MOX A (power supply included, SD card with Turris OS not included). This is a starting point of your custom made router.
Tech specs: Marvell Armada 3720 1 GHz dual core, 512 MB DDR3, GWAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot.

Upgrade possibilities: You can add +Wi-Fi Upgrade, +PoE Upgrade, +RAM Upgrade, MOX B, up to 3 MOX E and either MOX C or MOX D (not both). Note that total number of switches (E and C) can't be bigger than three in total.
This set is made with MOX A and MOX B (power supply and SD card with Turris OS are included). The set has two Wi-Fi cards (one in MOX A and one in MOX B) so you can use both bands simultaneously.
Tech specs: Marvell Armada 3720 1 GHz dual core, 512 MB DDR3, GWAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot,  two dual-band WiFi cards (SDIO and mPCIe) to provide simultaneous dual-band.
Upgrade possibilities: You can add +PoE Upgrade, +RAM Upgrade, up to 3 MOX E and either MOX C or MOX D (not both). Note that total number of switches (E and C) can't be bigger than three in total.

This set is made with MOX A, MOX B and MOX C (power supply and SD card with Turris OS are included). The set has two Wi-Fi cards (one in MOX A and one in MOX B) which allows you to use both bands simultaneously.
Tech specs: Marvell Armada 3720 1 GHz dual core, 512 MB DDR3, GWAN, USB 3.0, microSD slot,  two dual-band WiFi cards (SDIO and mPCIe) to provide simultaneous dual-band, 4× GLAN.
Upgrade possibilities: You can add +PoE Upgrade, +RAM Upgrade, +Ethernet Upgrade and up to 2 MOX E (with +Ethernet Upgrade you can even add MOX D to your Classic set).

This set is made with MOX A, MOX F and +RAM Upgrade (power supply and SD card with Turris OS are included). With multiple USB 3.0 ports you can connect your hard drives (in RAID if you like) and build your private cloud. You will be able to power two modern 2.5“ drives via USB 3.0. Thanks to Nexcloud support you can host your own Nexcloud at home.
Tech specs: Marvell Armada 3720 1 GHz dual core, 1 GB DDR3, GWAN, 5× USB 3.0, microSD slot.

Upgrade possibilities: You can add +PoE Upgrade, +Wi-Fi Upgrade, up to 3 MOX E and either MOX C or MOX D (not both). Note that total number of switches (E and C) can't be bigger than three in total. Also mind that with more extensions, there might not be enough power left to power up harddrives directly from USB and they might need external power source.
Do you want a small home server that can do USB 3.0, has a gigabit connection to your LAN and is well supported in Linux? Buy MOX: Start!

Do you have an Ethernet cable with internet connection and you need just Wi-Fi in your flat? You can start by buying MOX: Start + Wi-Fi Upgrade! Gets the job done and when you need both bands, upgrade it with MOX B + Wi-Fi mPCIe Upgrade. This way, you'll basically end up with the dualband solution we have for discounted price in our perks already - MOX: Power Wi-Fi set.

Is your infrastructure already set up and all you want is extra protection provided by dynamic firewall, automatic updates and Pakon network monitoring? Buy MOX: Start together with either MOX D if you have fiber to your home or MOX C if you have just plain old RJ-45.

Do you want something like Omnia, but you don't need all it's power and have too many devices on the wire? Buy the MOX: Classic and add MOX E and maybe later, when you get more devices, you can add another one.

If you already have Omnia and large place to cover, MOX: Power WiFi is here to help!  You can simply connect and pair it to your Omnia. It will automatically extend your Wi-Fi, getting updates and all the configuration from your Omnia. Totally automatic, disk-less and you would need to manage just your Omnia. Not sure whether you need both bands right now? Start with MOX: Start + Wi-Fi Upgrade and extend it later!

That is the power of modularity! You can buy whatever suits your current needs and extend it later! You can start with small router but extend it up to 24 Ethernet ports (3× MOX E) and two Wi-Fis based on your real needs!

column2: >Do you want to build your own MOX? Try our MOX configurator.

column1: Turris OS is custom-designed open source software based on the OpenWrt project (Linux distribution for routers). The software continuously developed and improved is supplied with an automatic update system. When a security threat is identified the Turris development team creates an update that the router immediately downloads.

There are lot of cool software stuff you can find in Turris OS, for example: Quick and easy OpenVPN server, HaaS (honeypot as a service), PaKon (parental control tool), NetMetr (internet access measuring tool) and others.
The operating system is open source with full documentation available on the project website. And because it is based on OpenWrt, there are hundreds of additional programs that can be installed.

How can I mix and match the modules?
You must have MOX A (Basic) module in any set. You can have only one module of each kind in the set, with exception of MOX E (Super Extension) module. Most of the modules terminate some bus which is the limitation. MOX C (Ethernet) and MOX D (SFP) terminate SGMII interface, so it means you cannot have MOX C and MOX D together. Similarly MOX B (Extension) and MOX F (USB) terminate PCIe so those can't be together either. Exception is MOX E which it is able to pass-through SGMII signal - that means you can use it with MOX D module, MOX C module or even with another MOX E module. But there is also a limit - you can't have more than three switches in total so either 2 x E + 1 x C (20 Ethernet ports) or 3 x E (24 Ethernet ports) is a maximum. The last exception is newest MOX G (Super Extension) module which it is able to pass-through PCIe signal - that means you can use it either with MOX B (Extension) module or with MOX F (USB). To validate a particular set considered, try our MOX configurator.

What OS will be Turris MOX running?
Turris MOX will run Turris OS 4.0 based on OpenWRT 18.06. Right now only supported system is Turris OS, which is our fork from OpenWrt, but we also intend to support popular Linux distributions in the future.

Which CPU has MOX A (Basic Module)?
Currently planned CPU is Marvell Armada 3720 (ARMv8), which is 1 GHz dual-core processor.

What about kernel?
Kernel version will initially be 4.14 LTS, which is same as for OpenWRT 18.06.

What about mainline support for kernel and U-Boot?
We are working hard to make sure that MOX will be supported in mainline kernel and U-Boot. So far we are very optimistic and we have high hopes that eventually everything will get through.

What is the speed between MOX C (Ethernet Module) and MOX A (Basic Module)?
Marvell Topaz that is powering the Ethernet Module is connected to CPU via 2.5GbE lane same as SFP Module.

Does Basic Module have GPIO?
Yes, it has 34 pin GPIO connector (here is a pinout).

What standards do the Wi-Fi cards support?
Each Wi-Fi card is dual-band (not simultaneous) and it has support for 802.11a/b/g/n/ac.

Will it be possible to power MOX via POE(+)?
Yes, each MOX A (Basic Module) and any set can be upgraded by +PoE Upgrade perk to support this functionality.

Is the interconnect just a standard PCIe? If so, it wouldn't be hard to make accessories.
It includes PCIe, but with our pinout, which also includes SGMII (ethernet), i2c, SPI, power. We call it Moxtet. It will be possible to make your own accessories and details about it you can find in our documentation.

What's the power consumption?
The MOX A (Basic Module) itself consumes around 2-3 W. The power consumption of individual assemblies varies depending on the number of connected devices.

What's the virtualization technology used in MOX?
LXC containers.

What kind of license do you use with the open hardware?
CERN OHL.

Why is the shipping so expensive?
For EU recipients, shipping prices cover also VAT related to the product.

What is the warranty period?
We provide standard European warranty for consumers: 2 years.

What is the SIM slot for? Does MOX have an LTE modem included?
No, there is no LTE modem included in MOX. The SIM slot is connected to dedicated pins in the miniPCIe slot above it. So if you will buy your own LTE miniPCIe modem without its own SIM slot it will work with the SIM slot on board.

column2: >Feel free to visit our discussion forum for more info.

column1: It all started as a research project. The main reason why we decided to develop our own hardware for the first generation Turris router, was to make sure that it is powerful enough to be able to analyze network traffic at current and future home user network speeds. The project ran between the years 2013 and 2015. We decided to utilize our new hardware experience and in 2015 we managed to raise $1.2 M through IGG and deliver the powerful, secure and open source router Turris Omnia.

The primary goal of CZ.NIC is maintaining the CZ domain and programming open source software. We are not able to compete with big HW brands and that's why we are asking for your participation. Together we can manufacture an outstanding product.

","Turris MOX: Modularity      Stay in touch with us:mox.turris.cz@turris_czforum.turris.czFollow all the Updates and Comments here on Indiegogo. Shipping    We know that not everyone needs full performance or functionality of the hi-tech routers available on the market. That is why we developed MOX. Turris MOX is the first modular router you can build according to your expectations. Plus it's powered by the secure self-updating operating system Turris OS.      Modules  Module with Marvell Armada 3720 1 GHz dual core CPU, USB 3.0 port, microSD slot and ""PoE ready"" GWAN. This module must be present in any MOX set.  Module with mPCIe slot which allows you to connect for example compatible Wi-Fi card, LTE modem (SIM card slot is on the board) or SSD. You can not combine more than one of this module in your MOX set.  The module includes a four-port switch for a gigabit metallic ethernet with RJ-45 connectors with LEDs. You can not combine more than one of this modules in your MOX set. You can not combine this module with MOX D (SFP).  This module includes a cage for an SFP connector (configured as WAN) and an optical connection for up to 2.5 Gbps. You can not combine more than one of this module in your MOX set. You can not combine this module with MOX C (Ethernet).  The pass-through module includes an eight-port switch for a gigabit metallic ethernet with RJ-45 connectors. This module has double width compared to other modules. You can combine more than one of this module in your MOX set. You can combine this module with all other modules. Note that total number of switches (E and C) can't be bigger than three in total.  The module contains four USB 3.0 ports. You can not combine more than one of this module in your MOX set. You can not combine this module with MOX B (Extension).  The pass-through module with mPCIe slot which allows you to connect for example compatible Wi-Fi card. Also this module allow you to have up to two mPCIe cards in one set (in combination with the MOX B) or to combine it with MOX F (USB) module. You can combine this module with all other modules.
For more technical information, check Turris MOX modules specification.

column9:
> 

BenchSentry is the best way to secure your packages and home deliveries. No more porch pirates or damage from weather. You now have your own personal guardian for the valuables landing on your porch.
column10:
>

Designed with both homeowners and delivery drivers in mind, BenchSentry is fast and simple to access while providing active security and monitoring. BenchSentry access is universal so anyone can use it to make deliveries or pickups, but only the people you choose. The modern bench design keeps your porch classy and gives you extra seating for those warm nights with a cold beverage and good company.
column19:
> 

The speed, accessibility, and convenience of buying items online is now a standard option to have the items we want or need delivered right to our doorstep. Unfortunately, package thieves (aka: porch pirates) are enjoying too. Not only is a package on your front porch a signal that you’re not home, it can be an invitation for pirates to help themselves to your packages before you’ve even had a chance to open them. Eliminate the temptation of unsecured items, eliminate theft.
column45:
> 

BenchSentry's integrated HD camera documents all bench activity. If an unauthorized person tries to access your BenchSentry, it takes a picture and sends you a notification via the BenchSentry Mobile App.  

The BenchSentry design also includes pre-drilled holes in the bottom and back panels so you can mount it to the ground, a wall, or run a security cable through it for added security.
column53:
> 

With just a few simple assembly steps, BenchSentry is ready to connect to your home's WiFi network. Once connected, you'll pair your BenchSentry with the BenchSentry Mobile app and YOU'RE DONE!
column69:
> 

Out in the elements, batteries die quickly. BenchSentry includes a power supply cable to access the nearest 110v outlet.  Loss of power doesn't mean loss of security.

If your BenchSentry is unplugged or loses power, it will Immediately send you a notification and begin a secure shutdown so any delivered items remain locked inside until power is restored and you reset it with your owner code.
column103:
> 

With all of our experience, the manufacturers we've selected to make BenchSentry are among the best we've ever had the pleasure of working with (and that says a lot). They are family-owned and operated with state-of-the-art facilities that satisfy our high standards for ensuring each unit will be the very best BenchSentry ever made. 

After successful funding of our Indiegogo campaign, BenchSentry has placed the order for our first units and is now in full production.
column119:
> 

With over 20 years of experience in overseas manufacturing and consumer products, we have trusted relationships with our manufacturing and supply partners. We are confident with our production process and schedule for BenchSentry. However, we are humble and acknowledge that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve established detailed contingency plans to account for such events. If anything happens that would impact our schedule, we promise to keep our backers informed along with our plans to resolve the issues.

bench sentry century sentery ben trending

On Thursday 2/26/2015 Shawn Schooler jumped from his 3rd story apartment building to save his life. In doing so Shawn cut his arm injuring one of his main arteries and breaking his wrist. If that wasn't enough, Shawn also lost everything in this fire, The money used will go towards helping Shawn purchase new items such as clothing and furniture. All of this is being done to help Shawn get back on his feet. Shawn is a hard worker and a father, and I feel that this should not go unrecognized. Shawn is currently in the hospital and I think that if we meet this goal it will come as a great surprise to him when he makes his recovery.

column1: We are a company  of developers and designers specialised to develop and produce outstanding products made from Titanium. We do work mostly only with this material, so we have achieved major innovations over the past 15 years.

The 'Nature Series' cookware is the result of ten years of research and is made of microcrystalline titanium. This kind of nontoxic metallic material is used by the developers as it promises more health and safety. The kitchen tools are easy to clean thanks to the specific characteristics of their surface. Furthermore, adhesion of food molecules is effectively and sustainably reduced because of the anti-adhesive qualities of the titanium.

Risks and challenges

Our biggest risk is the unsuccessful completion of this indiegogo campaign. All we need now is the crowd to launch Boyou Titanium Pots. Pilot production round We designed the Boyou Titanium Pots with an experience and research of more than ten years. A pilot production round was part of our design process, which lasted more than a year without any problems. We will ship Boyou Titanium Pots directly from the factory to your home. We will keep you posted Is there nothing that can go wrong? Of course there is: setbacks, such as delays in our production process or with our carrier, can always occur. However, our motto is: 'for every problem there is a solution'.

Meet Firewalla

As of March 16, 2018, Firewalla officially ended the crowdfunding stage and you can purchase it at Indiegogo Market Place,  With Guaranteed Shipping!   Firewalla is now protecting families from 35 countries, come and support us to defend the cyber space.  If you are a existing customer, please visit our forums https://help.firewalla.com or send us email help@firewalla.com for support.

 

====

Firewalla is an all-in-one simple, affordable, intelligent shield that secures all of your digital things. It can protect your family from cyber threats, control kids' internet usage, and even protects you when you are out using public Wifi.  No monthly fee and the product is shipping now! 

You won't find pretty lights on our box
column2:
instead, you will have an open, robust and expandable tool at the fingertips that give you visibility and control to your network and cybersecurity.

 

A Complete Cyber Security Solution

You need just one Firewalla to protect every single connected device at home. This tiny box contains the same cybersecurity technologies used by many large enterprises. It will provide one-for-all continuous protection from crippling cyber attacks even as new threats evolve.

 

 

Easy To Install

Up-and-running, as easy as 1-2-3! Zero frustration

column1: • Connect your Firewalla to a power source and your main router.
• Launch the app on your mobile device and scan the barcode.
• Monitor and Manage your device from anywhere in the world with military strength encryption.

What our customers are saying:

 

Easy To Use

Cybersecurity shouldn’t be complex and intimidating. We believe with the right software, cybersecurity can be made as simple as tapping on a few buttons. 

Introducing the Firewalla App, available on iOS and Android devices
column2: >One Tap, Turn it On

column1: • Access your Firewalla device around the world with strong encryption.
• Get notified on security and behavioral alerts.
• Many of the important functions can be activated with just one tap!

Firewalla will continuously scan your home for security vulnerabilities and warn you of any potential risk.  It will alert you of active cyber attacks and block them if needed.  Never be scared of that digital thing being hacked again, we got your back!
Firewalla can automatically block malicious and adult content, easily block internet on any device.  No more pulling power cord off that dusty router, and manage your kids with ease.
Protect your privacy on the road, coffee shops, and any public Wifi with our built-in VPN server!  Annoyed with ads?  Enjoy an ad-free environment on every single device at home.
Firewalla provides full visibility to your devices and networks.   It can detect and present activities such as video, gaming, and the ability to 'zoom' all the way to IP addresses.

Active Protect

Utilizing deep insight, Firewalla will use cloud-based behavior analytics engines to actively detect problems and automatically block them if needed.  Use our built-in VPN server to atomically protect your privacy, on the road and at coffee shops. 

 

 

Always In Control

No longer you will need to pull the power cord from the router, Firewalla gives you full control of your network
column2:
from blocking web pages to cutting off access to devices and even blocking ads.  You will always be in control.

 

 

Firewalla is shipping and deployed across 32+ countries

 

Who is Firewalla For?

Want to know what your connected smart devices are doing? Need something to protect your network? Want to know what your kids are doing? Traveling and not trusting the public Wifi?  

Hear what our early adopters have to say:
column6:
showinfo=0"">
 

 

The Technologies Behind Firewalla

Advantages of Open Source and Open Hardware

column1: • Give our supporters and customers full visibility of our daily work.
• Customers can directly submit issues to our engineering team.
• If you are a developer, we welcome you to help out!

Unlimited possibility with new functions

The Firewalla platform is engineered to be highly extendable. The flexibility we put into our designs allows us to deliver future features ten times faster than our competitors. Since our device code is open source, anyone can build features alongside us!  

Some of the features we are thinking about in the near future (with no additional cost)
• Shadow Socks, a great VPN solution for certain part of the world

Leverage the power of cloud technology

The cloud constantly learns from all the connected devices and actively uses this knowledge to automatically mitigate attacks by sending updates to all connected homes through encrypted channels.

We value your privacy

We believe in data encryption and you have the key! All data stored and in transit is encrypted with keys stored on your device and phone.

Our servers will work only with hashed data like this:

Want to know our progress? 

The Firewalla device software is open source, and you are welcome to follow us on Github, check out the blueprint of the Firewalla device, and see our progress.
column3:
showinfo=0"">

 

An Affordable Solution for Everyone!

As a reward to our early adopters, we will offer a Firewalla VIP package with a lifetime membership for a super-low one-time price! This is exclusive to Indiegogo, limited in quantity, not available in retail.

column1: • VIP License limited to early supporters because you believe in us!
• VIP License is transferable to your own or our future devices.  Upgrades will be HW cost only.
• VIP License guarantees all Firewalla box features be free forever.

International Shipping:  (Outside USA/Canada)

A bit of warning, since Firewalla cloud servers are located in California, if you use the box outside of USA/Canada,  there may be longer delay when you are using Firewalla mobile app outside of your WIFI coverage.   We have tested Firewalla in China / Hongkong / Singapore / Switzerland / Netherland, the delay according to testers is tolerable.
• The USB power plugs will be the two prong USA style plug.
• In case there is any import Tax, you will be responsible.

If your country is not on the list, please message us, we may be able to ship you one using our 'secret perk'

Functions at a Glance

Tech Specs

Lightpack 2 is a lighting set that brings you a whole new experience while watching movies by lightening the background of your TV and room.

Lightpack 2 has 4 HDMI inputs to connect all of your media devices to your TV. Lightpack controls a LED strip that contours to the back of your TV and can include what we call Pixels: wireless LED-based lighting modules placed on the wall around the main screen. Lightpack uses complex, patented algorithms to process the input video signal and conduct this ambient backlight orchestra. The result is a huge improvement in your overall viewing and gaming experience.
column5:
s=253f026298196bb3b183fd03d9183e0f"" src="""" style=""""/>

The Lightpack 2 now works with any TV screen and only requires just a power source and an HDMI connection. Lightpack 2 also can be used as an intelligent lighting system, even when your TV is off. You can set up the mood light with Lightpack App.
column10:
s=393fff38ecb2ce96c29d1138f3ee1313"" src="""" style=""""/>

Pixels are extending your screen to the entire room, so you are in the very center of your media entertainment. You can control Pixels with the same Lightpack App: set up different modes, timer and other functions.
column14:
s=3c4e04ee19a5a252c60aba80f8be7afe"" src="""" style=""""/>

Each Pixel has a 3 Ah battery and lasts weeks on just a single charge.
column18:
s=477b2fae5137b7b6e1b898568cfd88a1"" src="""" style=""""/>

We all don't like cables and we succeeded to make Pixels working without a single one! Yes, you can place it wherever you want at the wall or other place. Pixels connect to Lightpack 2 via BLE and work separately or together with Lightpack 2’s own LEDs. And only when the battery is off you'll need to put Pixels to the charging station.
column20:
showinfo=0"">

Lightpack 2 analyzes the input video that feeds to your TV - whether it’s a movie or the game - and lights up the entire room with corresponding colors.
column24:
s=1446dbedbf1f1d1bad4f391450fb5343"" src="""" style=""""/>

The signal is captured and processed by Lightpack 2 in real time, then fed to the TV in its original form. Our unique processing algorithms capture pixel areas along the image border to determine the median color of each of these areas. These colors are then transmitted to the respective LED modules on the back of the TV screen. The LED strips illuminate the wall behind the TV, making the colors pop out beyond the border of the screen and smoothing out the gradient between the luminance of the image and darkness of the room. This gradient makes the overall experience easier on the eyes while giving the illusion of a larger picture.

Frequently Asked Questions

 

It takes 10 minutes or so to set up everything and connect your HDMI devices (HD-player, XBox, PlayStation, Nintendo WiiU, Roku, Chromecast, Apple TV, PC, Mac, etc.) to Lightpack.
column26:
showinfo=0"">

We want you to get the most from your screen, whatever one you have, yet we don’t want you to struggle with complicated settings and stuff.

So we made SmartCorners. these little thingies is what helps Lightpack 2 to know what size is your screen is.

Take the LED ribbon which comes with Lightpack 2, cut and stick it on each side of your TV from the back, mount the SmartCorners and you are all set.

To allow you to manage your environment and control the inputs, we’ve developed a mobile app. It’s available for iOS and Android, and with it you can switch HDMI inputs, select a dream for the Moodlight mode, and more.

Remember how as kids, we were told not to sit up close to the TV at night because watching it in the darkness was harmful for the eyes? It was such a great way to completely immerse in what was going on on the screen!

When the screen is the only source of light in a dark room, rapidly changing between dimly and brightly lit scenes makes your pupils constantly change size, ranging between often between 1 and 8 mm. It takes them about 5 seconds to contract, and up to 5 minutes to expand once it gets darker. That makes your extraocular muscles work extra hard, possibly leading to vision problems.

Ambient backlight levels out the intensity of light in your room by reducing or completely eliminating the difference in overall brightness of the environment between dark and bright scenes - as shown by Dr. S.H.A. Begemann of the Technical University of Eindhoven.

Lightpack 2 takes advantage of another feature of human vision: only a very small part of the retina (which is called the macula” can actually distinguish all the smallest details of a picture, with the rest of the picture being fuzzy for the rest of the retina).

In fact, the very smallest part of the macula (called the fovea) and the farthest part of it from the pupil can recognize the depth of field of a picture. This means that while watching TV you can only see in focus a very small part of the picture on the screen (its size depends on the distance between your eye and the screen).

Your brain then works efficiently to combine this small, focused part and the rest of the scene into a coherent picture. Using the soft illumination of Lightpack II, which extends the actual picture on the screen, you see your 40-inch TV as if it were a 50-inch home theater.

 

Lightpack 2 uses an FPGA controlled by a generic microcontroller. Our technology breaks down image resolutions from 320x240 to 4K into a number of smaller areas, then calculates the median color values for all of them. 

The resolution of a given picture is detected the moment it’s changed by the HDMI source, and all the captured areas are scaled to fit the new resolution. The area width equals the picture width divided by the horizontal module number – while the height equals picture height divided by the vertical module number). All together we've requested for a 3 patents for this project.

For all the hackers and tinkerers out there we will be open an API that will enable access to the full scope of Lightpack 2 functionality. Using the Lightbridge box, you’ll be able to take further control over various BLE devices and sensors. We look forward to see all the great, weird and unpredictable hacks from you!

Our API will be constantly growing and improving, so be sure to check back for updates. We can't wait to see what awesome hacks you come up with.

Lightbridge is WiFi-Bluetooth Smart router, which connects the Pixels with your home router via WiFi. Lightbridge is a part of Lightpack 2 which connects Lightpack 2 to your home network and Internet. With Lightbridge, you can control the entire lighting system remotely, connect it to external services like IFTTT, and extend its functionality with third party software.

We are a team of people who believe in what we do. In order to carry out our project and deliver one of the best devices meant to boost experiences, we need our support from people like you.

Lately, accountability and transparency have become the central problems of crowdfunding platforms. Nothing keeps project backers up at night quite like the idea of founders taking their perks dollars to Italian car manufacturers instead of Chinese factories and Belorussian programmers. But what if the information from the bank account in question was open for third party scrutiny to any backer, 24/7? Exactly that thinking led us to cooperating with Frank, a public-facing open ledger available now to any crowdfunding project. We have a dedicated project bank account which is linked to Frank, and now we’re completely open with our backers. Let our data speak for us!

And here's the link where you can follow our Frank data:


When we made and delivered the first Lightpack, we got tons of experience points and leveled up. We put a few points to ""FPGA Programming"" and ""HDMI Engineering"" and then picked the ""Out-Of-The-Box"" perk.

We immediately started developing of a new device that wouldn’t need a permanent connection to a PC to function.

All in all, the development process went pretty well, but there were some challenges to overcome. First, we had to develop a completely new hardware to run all the image processing on - the first Lightpack used a PC for that, and while the basic concept was a pass-through device between a signal source and a display screen, we needed all the magic to be made on the device side.

Since standard MCUs were not fast and reliable enough to process 1080p@60 fps video, we had to choose an FPGA and discover for ourselves the very new sphere of the FPGA programming. Then, after the first prototype was built and tested, we had to make it work with an addressable LED ribbon. Remember that the first Lightpack used to have 10 LED modules which were directly plugged in, and that was not exactly the perfect decision for users with big TV screens. So we decided to let the user to choose how many LEDs he wants and made our new module extendable - you just cut the provided LED strip to the desired length.

Then came an idea to make all of the room environment interactive and light it up synchronously with the picture on your screen - that’s how the Pixels were born.

These little glowing boxes are made autonomous and controllable over Bluetooth Low Energy - so you can place them anywhere in your room and they will turn it to an interactive light environment.

So after we had a few prototypes of Pixels working and shining (it was quite a challenge making it glow with a flat smooth light with no shadows on the edges, like a screen pixels will do), we all agreed that the light was awesome, so we made Pixels the part of Lightpack 2 set.
column28:
showinfo=0"">

We found that accelerometer-enabled Pixels are very fun to play with and could be connected to many stuff we had at hand like radio-controlled robot platforms. Then someone said: ""Hey, let's connect it to a PC and use it as a game controller!"" So we made a 15-minute game prototype in GameMaker Studio and used Pixel to control the in-game car. Because why the hell not?
column30:
showinfo=0"">

So now we have working prototypes of the central device and Pixels, the FPGA firmware to process the image and MCU firmware for high-level control of the whole set, it’s time to raise money for making the first batch of Lightpack 2 and provide this awesome experience in your living room!

Woodenshark is a small team of experienced hardware and software engineers, working on designing consumer electronics from 6 different locations around the world.

We believe that distance is not an obstacle for team work. Instant messaging and various Internet-based tools help us stay in touch and keep our product developing processes going.

In today's world approved and certified components and materials are key to success

 

We are very thankful for your interest and support! Backing our IndieGoGo campaign will not only be appreciated and rewarded: you will be a part of something really big. We’re sure that Lightpack 2 will deliver out-of-the-box enjoyable experience to our — and your — everyday life.

Help us spread the word about Lightpack 2! You can help us out by sharing this page with friends, joining us on Facebook or Twitter.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Risks and challenges

 

Hardware related risks

Lightpack 2, like any other hardware project, has mechanical, electrical, software and firmware challenges. As mentioned earlier, the batch-production optimized version of the device, as well as the self-assembled devices, have been successfully tested by us. We don't expect any critical issues related to electronics. However, we will still test the pre-mass production sample device, which will be almost the same as the pilot batch device. 
If there are any mechanical issues (we've put a lot of work and testing into this, so we don't expect any), we will still have a chance to detect and fix those.

 

Software related risks

As for software and firmware issues, if any, they will be covered &
column31:
fixed in new releases of software\firmware. We will maintain a bug-tracker open for our users where they will be able to submit any issues. These issues will be treated with the highest priority.

 

Production and Shipping risks

Production and shipping in time is another challenge. We are collaborating with an reputable company located in China, which takes care of the production plan and building the whole supply chain. We also design Lightpack 2 hardware and build BOM (bill of materials) according to the capabilities of well-known suppliers.

Nevertheless, if we are going out of date we will let you know with project updates containing all issues, their reasons, and how we will fight them. Once the production is over, we will send the devices by batch to the warehouses in the US and Europe for further delivery to our customers. The rest of the batch will be stored in our international warehouse in China for shipments to our non-US/EU customers.

 

International shipping, custom duties and taxes

We're are shipping Lightpack worldwide. Custom Duties and Taxes You may be charged for fees and taxes applicable to your region as your order passes through customs. Any charges on a parcel must be paid by the person receiving the parcel. These charges are beyond our control or prediction and you will be responsible for paying them.

Please also note that it may also affect delivery time estimations and cause unexpected delays. In addition, there are instances where customs may refuse to process orders, impose unanticipated customs or duties on International shipments at their discretion, or even in rare cases, lose product. 
In any case we’ll be happy to help you, please contact us

http://lightpack.tv/contact.php

 

Estimated Delivery

All rewards should be delivered in April 2017. While we do not expect delays, it is possible that the estimated shipment month may shift. We will provide updates ASAP when/if the estimated shipment date changes. At anytime up until your Lightpack 2 has shipped, you may request a full refund here us http://lightpack.tv/contact.php.

 

Warranty

Lightpack has 30 days Return Policy (after you receive it) money back guarantee and minimum 1 year limited warranty. For more information, please see http://lightpack.tv/return.php. Need help?

If you have questions you can always reach us us http://lightpack.tv/contact.php

 

Press

For all media inquiries, please contact Anton anton@woodenshark.com

Our media kit is available at http://lightpack.tv/press.php.
