Introducing BriteSweep. The Brighter way to clean. 

BriteSweep is a line of illuminated cleaning tools. Attached LED lighting allows users to see in poorly lit spaces so cleaning is more thorough, effective and efficient.

Dirt, dust and debris can hide in plain sight
column2:
polluting our homes, encouraging growth of mold and irritating allergens. BriteSweep is here to shine some light and provide a smarter, brighter clean to help you live a brighter life.  

 

 

 

Too often we sweep or clean an area just to come back to missed spots. Typically the lighting in our homes is designed to light the room or create ambiance but not to brighten the floors or surfaces we are trying to clean. We are literally shooting in the dark trying to get the areas clean and you would be amazed at just how much dirt and debris is left behind.

This has been plaguing the cleaning industry for far too long. Quite often, cleaners work hard in poorly lit environments just to have the sun rise and reveal all the areas that were missed. Going back to retrace steps creates double work costing businesses time, energy and money.

column1:
Illuminated cleaning tools bring light directly to surface areas you are cleaning.  Our first product is the BriteSweep broom. The broom has built-in LED lighting that provides sight in those dark or poorly lit areas that we didn’t have before. It is complete with two power buttons for ease of use. It has a detachable base for cleaning small messes and a blade set between the bristles to make cleaning wet debris much easier.

The BriteSweep broom has a sleek low profile design, helping it to maneuver in tight spaces, and it looks good while you are using it
column2:

Features:

LED lighting and a sleek, modern, low-profile design:

 

Features: 

 

Powered by only 2 AA Batteries:

 

Detachable base for hand held use when cleaning small messes:

 

Detach Action:

 

“Precision Blade” for effortless cleaning, especially when cleaning wet debris:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The idea was born when Owner/CEO Mike Jackson was cleaning for one of many clients.  It was a restaurant with dim lighting.  Struggling to see in corners and under booths, frustration inspired him to create a better lighting situation.  Mike attached a flashlight to his broom and lights to his dustpan to help “shine some light” on the situation so he could see what he was cleaning.  

His employees, company and friends loved the idea and immediately thought of the many ways a tool like this could make cleaning at home and in offices more effective. This initial idea was nice but didn’t directly get the light to the source without having to maneuver the light with one hand while trying to sweep with the other.  After some thought and consideration a design was created to make this job easier.

OG prototype used by CEO to help clean that night :)

 

Initial concept:

Goal was to condense the lighting into the broom and turn it into a more powerful precision cleaning tool.

Initial Concept Drawing:

 

Redesign:

Sleeker modern design that gives more clearance when sweeping under chairs, tables, corners, under cabinets, etc.

BriteSweep is a branch of Mike Jackson LLC. 

Mike Jackson is the CEO of a large commercial cleaning business.  He started with virtually nothing and has worked diligently, sacrificing tremendously to help his business grow.

 

Mike Jackson is a Retired Navy Senior Chief with 22 years of military service.
He has diverse history that prepared him to be a business owner/innovator.

column1: • Navy Inspector, Trainer, Program Coordinator, Project Manager and Logistics Specialist
• Managed/Led over 300 staff members and volunteers as the former Operations Director of a mega church in Norfolk, VA
• Former Vice President of Regent University’s SIFE (Students In Free Enterprise) Team, known for finding innovative ways to address difficult challenges in communities around the world
• Managed over 60 small to large accounts and over 100 employees as the Former Operations Manager for a large cleaning company in Virginia Beach

We are proud to mention that we have been working with some amazing local talent to get things off the ground. Our local partners include:

 

VersAbility (Assembly and Production Assistance):

 

Through employment and other programs, VersAbility Resources provides ongoing support for people with disabilities, helping them to lead productive and fulfilling lives with purpose and meaning.

Collaborating with this group is special to Mike Jackson because his sister was born with disabilities and works for a similar organization in her home town.  BriteSweep’s success will lend great contribution to this company and its ability to continue to change lives.

 

3DXtremes (Prototyping and Manufacturing Assistance)

Mission

Our mission at 3DXtremes is to provide powerful and streamlined prototyping and manufacturing services to inventors and organizations. We want inventors to do what they do best, rather than simply worry about the price or process.

 

Manufacturing Risks and Challenges:

• Working with a local manufacturer and assembly team is helpful, but supply chain may impact delivery time.

• The LED housing is waterproof and capable of cleaning wet messes but the product is not intended to be dipped or submerged in water.

• Shipping problems do occur due to shortages, weather issues or backlog.  Should any problem occur you will be notified of the delay.

• The design may be optimized to help meet manufacturing and assembly needs.

","Introducing BriteSweep. The Brighter way to clean. BriteSweep is a line of illuminated cleaning tools. Attached LED lighting allows users to see in poorly lit spaces so cleaning is more thorough, effective and efficient.Dirt, dust and debris can hide in plain sight
column2: polluting our homes, encouraging growth of mold and irritating allergens. BriteSweep is here to shine some light and provide a smarter, brighter clean to help you live a brighter life.     Too often we sweep or clean an area just to come back to missed spots. Typically the lighting in our homes is designed to light the room or create ambiance but not to brighten the floors or surfaces we are trying to clean. We are literally shooting in the dark trying to get the areas clean and you would be amazed at just how much dirt and debris is left behind.This has been plaguing the cleaning industry for far too long. Quite often, cleaners work hard in poorly lit environments just to have the sun rise and reveal all the areas that were missed. Going back to retrace steps creates double work costing businesses time, energy and money.

column1: Illuminated cleaning tools bring light directly to surface areas you are cleaning.  Our first product is the BriteSweep broom. The broom has built-in LED lighting that provides sight in those dark or poorly lit areas that we didn’t have before. It is complete with two power buttons for ease of use. It has a detachable base for cleaning small messes and a blade set between the bristles to make cleaning wet debris much easier.The BriteSweep broom has a sleek low profile design, helping it to maneuver in tight spaces, and it looks good while you are using it
column2: ) Features:LED lighting and a sleek, modern, low-profile design: Features:  Powered by only 2 AA Batteries: Detachable base for hand held use when cleaning small messes: Detach Action: “Precision Blade” for effortless cleaning, especially when cleaning wet debris:       The idea was born when Owner/CEO Mike Jackson was cleaning for one of many clients.  It was a restaurant with dim lighting.  Struggling to see in corners and under booths, frustration inspired him to create a better lighting situation.  Mike attached a flashlight to his broom and lights to his dustpan to help “shine some light” on the situation so he could see what he was cleaning.  His employees, company and friends loved the idea and immediately thought of the many ways a tool like this could make cleaning at home and in offices more effective. This initial idea was nice but didn’t directly get the light to the source without having to maneuver the light with one hand while trying to sweep with the other.  After some thought and consideration a design was created to make this job easier.OG prototype used by CEO to help clean that night :) Initial concept:Goal was to condense the lighting into the broom and turn it into a more powerful precision cleaning tool.Initial Concept Drawing: Redesign:Sleeker modern design that gives more clearance when sweeping under chairs, tables, corners, under cabinets, etc.Prototyping Process:We’re determined to provide quality products and went through rounds of design revisions to provide the best solution possible:Initial LED Tests:  Handmade prototype for testing: Handmade prototype: Exploring lighter, sleeker, more compact base designs: Test 3D prints and parts: 3D printed redesigned prototype 1.0:   BriteSweep is a branch of Mike Jackson LLC. Mike Jackson is the CEO of a large commercial cleaning business.  He started with virtually nothing and has worked diligently, sacrificing tremendously to help his business grow. Mike Jackson is a Retired Navy Senior Chief with 22 years of military service.He has diverse history that prepared him to be a business owner/innovator.

column1: Navy Inspector, Trainer, Program Coordinator, Project Manager and Logistics Specialist
Managed/Led over 300 staff members and volunteers as the former Operations Director of a mega church in Norfolk, VA
Former Vice President of Regent University’s SIFE (Students In Free Enterprise) Team, known for finding innovative ways to address difficult challenges in communities around the world
Managed over 60 small to large accounts and over 100 employees as the Former Operations Manager for a large cleaning company in Virginia Beach

https://pilotonline.com/inside-business/navy-ve...  Every surface in your home could use a brighter clean. We are determined to provide multiple products to help you clean brighter and live brighter. Below are just a few product ideas in the works: Lower Cost Economy Versions: Duster: Original Duster Design: Other Products Coming Soon!Dustpan Drawing:   Dustpan Drawing:   Push Broom:   Scraper:  Original Complete Package Set Concept:   We are proud to mention that we have been working with some amazing local talent to get things off the ground. Our local partners include: VersAbility (Assembly and Production Assistance): Through employment and other programs, VersAbility Resources provides ongoing support for people with disabilities, helping them to lead productive and fulfilling lives with purpose and meaning.Collaborating with this group is special to Mike Jackson because his sister was born with disabilities and works for a similar organization in her home town.  BriteSweep’s success will lend great contribution to this company and its ability to continue to change lives. 3DXtremes (Prototyping and Manufacturing Assistance)MissionOur mission at 3DXtremes is to provide powerful and streamlined prototyping and manufacturing services to inventors and organizations. We want inventors to do what they do best, rather than simply worry about the price or process. Manufacturing Risks and Challenges:• Working with a local manufacturer and assembly team is helpful, but supply chain may impact delivery time.• The LED housing is waterproof and capable of cleaning wet messes but the product is not intended to be dipped or submerged in water.• Shipping problems do occur due to shortages, weather issues or backlog.  Should any problem occur you will be notified of the delay.• The design may be optimized to help meet manufacturing and assembly needs.",44.0,1,"1 Campaign

Breeze is the world's first Hair &
column2:
Hand dryer 2-in-1 for your bathroom. The ionic dryer gives your hair incredible shine, and when docked, it's the most effective way to dry your hands.

 

Our designers have thought of every detail, from touch-free sensors to activate it without touching it (hello convenience), to integrated USB ports to charge your electric toothbrush &
column4:
/>  

Did you know that a hand towel is a breeding ground for all kinds of yucky stuff? Ditch the towel and dry your hands with Breeze for clean hands that are well, truly clean.
column5:
>


 

Breeze is is the most sanitary and environmentally friendly way to dry your hands. The built-in infrared sensor activates a constant stream of hot air when you place your hands underneath, making sure no dirty wet fingers ever touch it to turn it on. It's family-friendly, so even the kids can use it.

 

 

The extremely powerful but quiet motor produces an instant blast of hot air, drying your hands with incredible speed. Because the motor also powers the ionic hair dryer when you take it out, the hand dryer is also negative ion enabled, a unique benefit of having one motor that powers both.

 

 

Using paper towels every time you visit the bathroom ensures you'll have restock on new paper towels whenever you go to the supermarket. There's a smarter way to go about your business and that's Breeze. Using Breeze will reduce the number of towels your family goes through, which is better for the planet and your wallet.
column6:
>

 

 

You'd almost forget that Breeze isn't just an awesome hand dryer, but it's also a salon-worthy ionic hairdryer for the entire family. Enriched with negative ions, Breeze has settings for every hair type. From hot and powerful to ambient and gentle for the kids, the whole family will look their best every morning.  


When used as a dryer, you can choose from six settings to give you perfectly shiny hair, just the way you like it. And comes with all the accessories you can expect from a salon-worthy product.

Breeze is an ionic hair dryer, blasting more than a million negative ions into the air (and your hair) when you use it. Sounds fancy, but what exactly does it do? Negative ions help water evaporate faster, so you can use a lower heat, which is much better for your hair. Breeze leaves your hair looking shiny and healthy, and above all, dry in no time!

Breeze incorporated six different fan settings to accommodate different types of hair. No matter your hair texture, Breeze will do the job.
column8:
>

 

Negative ions aren't just great for your hair, it actually cleans up the air in your bathroom too. It's no surprise that most hospitals have negative-ion air purifiers installed to rid the air of viruses and germs. When you dry your hands or hair with Breeze, more than a million negative ions are cleaning the air every minute you're using it.

 

 

You read that right, installing Breeze is a breeze! No screws or glue required, just stick the adhesive backing on any tile or glass surface for a mess-free installation in seconds. Screws are an option too if you want something a bit more permanent. You'll get everything you need in the box.
column9:
> 

Breeze uses a Type I plug that is commonly used in Australia, New Zealand, the South Pacific, China, and Argentina. An adapter would be required for countries that use a different type of outlet. It doesn’t matter in what part of the world you live, Breeze will definitely work.
column10:
>

 

Breeze was designed to make your bathroom look and feel like a 5-star hotel room. From the generous size, high-quality materials to the distinct color accents, nothing has been left to chance when designing Breeze. Breeze comes with convenient extra luxuries like USB chargers for your gadgets, an optional shelve for your toiletries, and invisible magnetic storage space for the hairdryer attachments.

 



We have taken a bold approach to the engineering of what we think is the best possible product for your bathroom. It took some sleepless nights from our most senior engineers, but we built a product that we are extremely proud of, and we are confident you will love it too. The first batch has already come out of the factory and passed the strictest quality control test, both in our lab and at home.
column11: >
column12: >We have four reward-tiers for you, be quick because quantities are limited.
column15: >
column19: >We've already started pre-production of Breeze, and a previous model is currently being sold exclusively in some Asian countries, so we know how to make this product at scale. Here's what our timeline is looking like:
column20:
>

If we manage to raise over $500,000 we will unlock an exclusive new color as a stretch goal. Every backer, including those of you who have backed before we hit the $500,000 mark will be able to choose between the original white and the new secret color at the end of the campaign.

column23:
> 

We know backing a crowdfunding campaign is both exciting and a little nerve-racking. This campaign is operated by crowdfunding veterans in partnership with the manufacturer Deerma who guarantees the product will be manufactured and shipped. Deerma is one of the world's leading manufacturers of smart appliances. We have an incredible track-record in producing the most advanced products on a massive scale, so you don't have to worry about us running into production issues.

column1: We buy, use and throw away gadgets on a yearly basis generating tons of hazardous non-recyclable waste. But what if you could have great new devices any time without adding a single ounce of toxic waste? With Newfoldr, you finally can.

As a start we designed a line of opensource, DIY desktop accessories built of high-quality cardboard. We developed a new type of hardware kit that addresses very simple functions and can be used with no skills in electronics. We are creating a platform which can be used to construct any type of everyday desktop accessories such as speakers, lamps, fans or anything that comes to your mind.

We want to share our design philosophy and the freedom of creation with everyone. Buying our products, you are not only getting cool eco-friendly accessories but also supporting us to work towards an open source industry.

We are in need for your help to reach our goal. As a first step we target $10K to start. Manufacturing in low scale can cost just a lot - especially PCBs. With the money raised we can introduce the products and the electrical kits into production, making them available for more people who want to build stuff. Also we will spend a part of this money to build an online hub where people can download product descriptions and manuals and they also can upload their own designs.
So let's see beside being awesome, what can you have in return...

Daru is a beautiful piece of folding, a sculptural object for your desk or office which happens to be a lamp. It’s structure was inspired by a blade of grass which becomes a construction by only one lengthwise folded edge.

With it’s capacitive touch sensor you can turn it on by touching the cardboard. A single touch turns the lamp on and off, but the light can also be dimmed by keeping a finger on the switch. So you can set the light intensity that fits.

The LEDs located on the backside of the lamp cause lower contrast so our eyes do not get exhausted as fast as in case of a regular desk lamp. In addition because of the double sided lighting we do not have to use other light source while we are working as it enlightens the whole room pleasantly reducing energy wasting.
We deliver the lamp unfolded therefore you can fold the prefabricated body to the appropriate form. This way you can get involved in the creation and so the object itself becomes more personal.

With Trim speaker family to enjoy unique acoustics everywhere. They have a simple geometrical form with perfect proportion harmonizing with its functionality. Trim is our portable Bluetooth speaker, while Trim Desktop is its big brother equipped with a USB sound-card.

Beside being durable and light, cardboard has a great quality for being a speaker’s housing. It has a surprisingly clear sound for its size. That is because the housing prevents acoustic short-circuits very effectively, resulting in better sound quality in lower register.

The raw material is perfect for customizing the product with any kind of graphics you like. We can do it for you, but you can even do it yourself. Print your favorite album cover or draw sketches on it. You can design a unique power switch icon too. Whatever you do: it becomes one of a kind.

We thought it would be a nice touch to leave all plastic switches and bulky buttons behind. We design the interaction with the products just as natural as their material and form. We’ve developed a touch sensor that senses your finger through the cardboard layer.

We decided not to create another plastic box to power your device instead we let you use your existing ones to power or charge them. Our products need a common micro USB cable to connect them with either a laptop, a PC or a wall adapter to supply them.
We deliver your products unfolded therefore you can fold the prefabricated body to the appropriate form. This way you can get involved in the creation and so the object itself becomes more personal.

Each of the products contain a combination of a few modular circuit boards that can be custom organized to create wide range of functional products without any electrical design or programming skills.

column3: >Direct Power supply: This PCB is the simplest option to power any device via a micro USB cable (up to 5V 1A)
>Charger module: This battery management module can power any portable device via a micro USB cable or a battery (up to 5V 1A)

column6: >This PCB module responsible for the connectivity and the sound quality
>This PCB module responsible for the connectivity and the sound-quality

column5: >This PCB module a general amplifier module for any stereo audio device (up to 2x 4W and 4 Ohm

column3: >Lamp driver: This PCB is responsible for managing the LED strips and the touch sensor. It can handle led strips up to 5W

column1: Opensource design although lets you create new elements if you like and so this kind of modularity leaves you with endless design possibilities.
Where can I find the free patterns to DIY my products?
Download them from here: DARU, TRIM Bluetooth, TRIM desktop.
Can I mess-up the assembly of the electronic parts?
Don’t worry, if you happen not to have electronic design skills. The modules cannot be assembled wrong since only the matching parts can be connected. Their form is just like a puzzle.
Do I need a driver to use my products?
No, just plug them in and start using them!
How can I choose the graphic design for my products?
After the end of the campaign we send you a form in which you can choose the graphics you like.

If you spill some water on them, don't worry, just wipe it off. These products are made of very high quality cardboard if they contact water for a short time, it does not make any harm. Of course if they contact water for a  longer time they can discolor or in extreme cases wrinkle
What tools do I need to assemble the products?
All assembly is tool-less, we pack you everithing you need to assemble your products.
What chargers can I use to power my gadgets?
You can use any microUSB mobile charger (5V1A DC) and you can plug them into any USB 2.0 or 3.0 slots in any computer.
I bought an add-on but I did not buy a product?
Unfortunately you can not get back your money from indiegogo, but you can still buy a product to utilize your already bought add-on.
How can I get my unique graphics printed on my products
You just need to send it to us. If it wont fit, we will try to fix it or you can choose an other one.
Can I mess-up the assembly of the product?
We send you a very detailed and comprehensive manual, and it is very easy anyway. Although if you make real effort to make it wrong, you can. But it can be fixed easily (see your manual)
I think I just messed-up the sticking, what do I do?
Don’t worry, you can tear it apart very carefully. To do this you can use a cuttter to help (see your manual)

We have already developed our products, so it is safe to say that we have no serious risks regarding functionality and technological feasibility. However it is always hard to get on the market with new products, especially with new electronics.
Our main challenge is to scale the production of the electronic modules. The more pledges we collect the easier for us to manufacture for a reasonable price.
Otherwise it is  pretty straight-forward at the beginning, we just need to get the ball rolling.
We understand that not everyone can contribute, but if you share our vision, or just really liked our products, there are ways to help:
Spread the word, and help us share our indiegogo site.

Direct Power supply: This PCB is the simplest option to power any device via a micro USB cable (up to 5V 1A)
Charger module: This battery management module can power any portable device via a micro USB cable or a battery (up to 5V 1A)
BT sound-card: This PCB module responsible for the connectivity and the sound quality of a protable audio device
USB sound-card: This PCB module responsible for the connectivity and the sound-quality of a desktop audio device
Amplifier card: This PCB module a general amplifier module for any stereo audio device (up to 2x 4W and 4 Ohm)
Lamp driver: This PCB is responsible for managing the LED strips and the touch sensor. It can handle led strips up to 5W

column5:
>What is LumiSmart?

LumiSmart is a smart desk lamp based on IoT (Internet of things) technology. It is not a just smart lamp, but the integration of software, sensors, and user experiences. This revolutionary desk lamp will change your lifestyle by connecting you to tons of possibilities.


If we asked you, “What can you do with your desk lamp?” You would say, “It lights up my desk.” We know that it lights up your desk, but what else can you do with it? As technologies have matured, numerous home appliances have advanced dramatically. However, the feature of a desk lamp is still the same
column6:
it only lights up your place. Why don’t we start using a desk lamp that is as clever as we are? LumiSmart is a human-friendly lamp that will provide a completely new user experience because its features are closely related to your daily life. More in depth, we incorporated people’s living style into technology for a better and efficient lifestyle. Let’s reach beyond our imagination.

More specifically, how is LumiSmart different? Its core functionality includes:

column2: >LumiSmart is always connected to  the Internet, so you can control it with your smart devices anytime, anyplace.
>LumiSmart Apps Store offers highly developed apps for your extra needs. You can create and share your own apps with ease.
>LumiSmart sensors are built to better understand human behaviors. Whatever you are thinking, these human-friendly sensors are two steps ahead.

column1:
Traditional desk lamp vs. LumiSmart, which one would you like to use?


1. You save your electricity in smart ways

LumiSmart contains both White LED (Light Emitting Diode) and RGB (Red, Green, Blue) LED. These not only light up your workplace with a vivid tone, but also save you a lot of energy, and saves money when it detects you’re away.


2. You can control LumiSmart by using your smart phones

You got stressful a week, wants to hang out with your buddies for friday night, but you forgot to turn the light off. Don’t worry a bit. Simply turn your light off remotely.


And better yet? Set the alarm clock using LumiSmart app so that desk lamp can wake your roommate up after good 30 minutes sleeping break. That way she doesn’t need to set the alarm clock before her nap anymore.  Everything is taken care of because desk lamp is right next to you and remembers your daily pattern before you know it.


Smartphone(iOS or Android) is able to be a remote controller for this smart desk lamp. You can control LumiSmart with one touch: power on/off, adjust the brightness, change the lighting, and even took a picture or two remotely.  


With LumiSmart, whatever you want, any scenario is possible and taken care of.  


3. LumiSmart knows your context thru numerous sensors

LumiSmart’s various sensors detect human movements, noise level in the room, brightness, temperature, humidity, etc. The built-in speaker is always ready to talk to you.


4. You can download many apps from LumiSmart Apps Store

You are always more than welcome to download LumiSmart apps. One-click is sufficient to obtain an app, and each app offers you a new function. “Morning Call” is one of many useful apps that will replace your alarm clock.

5. You can cook up your own recipe, just drag and drop with LumiSmart authoring tool

When it comes to desk lamp, not only its basic features are important, but also it would be lot happier to everyone would benefit on their health, and wellness. But how exactly a desk lamp could benefit users in health and wellness?

That’s where LumiSmart app authoring tool comes in.

Using our authoring tool, you don’t need to be an expert to make app that will make user energize, concentrate, and even relax from work. That’s 120% possible because every customer can easily customize and manipulate their own apps through our authoring tool.  

Our authoring tool provides awesome features including sensor-control, TTS (Text to Speech), and Twitter messaging system in basic blocks. You can simply drag and drop a few blocks to make your own programs.

Feel free to share or brag about your amazing apps! By doing so, you will be able to share this outstanding technology with everyone you know. You know what they say, “Sharing is Caring.”

If you wish to wake up early, just drag and drop some blocks for your use! That’s it!  Just play around with those basic blocks

column1: Toaster : PaaS(Platform as a Service) over

LumiSmart is one of good example that uses and applies Toaster platform.

Toaster platform manages and controls Internet of Things devices, and LumiSmart is one of many IoT devices that’s manageable using Toaster platform. Also the platform is capable of collecting data from LumiSmart and other IoT devices, as well as providing environments, such as app store, and app authoring tool where any users and developers could make and distribute applications to invent new features on IoT devices.  

Using Toaster platform will benefit users to manage and control their IoT devices effectively, while developers can expand and invent new features continuously using Toaster’s open APIs. Also, a business partner venture the new business opportunity using big data in Toaster platform.

Toaster platform provides the following features

Toaster Cloud Platform has a vital role to connect among users and IoT devices, as well as to provide User Interface which user could manage IoT devices and their derived data efficiently. Also, Toaster provides an authoring tool to create app, and an app store to share created apps. On developer’s perspective, Toaster Cloud Platform provides RESTful APIs to enable multiple variations of application, and LumiSmart app uses these RESTful APIs to control LumiSmart.
column3:
/>

Toaster Device Platform is for various IoT Device like LumiSmart. It delegates all functions to other devices which make possible to collaborate with Toaster Cloud Platform. Connection Manager that’s responsible for maintaining connection with devices also provides real-time and duplex communicative network environments. Sensor Manager that’s responsible for sensor detection provides features to manage and collect IoT device’s sensor data. Toaster Device Platform extends its capacity and functionality by downloading and executing app from Toaster Cloud Platform

Toaster Platform was created to be applied to as various IoT devices as possible. LumiSmart is just first IoT device and prototype which Toaster platform was applied.

MagicEco aims to connect as many IoT devices as possible, while providing connectivity and diversity by connecting such devices.



About Us

Like any trends behaves, IT technology has evolved over time and it’s pretty hard to find any device around us not using software.  And as software evolves, people has realized that most important thing in developing software is to make better usability so that user experience is intuitive.  Even if any scenarios available are too complicated, one must feel any difficulty using the product.


Based on such thoughts on how product and service should be applied, our second most important thing is to connect everything beautifully and intuitively. MagicEco was founded on these purposes. We aim these purposes by developing great platform and software that is capable of connecting things together, and that is scalable at the same time.


To build and enhance performances of our MagicEco IoT platform, we put a lot of time and endeavor to invest in people.  MagicEco consists of skilled software/hardware engineers and creative talents from Samsung. Talents in MagicEco got great passion and work with craftsmanship which is the fundamental skill-sets to achieve one of first real-life IoT product in the planet.


Meet our team

Jinsub Ahn, Chief Technology Officer
Vincent Park, Server Programmer

Risks and challenges


Although we enjoyed every minute of research and development, our team members also felt it very challengeable to integrate various features into just single product, because LumiSmart has potentials to have enormous scenarios.


We, MagicEco, fully understand the importance of intuitive user experience. We made LumiSmart to be as the simplest, and most approachable IoT product as possible, and of course, we also put lots of effort to its software and hardware.


Unlike some use cases above, we need more involvement from all the supporters around the world, and from indiegogo! Of course we need your supports and investments to improve our products and service we can provide.  We are developing this great product that really could help the world connect everything together. Healthcare, education, security and surveillance are some of good examples. How does it sound if we could detect our favorite people by LumiSmart automatically and greet them with huge bright light?

","What is LumiSmart?LumiSmart is a smart desk lamp based on IoT (Internet of things) technology. It is not a just smart lamp, but the integration of software, sensors, and user experiences. This revolutionary desk lamp will change your lifestyle by connecting you to tons of possibilities. If we asked you, “What can you do with your desk lamp?” You would say, “It lights up my desk.” We know that it lights up your desk, but what else can you do with it? As technologies have matured, numerous home appliances have advanced dramatically. However, the feature of a desk lamp is still the same
column2: it only lights up your place. Why don’t we start using a desk lamp that is as clever as we are? LumiSmart is a human-friendly lamp that will provide a completely new user experience because its features are closely related to your daily life. More in depth, we incorporated people’s living style into technology for a better and efficient lifestyle. Let’s reach beyond our imagination.More specifically, how is LumiSmart different? Its core functionality includes:

column1: LumiSmart is always connected to  the Internet, so you can control it with your smart devices anytime, anyplace.
LumiSmart Apps Store offers highly developed apps for your extra needs. You can create and share your own apps with ease.
LumiSmart sensors are built to better understand human behaviors. Whatever you are thinking, these human-friendly sensors are two steps ahead.

Traditional desk lamp vs. LumiSmart, which one would you like to use? 1. You save your electricity in smart waysLumiSmart contains both White LED (Light Emitting Diode) and RGB (Red, Green, Blue) LED. These not only light up your workplace with a vivid tone, but also save you a lot of energy, and saves money when it detects you’re away. 2. You can control LumiSmart by using your smart phonesYou got stressful a week, wants to hang out with your buddies for friday night, but you forgot to turn the light off. Don’t worry a bit. Simply turn your light off remotely. And better yet? Set the alarm clock using LumiSmart app so that desk lamp can wake your roommate up after good 30 minutes sleeping break. That way she doesn’t need to set the alarm clock before her nap anymore.  Everything is taken care of because desk lamp is right next to you and remembers your daily pattern before you know it.Smartphone(iOS or Android) is able to be a remote controller for this smart desk lamp. You can control LumiSmart with one touch: power on/off, adjust the brightness, change the lighting, and even took a picture or two remotely.  With LumiSmart, whatever you want, any scenario is possible and taken care of.  3. LumiSmart knows your context thru numerous sensorsLumiSmart’s various sensors detect human movements, noise level in the room, brightness, temperature, humidity, etc. The built-in speaker is always ready to talk to you.4. You can download many apps from LumiSmart Apps StoreYou are always more than welcome to download LumiSmart apps. One-click is sufficient to obtain an app, and each app offers you a new function. “Morning Call” is one of many useful apps that will replace your alarm clock.

Camera- take pictures and movie clips

Humidity Sensor- detect humidity of the surrounding air

Messaging Hub- connect to Twitter and Facebook

and after 4 prototypes we have a snow cleaning robot. Here are the
unique and important properties of this robot:
width collector with a 20'' (50 cm) height.
blade/auger design to chop up the ice.
4 - NO CHARGING: Fill the gas tank and
keep blowing. The robot has a hybrid power system, you only put the
gas and the electrical system runs all the electrical motors and

charges the battery. You don't need to stop to charge batteries.

The Details
remote controlled snow cleaning robot. The physical properties of the
System: 4 x 4, electrical drive, 16'' (40cm) wheel diameter, air
35W front lights, chute lights, back lights, flashing back lights.
sets the amount of snow at one pass you can clean, so we tried to make
the collector very big. The 5.5HP engine provides the necessary power to
the system. By putting front and back lights we increased the visibility. The flashing lights are to take even more attention.
capacity to turn 360 degrees. The chute lights help you to see where
you are blowing when it is dark.
designed to cut snow and the front bar works as a bumper. The 4 by 4
drive system provides the power to mobilize the robot and allows easy
turns and driving. The salt box controlled by the remote allows you
to throw salt while you clean the snow.
design is completely innovative, we built a 3D prototype to see the
effectiveness of it. When testing the blades, washing soap was
used because the density and grain structure are similar to those of snow.
engine powers an alternator to generate the necessary electrical power
on the robot. The electrical energy runs the drive system, lights and electronics and it charges the batteries. The robot has a battery pack
to start the gasoline engine and to allow the user to drive the robot
for a short period of time so that the robot can be parked without
robot has an emergency button and the gasoline engine also can be
stopped from the remote control instantly.
start mass manufacturing. We need your help, and we would like to
offer you the SnowBYTE in return.
to June – Finalize the design (Design for Manufacturing).

Shipping.

built the robot, we were able to solve so many of the risks and the
challenges. The main challenges were the adaptation of the parts and the
calculations. Here is a partial list of the calculations done:
transfer through the blades and pump,

One unique advantage of this robot is that it is designed to be simple to manufacture and assemble.

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><span class=""notranlsate""><b>Dizzlike Profile - a profile that is integrated in Facebook with a

dislike button on every webpage (Fb-App for Chrome and Firefox)

Bored of reading things on Facebook like how everybody loves the book
Charlotte's Web"" or that their favorite hobbies are cooking and sports?
Don't you think you could learn more about someone knowing what he does
NOT want to do or watch or listen? With the Dizzlike Profile, you can
share your least favorite movie, say which companies you boycott, or
share the news you ""dizz""like.
This is what our dislike button looks like on Facebook.

This is what our dislike button looks like outside Facebook.

The idea about Dizzlike came up on a Start-up weekend in Nuremberg,
Germany. The idea then developed into Dizzlike Profile. People have been
longing for a dislike button on Facebook and we want to give it to
them. We did not, however, simply want to settle for a button - instead,

we decided it would be neat to create an entire dislike-profile!

We have now completed the Alpha version of the app
where you can dizzlike, for example, cleaning, cancer, McDonald's or Justin

Bieber. Try it out here: https://apps.facebook.com/dizzlikeprofilealpha/ Our alpha app doesn't need any permissions from you (only fb basics). Enjoy!

Also visit our fb page and stay updated: Dizzlike Profile


Dizzlike Profile is not the only idea we have in our minds. We have big
plans for the Dizzlike concept and we plan to program a
complex game in the future. Dizzlike Profile will be part of 'Dizzlike:the game',
where your goal is to have as few friends as possible. But more on that

column1: Our biggest challenge is to get everything done on time. We scheduled
for the app to be finished in about two months but we hope to be done
sooner. There are some challenges that can barely be planned and they
are the tricky ones. Testing the app balance, for example, can take much
longer than predicted. We are all experienced in our field – but still:
you never know what happens. We will hardly be fortunate enough not to
encounter any obstacles but we promise to do our best to overcome them.
We are confident that we will master each and every challenge by the
time we have to face it. We will also stay in contact with you and keep
you updated throughout the whole process until the app is fully
We appreciate any kind of support! Of course projects like this can
always use financial support, so if you are willing to contribute
financially that would help us a lot. Other ways of contributing are:
networking and promotion! So please: share our link on social media and
make some noise about our campaign!
For further questions feel free to contact us. We will answer every question! Thanks again for all your support!

Fishing wires and cables inside of walls has always been a challenge, especially if they are insulated.  I have done this thousands of times in my thirty years working in the air conditioning industry, and I always thought that there has to be an easier way.  One night, this little magnetic fish idea popped into my head, and I knew it was the answer.  I immediately made a crude prototype and tested the theory.  After confirming what size of Rare Earth magnets and plastic housing design would work best, I created 3D CAD drawings and had a better prototype 3D-printed, then tested it on a job-site.  It worked great, so I proceeded to have a rapid injection mold made and had a few hundred produced.  I then created a kit with all of the components needed and started selling them.  They are selling very well and I know that upon getting a more polished, less expensive version produced, these will be in Home Depot, Lowe's and other hardware stores.

column2:
What You Get

Now that the MagFish kits are selling, www.magfish.com, and sales are picking up, it's time to produce a better version that can be mass produced to lower the cost and provide a better functioning and retail-ready packaged product:

  •  We are asking for $20,000 to have an injection mold made that will mold the MagFish, the wire hook, and the parts for the magnetic MagFish guide.  The cost for a six-cavity mold is $13,000.  These parts will be molded here in the Bay Area and this will reduce the part cost dramatically.  The rest of the money will be used to pay for the injection molded parts, the Rare Earth magnets and the blister packaging needed to produce 1,000 finished kits.  
  • For contributions to this campaign, we will offer the new MagFish kit at much less than the retail price and a special Glow in the Dark version!

column1:
• If we don't reach our goal, we will continue to find funding to get this retail version to market.

    • The Impact

    I started my company to market and sell products that I created while also providing a job for my daughter so she could have the flexibility to give as much time as needed to her 3 year old daughter.  We have both worked very hard over the last two and a half years building the business, and the success of this campaign will provide the capital to turn the corner after all of our hard work, and get us on the path to a Made in America small business success story:

    • This product saves time and frustration to anyone pulling wires inside walls and ceilings.  If you have done this before, you know what I mean.  It can be very time consuming on insulated spaces, sometimes taking an hour for one run.  With this product, the same task can be done in less than five minutes!
    • My current company, Magnitude Products, LLC., which is run by my
daughter and myself, is producing and selling several of the products
that I invented and developed (www.magbench.com).  To date, we have not
had one return or negative feedback on any of the thousands we have
The biggest hurdle we face with the development and production of
this product is being able to pay for a multi-cavity injection mold.  This mold is essential to produce high-quality plastic parts that are
made of tough ABS plastic.  We need this mold to reduce production costs
per unit which will allow us to produce a ""Made in America"" product
with a reasonable sale price.  This funding campaign will allow us to
buy a stainless steel injection mold, use it to mold the parts, and
purchase the other components to build the kits and bring this product
<li> There are always challenges that arise when going to injection
molding and launching a new product.   I have successfully done this
before, from conception to a finished product, with the GetterBack
object recovery product (www.getterback.com).  Using that experience and the knowledge gained, this product launch will go very smoothly and be even more successful.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you do not wish to contribute, but know someone that could use this valuable product, please let them know.
  • One way to do this is through Indiegogo share tools!


","Short Summary

Fishing wires and cables inside of walls has always been a challenge, especially if they are insulated.  I have done this thousands of times in my thirty years working in the air conditioning industry, and I always thought that there has to be an easier way.  One night, this little magnetic fish idea popped into my head, and I knew it was the answer.  I immediately made a crude prototype and tested the theory.  After confirming what size of Rare Earth magnets and plastic housing design would work best, I created 3D CAD drawings and had a better prototype 3D-printed, then tested it on a job-site.  It worked great, so I proceeded to have a rapid injection mold made and had a few hundred produced.  I then created a kit with all of the components needed and started selling them.  They are selling very well and I know that upon getting a more polished, less expensive version produced, these will be in Home Depot, Lowe's and other hardware stores.

What We Need & What You Get Now that the MagFish kits are selling, www.magfish.com, and sales are picking up, it's time to produce a better version that can be mass produced to lower the cost and provide a better functioning and retail-ready packaged product:   We are asking for $20,000 to have an injection mold made that will mold the MagFish, the wire hook, and the parts for the magnetic MagFish guide.  The cost for a six-cavity mold is $13,000.  These parts will be molded here in the Bay Area and this will reduce the part cost dramatically.  The rest of the money will be used to pay for the injection molded parts, the Rare Earth magnets and the blister packaging needed to produce 1,000 finished kits.    For contributions to this campaign, we will offer the new MagFish kit at much less than the retail price and a special Glow in the Dark version!

If we don't reach our goal, we will continue to find funding to get this retail version to market.    The Impact I started my company to market and sell products that I created while also providing a job for my daughter so she could have the flexibility to give as much time as needed to her 3 year old daughter.  We have both worked very hard over the last two and a half years building the business, and the success of this campaign will provide the capital to turn the corner after all of our hard work, and get us on the path to a Made in America small business success story:  This product saves time and frustration to anyone pulling wires inside walls and ceilings.  If you have done this before, you know what I mean.  It can be very time consuming on insulated spaces, sometimes taking an hour for one run.  With this product, the same task can be done in less than five minutes! My current company, Magnitude Products, LLC., which is run by my
daughter and myself, is producing and selling several of the products
that I invented and developed (www.magbench.com).  To date, we have not
had one return or negative feedback on any of the thousands we have
The biggest hurdle we face with the development and production of
this product is being able to pay for a multi-cavity injection mold.  This mold is essential to produce high-quality plastic parts that are
made of tough ABS plastic.  We need this mold to reduce production costs
per unit which will allow us to produce a ""Made in America"" product
with a reasonable sale price.  This funding campaign will allow us to
buy a stainless steel injection mold, use it to mold the parts, and
purchase the other components to build the kits and bring this product
There are always challenges that arise when going to injection
molding and launching a new product.   I have successfully done this
before, from conception to a finished product, with the GetterBack
object recovery product (www.getterback.com).  Using that experience and the knowledge gained, this product launch will go very smoothly and be even more successful.

Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  If you do not wish to contribute, but know someone that could use this valuable product, please let them know. One way to do this is through Indiegogo share tools!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column8:
>A Tool for Innovation

Our goal at Reify 3D was to create an affordable stereolithography printer capable of producing professional quality prints while eliminating the major headache of most bottom-up SLA printers: poor peeling material durability. And we did it!

column5: >Model credits at the bottom of the page

column1: DLP stereolithography offers many advantages over the more common FFF/FDM 3D printing technology:
Resolution and Accuracy - With the addition of an HD projector, Solus is able to print down to 25 micron XY resolution with features below 100 microns.
Surface Finish  - With its smooth linear motion, stable construction, and low-energy peeling, Solus produces prints with a surface finish quality usually only found on much more expensive printers.
Print Speed - The projector cures a complete layer at a single time so complexity is truly free.
With these key features Solus works well for a wide variety of industries and applications:

Most other consumer SLA printers use either a PDMS silicon layer or an adhesive-backed Teflon film for their non-stick peeling surface. PDMS has great non-stick properties, but it can get cloudy or even break after just a few prints causing much frustration. Adhesive-backed Teflon can scatter the light, causing washed-out details or the Teflon can quickly separate from the tank bottom causing print failure.

column3: >To solve these issues Solus uses a durable film sourced from the semiconductor and flat-panel industries in combination with a patent-pending tilt peeling method. This smooth peeling and unscattered light transmission allow for sharper details, XY features below 100 microns and a very smooth surface finish. With this peeling method, we have also been able to print single objects that almost completely fill the build area (14.5 x 11 cm), all while eliminating the need to change or re-coat the resin tank.

column1:
Hardware and Software

Solus is made from thick, laser-cut anodized aluminum and stainless steel components so it is strong, stable, and reliable. The z axis motor has an integrated lead screw with a professional quality anti-backlash nut for layer consistency and a smooth surface finish. The build platform and resin tank are fastened with quick release levers for easy removal. The extendable legs lock securely and there is a bubble level on the top plate to ensure a high print success rate.

No assembly required!

The software is user-friendly and has support generation. All of the print cycle settings (times, speeds and distances) are open so it can be used with the widest variety of resins or used for researching new materials.



Projectors


Solus will work with most non-LED DLP projectors and the addition of a close-up filter and adapter, or in the case of the Acer H6510BD, straight out of the box. And since the projector is not enclosed inside of the printer, it can be used to watch movies when you're not printing.
column5: >It is also possible to modify the lens on many projectors to reduce the focus distance, but this will void the projector's warranty.
>Monger Designs - Lattice Ring with 300 micron  wire mesh

column1: As with most DLP printers, the XY build area is dependent on the XY resolution you wish to print at. The maximum XY build area is 14.5 x 11 cm and the maximum height is 20cm. The extendable legs allow for a wide range of resolutions. For the projectors we have tested the resolutions and build areas are as follows:

column4: >*25 micron XY resolution is not possible with all HD projectors.
>Native Z resolution is 10 microns, but less than 1 micron is available with 1/16 microstepping.

column1: Solus has been well tested with resins from MakerJuice, Spot A Materials and our own formulations. The resin tank is made of acrylic and the peeling material is resistant to almost any chemical, so all resins that cure around 400nm should work. There are already a great variety of material choices ranging from ones as strong as ABS to flexible, castable and even ceramic filled, and we expect the list grow quickly as SLA printers gain in popularity.

column2: >During the campaign, we plan to test resins from other manufacturers, as well as casting resins.

column1: • To purchase the components, materials and machining in the quantities necessary to be able to offer Solus at this low price.
• Create a community of people who can share ideas, designs, tips and research data.
• Help promote this technology for research applications.

We are a team of engineers and designers who are passionate about 3D printing and exploring this technology. We have been developing Solus for nearly two years and it has introduced us to technologies and fields of research that we believe have the potential to change the world. This furthered our conviction that we make Solus flexible and affordable so it can be used as a powerful tool in these pursuits.
Mechanical engineering background with nearly 10 years experience in international business management.
Experience at both the engineering and management levels in the flat-panel and semiconductor industries.
Nai Wen Zhang - Solidworks and Fabrication Master

Solus has been designed for ease of manufacturing and the laser cutter does most of the hard work. Agreements have been reached with the major part suppliers and alternative suppliers have been located if necessary. Being located in one of the high-tech manufacturing hotspots of the world, we are fortunate to be surrounded by a vast selection of component suppliers, machine shops and contract manufacturers. Thank you Taiwan :)

","A Tool for Innovation Our goal at Reify 3D was to create an affordable stereolithography printer capable of producing professional quality prints while eliminating the major headache of most bottom-up SLA printers: poor peeling material durability. And we did it!
Model credits at the bottom of the page
Flexible and Powerful for Multiple Applications
DLP stereolithography offers many advantages over the more common FFF/FDM 3D printing technology:
Resolution and Accuracy - With the addition of an HD projector, Solus is able to print down to 25 micron XY resolution with features below 100 microns.
Surface Finish  - With its smooth linear motion, stable construction, and low-energy peeling, Solus produces prints with a surface finish quality usually only found on much more expensive printers.
Print Speed - The projector cures a complete layer at a single time so complexity is truly free.
With these key features Solus works well for a wide variety of industries and applications:

Most other consumer SLA printers use either a PDMS silicon layer or an adhesive-backed Teflon film for their non-stick peeling surface. PDMS has great non-stick properties, but it can get cloudy or even break after just a few prints causing much frustration. Adhesive-backed Teflon can scatter the light, causing washed-out details or the Teflon can quickly separate from the tank bottom causing print failure.

To solve these issues Solus uses a durable film sourced from the semiconductor and flat-panel industries in combination with a patent-pending tilt peeling method. This smooth peeling and unscattered light transmission allow for sharper details, XY features below 100 microns and a very smooth surface finish. With this peeling method, we have also been able to print single objects that almost completely fill the build area (14.5 x 11 cm), all while eliminating the need to change or re-coat the resin tank.

Hardware and SoftwareSolus is made from thick, laser-cut anodized aluminum and stainless steel components so it is strong, stable, and reliable. The z axis motor has an integrated lead screw with a professional quality anti-backlash nut for layer consistency and a smooth surface finish. The build platform and resin tank are fastened with quick release levers for easy removal. The extendable legs lock securely and there is a bubble level on the top plate to ensure a high print success rate.No assembly required!The software is user-friendly and has support generation. All of the print cycle settings (times, speeds and distances) are open so it can be used with the widest variety of resins or used for researching new materials.ProjectorsSolus will work with most non-LED DLP projectors and the addition of a close-up filter and adapter, or in the case of the Acer H6510BD, straight out of the box. And since the projector is not enclosed inside of the printer, it can be used to watch movies when you're not printing. It is also possible to modify the lens on many projectors to reduce the focus distance, but this will void the projector's warranty.
Monger Designs - Lattice Ring with 300 micron  wire mesh

As with most DLP printers, the XY build area is dependent on the XY resolution you wish to print at. The maximum XY build area is 14.5 x 11 cm and the maximum height is 20cm. The extendable legs allow for a wide range of resolutions. For the projectors we have tested the resolutions and build areas are as follows:
*25 micron XY resolution is not possible with all HD projectors.
Native Z resolution is 10 microns, but less than 1 micron is available with 1/16 microstepping.

Solus has been well tested with resins from MakerJuice, Spot A Materials and our own formulations. The resin tank is made of acrylic and the peeling material is resistant to almost any chemical, so all resins that cure around 400nm should work. There are already a great variety of material choices ranging from ones as strong as ABS to flexible, castable and even ceramic filled, and we expect the list grow quickly as SLA printers gain in popularity.
During the campaign, we plan to test resins from other manufacturers, as well as casting resins.
To purchase the components, materials and machining in the quantities necessary to be able to offer Solus at this low price.
Create a community of people who can share ideas, designs, tips and research data.
Help promote this technology for research applications.

We are a team of engineers and designers who are passionate about 3D printing and exploring this technology. We have been developing Solus for nearly two years and it has introduced us to technologies and fields of research that we believe have the potential to change the world. This furthered our conviction that we make Solus flexible and affordable so it can be used as a powerful tool in these pursuits.
Mechanical engineering background with nearly 10 years experience in international business management.
Experience at both the engineering and management levels in the flat-panel and semiconductor industries.
Nai Wen Zhang - Solidworks and Fabrication Master
April Ho - Software and Graphic Design

Solus has been designed for ease of manufacturing and the laser cutter does most of the hard work. Agreements have been reached with the major part suppliers and alternative suppliers have been located if necessary. Being located in one of the high-tech manufacturing hotspots of the world, we are fortunate to be surrounded by a vast selection of component suppliers, machine shops and contract manufacturers. Thank you Taiwan :)
Dennis Harroun - Dune Queen                           Seechless - Rook

FEATURED ON:

This Is Brainy

All there's left to do is produce the hangers in its updated form and ship to old and new backers.

How Did Levitate Hanger Get Improved?

The change, as you can see in the video, is eliminating the need for adhesives completely if you so choose. This enhancement also increases the weight Levitate Hanger can hold.

1. Effectiveness - Our first Levitate Hanger was relying heavily on the use of adhesives.

2. Precision - Before, you had to guesstimate that the hanger was placed at the center of your picture. No more!

3. Security + Freedom - The holes were added for two reasons:
• In case you don’t want to use adhesives.
• To use adhesives AND nails/push pins to increase the weight capacity.
• The standard flathead golden push pins you know (included in the packaging)

4. Durability + Ease of Use - Levitate Hanger about 20% smaller. This made Levitate Hanger 2.0 stronger and easier to use.

What Is Levitate Hanger 2.0?

The problems of hanging pictures never changed:
• Using tools: wires, hooks, nails, levels etc.

Research shows that most people hang at least 15 pictures on their walls. I know I do. I have at least 30! And as a photographer doing gallery shows once in a while, hanging photos takes a VERY LONG TIME!

Most people take 5-10 minutes to hang a single picture! That’s about 2.5 hours you can spend being with your friends and family or finish more important work tasks.

For years, these problems have continued without a revolutionary solution.

Until Levitate Hanger showed up!

Levitate Hanger 2.0 Has Only 2 Steps:

Step 1: Attach Levitate Hanger set to the back of your picture.

Step 2: Push your picture onto the wall.

Step 3 (optional): Rotate as needed. Or just for fun
column5:
showinfo=0"">

Why Are People Not Hanging Pictures?

One of the main reasons people are not hanging pictures on their walls is the dread of having to get everything together - where is the tape measure? where is the level? where is the hammer? etc.

We get it.  We have so many other priorities in life, so we say ""we'll hang these pictures some other time"", but we never do. Our excuses are: taking measurements, finding our tool kits, drilling/hammering into the wall, leveling, needing the help of others, cleaning afterwards etc.

Introducing -  Levitate Hanger 2.0! 

Now, you can finally hang your pictures in only 10 seconds! And not just pictures! You can hang all kinds of devices, like: tablets, smart phones, Media streaming devices (Echo, Google Mini, Apple TV etc.), plate decorations and so much more!

With Levitate Hanger you follow only two steps: attaching one part of the hanger on the picture and attaching the other part of the hanger on the wall. A third step is optional - rotate as needed.

No more:

column1:
Levitate Hanger is today's quickest and most versatile solution for hanging your pictures and devices. Thanks to Levitate Hanger, you can hang most anything in just 10 seconds AND have them perfectly leveled on your wall.

Levitate Hanger is mess-free and reusable. If you ever want to move or take down a picture, pull it off the wall. It will not damage your wall or the hanger and you'll be able to reuse Levitate Hanger 2.0 over and over.

Back our project now to help us revolutionize how we hang pictures and other devices, and experience first-hand how Levitate Hanger 2.0 can make this part of your life much easier and more creative.

We designed Levitate Hanger to solve what most picture hangers cant.

Features:

1. Hang pictures, tablets, phones and other devices in 10 seconds or less.

2. Rotate 360 degrees and stops at any desired angle 

3. Change pictures without replacing all hangers

If you ever used other picture hanger systems, you probably know, in order to put up a different size picture you had to replace the hanger on the wall or replace the hanging system if they are both on the wall and on the picture.  Other than making you waste precious time and money it also added trash to our environment.

With Levitate Hanger you can change pictures to any size you want.  Replacement is done in matter of seconds, and you create far less trash than before!

4. One size fits all

We design for the future. After this campaign we're planning on manufacturing different sizes of Levitate Hangers.  With that in mind, we don't want you to waste money on a whole new system and create more waste.  Instead, you'll be able to purchase different sizes of the Slider, while using the same holder.

5. Leaves damage-free walls

Another reason Levitate Hanger was created is to leave your walls as free of damage as possible.  Drilling and hammering into your walls ruins and weakens them and if you do that a lot, you'll get to a point where you have no more space to put nails and screws in. Besides, ""Swiss cheese walls"" are not fun to look at and they are not fun to fix when the time comes.

This feature eliminates risks of hitting wiring, pipes etc and there's no need to locate a wall stud.  These are common problems when using nails and hooks.

6. Reusable (because we love this planet!)

When created Levitate Hanger decided we don't want anyone to ever throw it away and make unnecessary trash.  Making it a reusable hanger was the ultimate solution.  If one day you don't want/need to use it anymore, you can just hand it out or sell it.

If you wish to move your picture from one side of the wall to another, there's no need to throw it away and purchase a new Levitate Hanger.  You simply replace the adhesives, attach the Slider on the picture and the Holder on the wall. Done!

THE NEW PACKAGING DESIGNS

Packaging Option #1

Packaging Option #2

How to Back Levitate Hanger?

So now that you know how simple it is to hang your pictures, tablets and phones, are you ready to make it happen and bring Levitate Hanger 2.0 to your home?

We've put together a series of rewards for you to choose from.  Each reward has its pledge price so all you have to do is choose the one you most desire.  Even purchasing a single hanger helps us get closer to our goal and make Levitate Hanger available in stores near you.

Choose Your Reward.

Two Levitate Hangers $24 - 2x Levitate Hanger 2.0 ($30 discount)

EARLY BIRDS: Starter Pack $45 - 8x Levitate Hanger 2.0 ($75 discount)

Early Bird Enthusiast Pack - $105 - 20x Levitate Hanger 2.0 ($195 discount)

Gallery Pack - $225 - 30x Levitate Hanger 2.0 and your name on the packaging ($225 discount)

Our Team

Moshe Levis - Founder / CEO

Shirin Polo - Social Media

Moshe Vanounou - Financial Advisor

StrawnLid is designed to help you reduce more plastics than just reducing a plastic straw with a reusable straw. It is even more friendly to carry around than a plastic straw. 

 The lid was designed to fit almost every size of the cup on market. It is not only preventing dust get into your drink, but also keeping liquid in the cup.

 Cases and lids come in 5 colours respectively. You can make your colour combinations. So, StrawnLid will definitely fit in your style.

 ^1: Estimated retail price

^2: Offered price

 

 

 

 

Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact: hi@strawnlid.com 

 

About the Founder

Same as other business students, I love to think about things that can potentially make this world a better place. With the increasing use of reusable straws and giant water bottles, I came up with the idea of combining them, How about merging reusable straws and reusable lids?

After many sleepless nights, I finally got StrawnLid and semi-permanent dark circles. Now, with my dark circles, I would like to proudly introduce StrawnLid to the public.

FunScrubber believes making an impact in society starts with inspiring children to pursue their educational goals and dreams.
With every purchase, FunScrubber will donate 10% of the proceeds to fund educational non-profits in the USA.
The minimum funding goal of $30,000 will be used to pay for production set-up costs.
If the funding goal of $1,000,000 is achieved, FunScrubber will donate an additional $100,000 to charity.
The FunScrubber is ready for the stinkiest challenge!

FunScrubbers are not only fun to use, but we are constantly evaluating new methods of production to provide our customers with the best quality product. As a result, the finished product may differ from what is originally depicted.

While we do not anticipate any production issues with the FunScrubber, sometimes unforeseen circumstances may impact the delivery of the FunScrubber in a timely manner.  These unforeseen circumstances are factory delay, logistics delay, or natural disasters.  We are 100% transparent if any issues may arise.  We have dedicated people to make sure your product arrives in time.
Please use the Indiegogo share tools and help us get the word out.
It's so fun....FunScrubber,  Make TOILETS Great Again!

XKchrome is a revolutionary product that pushes automotive LED lighting into a new era. It shines your beloved motorcycle or car with millions of vivid colors and animated patterns. Using the visually stunning, easy-to-use mobile app, you can control the lights remotely, and customize everything at your fingertips.  

XKchrome utilizes various sensors in your phone to bring dynamics to the light. The Real-time Chameleon feature instantly changes your vehicle to whatever color you see. The Music Sync feature makes the light dance with whatever rhythm you hear. With XKchrome, the vehicle essentially becomes part of you and extends your self-expression into whole new dimensions.

In addition to lighting, XKchrome improves night driving safety and brings you convenience. The Smart Brake sensor automatically switches all lights to full-on red during brake for maximum visibility. XKchrome even remembers your parking spot whenever you leave the vehicle so that you don't have to. We integrate all these powerful features into an ultra-slim, waterproof controller, which talks to your phone using the most advanced Bluetooth Smart and iBeacon Technology. 
See what people have done with XKchrome. Support us to shine your vehicles!

column2: >XKchrome on world's first production 3D printed car

column1: Maybe you have heard of Local Motors world's first 3D printed car in 2014 SEMA. This year at 2015 SEMA, Local Motors is unveiling a whole version designed to be mass produced (or we should say printed) in microfactories around the US and globally in near future. XKchrome is being used in one of the first concept car. Together with IBM cloud and other IoT (Internet of Things) technology, the lights can do a lot more than just decoration. For example, the underglow can strobe in amber when an accident has happened, or the interior ambient light can slightly glow red to remind you are over speed limit. We are very excited to see what people can do with XKchrome technology. And we would love to see what you will do with XKchrome in the coming months.
column2:
>

Brake light visibility is the top concern for motorcycle safety at night. Now with the integrated Smart Brake sensor, XKchrome can turn the entire motorcycle body into a brake light! As soon as you apply the brake, XKchrome immediately switches all LED lights on in red. This significantly increases the bike's visibility, and promotes faster reaction of the vehicle behind.

**The Smart Break feature comes in EVERY XKchrome kit. All you need to do is simply attaching a wire to the positive line of break light or break fuse. 

Capture A Color, Paint With Light.
column3:
>

With XKchrome's realtime ""chameleon"" feature, you can paint your ride with any color you see. Whether it's a stunning new shirt or a beautiful sunflower, just point your phone's camera to it. XKchrome instantly turns your vehicle into the very same eye-catching color, without even a finger tap. Be prepared to be in AWE!
column7:
and we make it the essence of light. XKchrome's Music Sync feature enables lights to dance with the rhythm of any song in your phone, or with any sound picked up by the microphone. To maximize visual effect, our adaptive algorithm dynamically adjusts the volume sensitivity. No matter if it's a country music or a hard rock, just lay back and enjoy the full spectrum you defined for your favorite song.

16 Million Colors at Your Fingertip &
column10:
>

Built with 16 bit gamma correction, XKchrome provides over 16 million vibrant colors, allowing the user to choose any color with a single tap. Each controller has two zones that can simultaneously run different colors and patterns, allowing more room for creativity and uniqueness. Up to 4 controllers (8 zones) can be connected at the same time.

Holiday Themes &
column12:
>

Our color designer hand-picked over 15 themes for special occasions throughout the year. In addition, users can fully customize their own themes with various pattern, speed, and up to 10 color combinations.
column13: >
column14:
>

XKchrome can do more than lighting. Thanks to its built-in Bluetooth Smart Beacon, XKchrome helps locate your parked vehicle. When you walk away after parking, XKchrome app will automatically pin down your location. So that you can easily look it up in the app when you need to find the way back. Once you get close enough, you can also turn on the lights to single your vehicle out from the endless parking row.

Gamma Color Correction

To make XKchrome worth its name, color accuracy is among our top goals. XKchrome is the first lighting kit that features 16-bit high precision gamma correction, a technology previously only used in studio-level LED monitors. Compared to most other LED lighting products in the market, our industry-leading technology delivers much more vivid color and smoother color transitions.

Waterproof

As designers we never compromise on quality. It is our job, not yours, to prepare XKchrome for the toughest days. That is why we've designed XKchrome to be completely waterproof. The controller is sealed in an ultra-slim, elegant-looking enclosure. The innovative touch sensing button on the top of the enclosure ensures a seamless response. We rigorously test our final products to make sure that no moisture can go inside even when the entire controller is soaked in the water.

column25:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">


As designer and maker, Eric and Dan started the LED automobile lighting company called XK GLOW in 2009 (during the peak of financial crisis) from a small dorm room at the University of Illinois. In 2010, when we first saw a smartphone controlled drone on the internet, we knew a new era of app-enabled hardware was coming. Despite the little resources we had, two generations of app controlled automobile led lights have been born since 2011. In 2014, with two passionate makers Haogang (PhD in Computer Science) and Richard (creator of OSEMO) joining the team, we set out to develop XKchrome, the world's coolest lights for automobiles.

We pumped all the experience and feedback gathered from the previous models into XKchrome, and integrated them with the most advanced BLE and iBeacon technology to make it meet our highest standards. After many sleepless nights and a couple factory visits, all hardware and app development have been completed and we are currently preparing for the first batch of production by working closely with the manufacturer, which has produced many products for the world's top 500 companies.

Special thanks to:

column2: Scott. We wouldn't have gotten this far without your dedication.

column1: • Casey, Robert, and John. Thank you for making a great video.

Risks and challenges

With years of experience in product design and manufacturing management, we know that the mass production and quality control is a complex undertaking. That’s why we come prepared and have already finished all of the led light production work . This allows us to focus on the controller production and quality control to make sure it meets the highest standard.

In addition to the hardware, we are working tirelessly on testing the app to make sure it works flawlessly on iOS and Android platforms. We are testing the app across every iPhone version from iPhone 4S to 6 Plus, and over 5 major Android phone brands. The goal is not only to embed the coolest and robust light effect with your beloved vehicle, but also ensure a smooth and enjoyable app user experience.

With your support, we are confident XKchrome can be produced with high quality and delivered to you on time.
